70b3(mdo): 'gyur// de dag 'bras bu me tog rnams// de dag zad par shes par rgyas/ bskal pa bye ba 'di stong rnams dang // wag khrig dag ni brgya bgrangs par // brtsod pa zhig gis de dag gi// bsngags 'phreng yid du'o/ 
70b4(mdo): brjod kyang // sangs rgyas sras po de dag gi// yon tan mtha'ani brjod kyi nus// sangs rgyas sras po de dag sa// byi gang kyidaka' byed pa de// swa dang myo ri spangs nas su de dag dmyal ba sa
70b5(mdo): yul 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ni// myi ga las gnod byed pa// myig myed pa'am long ba dang // sdug pa sa dpung gnyen myed par 'gyur// shi 'phos nas ni ma dang byed 'gro
70b6(mdo): de ni 'bar zhing 'jigs par 'gyur// sus ni chen por gyu ra nas kyang // sug bsngal tshod pa byong bar 'gyur// tshe rabs de dang de dag tu// de sus dpag tshad tsam gyur da te// de dag zung ltar zlus gyurard pa
70b7(mdo): kun nas yongs su bzab par 'gyur // de che sus la mgo bo ni// snga stong yod par 'byung gyur zhing / mgo po de dag re re la'ang // s+ye yi lnga brgya tham pa yod// gcig la'ang thong gshol brgya dag gis
70b8(mdo): lce ni rab tu rmo bar 'gyur// sdig pa'i las kyi rnam sbyin gyis// myi bzang chen por gsheg par 'gyur// mnar myed de nas shi 'phos nas/ de ni tshe dang rab tsha bar// blo gros ngan pas tshor ba myong / 
71a1(mdo): de sngon nyes byas 'bras bu yin// byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ni// ma bsngags gang zhig gnod byed pa// de la dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang // dmyal ba'i sa ni dkon ma yin// tshe rabs bye ba stong
71a2(mdo): rnams dang // khrag khrig dag ni brgya bgrangs par// sug bsngal tshor ba myong 'gyur zhing // de ni bzang po rnams myi mthong // sangs rgyas sras po skyeb pa rnams la// gnod pa dag ni byas gyur da na// a la gar
71a3(mdo): rta 'jigs pa yi// shind tu gtug pa'i sprul du skye// de ni dkris dang bsgom pas nyen sdig pa'i las rnam byed par 'gyur// de ni zas kyang myi rnyed de rnams kyang 'drangs par za myi myong // shi 'phos gshin rje'i
71a4(mdo): 'jig rten du// de ni rtag par rtun tu brdung // dge slong dag la gnod byas pas// nams kyang skyabs ni rnyed myi 'gyur// de nas shi 'phos dus byas te// 'phags pa rnams la skur btab pas
71a5(mdo): 'anams kyang skyabs na rnyad mya 'gyur// de nas sha 'phas ng+yas bya/ sa te// phyi'i lus thob byu rang pa na// blo ngan de ni dmus long / 'gyur// gnod sems ldan zhing sdom pa myed// de ni nyes par
71a6(mdo): sme byas te// 'phags pa rnams la skur btab pas// myi'i nang nas sha 'phos nas// ngan song dag tu myur du 'gro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ni// ma bsdams gang zhig gnod byed pa// bskal pa
71a7(mdo): bye ba stong dag tu// nams kyang sangs rgyas mthong myi 'gyur// rdzogs sangs rgyas sras rnams la// gang zhig chos bzhin srung byed pa// des drin 'gro kun spangs te// myur du bzab 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur
71a8(mdo): phyag cing nor chen ldan pa dang // dang dang ldan zhing 'jigs pa byed/ dran dang ldan zhing sher ba ldan// bde zhing ngo ma khrel ltas ldan// gang du 'jig rten nas kyi smon// yongs su mya ngan 'das gyur da pa/ 
71b1(mdo): sangs rgyas mchod rten mthong nas ni// yang dang yang du sti stang byed// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i// 'di 'dra'i chos 'di thos gyur dang // sangs rgyas sras po rnams sa ni// su zhig phyi phyir dang myi byed/ 
71b2(mdo): gang gis / sangs rgyas stong rnams dang // brgya dang bye ba grangs dag la// bskal pa gang ga'i bye ma snyed// de snyed skal bar bskor ba pas// 'jig rtend mgon gis gsungs pa'i// dam chos 'jigs che gang zhig
71b3(mdo): gis// nyin dang mtshan tu 'jid byed pa// de ni bsod nams khyad par 'phags// chos 'jig chen chos 'dzind pa// sngon gi sangs rgyas thams cad dang // sangs rgyas ye shes rab gnas pa// de la des ni
71b4(mdo): mchod par byas// dpa kha'i chos ni 'jig pa'i tshe// ston 'i bstan pa srung byed pa// bskal pa bye ba stong rnams su// de ni nams kyang rgud kyi 'byung // lus kyis bde ba myong 'gyur zhis
71b5(mdo): de ni nyis btab kyi 'gyur// deni yid tu myi 'ong bas// nam kyang 'phrog par gyi 'gyur ro// ston pa'i bstan pa bsrung rgya na/ bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / des dang galas
71b6(mdo): mnyen pa dang / sems can rnams la byams sems 'byung // 'jig che rgyal ba mchog gi chos bzung bas// bde da pa dga' ba'i mdzod dmang por 'gyung // brtsu ga ro ma 'i gro bya ba 'job byung zhing // kyi chom brgya
71b7(mdo): zom sum zang par spong // 'jig che rgyal ba mchog gi chos bzung bas// debar na nam mkha' skar yongs gang snang // rtag tu mtshan khyim go char byas pa dang / rab tu tshig snyan yid 'ong dbyangs su 'gyur// 
71b8(mdo): 'dzin rten rgyal ba mchog gi chos bzung bas// gang na yid bdes myed cing rab sdug pa// rigs dpan de ni de yis spangs par 'gyur// phyug cing shin tu bde la yongs ldan// 'jig tshe rgyal ba mchog ni
72a1(mdo): chos bzung bas// mthu dang stobs dang ldan zhing brtson 'grus ldan// myi dman sa rnams kun tu rnam par rgyu// sangs rgyas brgya stong dag la bsnyen bkur byed// 'jig tshe rgyal ba mchog gi chos bzung bas/ 
72a2(mdo): mchog tu rab mdzes gzugs ldan shes rab ldan// kyi 'jig rten mchog tu bsnyen bkur 'gyur// rgyal po mkhas pa 'dzangs pa rnams kyis bsngags// 'jig tshe rgyal ba mchog gi chos bzung bas// mchog tu
72a3(mdo): gzugs mdzes lta na sdug pa dang // skyes pa bud myed lha rnams dka' ba dang // bde zhing mkhas la bsngags shing shes rab ldan// ston pa stobs bcu mnga' ba sta'i ltas// gang gi mdun du mdo 'di rab bshad
72a4(mdo): pa// phyi de lag tu mdo sde 'di 'dra 'di// phyi ma'i chus kyin thob par 'gyur// gang zhig ston pa gyi mchog gzugs byed/ dab// ras 'dri rtsig ngos 'dri 'am gser las byas/ de'i chos
72a5(mdo): kyi khyad par gang yin pa// de dag ma lus rab tu bstand kyis nyon// / de na blta myi long pa zha myi 'gyur// sgur por myi 'gyur yan sa// ga myi sdug myid// de ni gzugs dang ldan zhing kha tog ldan// 
72a6(mdo): sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan kyis go char 'gyur// lus ni rnam par dag cing khyad par 'thob// spobs pa thob cing sgra snyan yod du 'ong // shes rab spen zhing 'jig rten kun gyi tshe// de mtho sems can bde 'di
72a7(mdo): dga' bar 'gyur// sdig byed phyi 'gyur zhe sdang myed sems can// g.yo myed kyi chu rgyal po 'khrug myi byed// mthu dang ldan zhing dbang cher grags par 'gyur// byams sa gnas shing myi dpan sems dang / 
72a8(mdo): na// 'dren pa'i sku gzugs rab tu mdzes byas na// de ni mchog 'byar skye bo mang ma me 'os// the snyan phyag cing me nyid rgya cher ldan// dab nga ldan 'kho sos bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyung // 'dren pa'i
72b1(mdo): spu gzugs rab tu mdzes byas na// su'i dang po dang byag dang chob pa// mun po 'i rloms dbang thob pargya byin 'gyur // bdag po sun pa'i thom sa rgyas phrad su dang// deni dren dang zla bras kyi srin gyid// de la rton pa/ 
72b2(mdo): mos shes rab chang bar 'gyur// 'jig rtend kun na dbugs phyin thob 'gyur te// 'di ni ye shes ldan zhing dmyal ba spangs// sems can snying po mtshungs myed mchod byas na// ro da 'gro'i skye gnas gshin rje'i yul
72b3(mdo): myi 'gro// ngan 'gro gsum po des ni rnam spangs te// bdag gis phyis kyi skye ba shes par 'gyur // 'dren pa'i sku gzugs rab tu mdzes byas na// dbang ldan dbang phyug nyid kyi lhar 'gyur te// byi dman dga'
72b4(mdo): pa'i sems kyis sangs rgyas mchod// rgyal ba mchog gi bstan// del dad par 'gyur// tshangs pa'i 'jig rten dbang thob tshangs par 'gyur// yid 'ong shi nad tu mdzes pa'i spos dad can// 'dzam bu
72b5(mdo): klung gser 'od dka' 'gyur ba'i// gzhal myed khang mtshon blta sdug thob par 'gyur// de ni de dpon stobs bcu ldan pa'o/ sems can snying po mtshungs 'dra myed pa thob// kha dog mtha'
72b6(mdo): yas 'jig rten kun na gsal// gser ster rin chen bdun dang mtshungs par 'gyur// su zhig dga' ba'i yid kyis me tog blangs// dad skyes 'jig rten 'gon la chang du gtor da// de ni myi'i 'jig rten
72b7(mdo): bsod nams sAma?// rgyal ni srid gnas nas rgyas pa mchog bskur 'gyur// mya ngan skam zhing za pa dring ldan sus// yan lag legs gnas mtshungs myed thob par 'gyur// skye bo mang pos blta ba'i 'os
72b8(mdo): yin te/ dmyal ba'i dgra rtsa 'dod pa spong bar 'gyur// spyod pa rnam par gyod che 'dod pa sa// ngan skyugs 'ang ltar smad pa shes par 'gyur// tshangs spyod dge ba'i khyad par 'phags la spyod/ 
73a1(mdo): dad ma pon sems kyis rtag tu myod par 'gyur// banas pas mas las yang su de'o nas/ rag langs mun pas dpung ni 'byung bar 'gyur// de'i sras ni nazer na mngon 'dra zhing // cad ngan
73a2(mdo): drin ma dang kyang 'byung ga 'o// kyang sa rnam par khyod ci 'grol dang / ba dri rjon gti mug gnod kyi byed/ dman pa'i byed pa'i sems kyis dbugs byin rnyed// bag yod lha'i nangan rgyal zad 'brel/ 
73a3(mdo): gang tshe rgyal pa mya ngan 'das pa na// de ni gus pas de dag chos 'dzin 'gyur// myi dman dgal ba'i sems kyis sbyin pa byin/ bcom ldan 'das pa'i ring srel mchod// rgyas pa mchog gi bstan pa
73a4(mdo): 'jig tus che// rab tu dgal bas byas 'chos tshul 'dzind// des ni chos mchog 'dzes pa de pyad pas/ nod pas 'chi ba'i dus byed gzhan gyi 'gyur // gal te sems/ 
73a5(mdo): cang sems cad sangs rgyas shing // nyon mongs myed par gser mdog stobs su 'gyur// de dag bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'astong bya// rgyas pa mchog la mchod pa'i sngags brjod nus/ 
73a6(mdo): mag tan kun tu sdig thams sa sang bte// dgang pachimasas myos mchog gi mas byas zhing / rlabs me rdzo ma dan namigs pa byas nas/ 'jig nyid 'byabye rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'gyur/ 
73a7(mdo): nas pos chu ma 'phrun mangs te/ bcos na gcod rten rnamams bdun byed pa/ dem ma yod brjod kyis sems dang ning // dras nas ma rmongs sa don mnyan par gyis sa
73a8(mdo): mi byi pakyang rgya// dang byeng rgya cing blo brtan pag yo 'a byung / lung 'arnas mim spyod kyi kya na 'as// bye la yang po da/ ma ning mi du'ang// rgyam rim sa nas rgyas pa mchogs su 'gyur/ 
73b1(mdo): chen rab yakhas 'khor los sgyur 'gyur te/ gser gi mdog ldan mtshan gi ko ma can// 'jig rten kun na yid 'ong tri ldan 'thob// de la yid kyi bde dang sdug bsngal byed// spyad pa spyod ce longs spyod nyam sa
73b2(mdo): gyi 'gyur// phyug cing nor ldan mdzod ni rab tu mang // mya ngan myed gyur da 'jig rten kun tu rgyu// skye bo mang po lhags te de la 'dri// rgyal ba mchog gi bstand pa khyad 'phags chos// tshig rab brjod cing
73b3(mdo): the tsom sel par byed// chos thob yid bde slar yang smra bar byed// sdig pa'i las byed blo rgya che dang ldan// rgyal bas gsungs pa'i chos mchog khyad 'phags pa// dka' bar 'gyur ba rtag tu mkhas byas te/ 
73b4(mdo): byig kyang sbyor zhing mun pa ses par byed// 'dod chags kyi/ che zhe sdang che ma yin// mya 'jig rten gti mug che ma yin / de ni tshangs pyod dag la mchog 'di myod// phyi'i don ni dpag
73b5(mdo): tu byed par byed// bcom ldan mchod rten rnams la spes bdug na// de la gnod sems pa su yang byed// de ni rnams kyang lo sa gyod nyams su myi 'gyur// blta bar 'os dang nor chen ldan par
73b6(mdo): 'gyur// bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya rnams su// sems can rnam dag sdig pa rnam dag cing // zhi zhing rwa zhi zhi dus sngan gyu rad nas/ gye das na sems kyis byang chub mtshungs myed 'thob// sems can bye
73b7(mdo): ba khrag khrig brgya mtha' yas// mya ngan myed bde zhi ba mchog dkod cing // 'khor lo 'jigs byer 'jig rten kun bskor nas// phyi nas nyon mongs rgyas byed mya ngan 'das su zhig dka' mgur sems kyis gos
73b8(mdo): kyis ni// bcom ldan mchod rten rnams la mchod byed pa// de ni gos mdzes bye ba stong rnams dang // khrag khrig brgya bgrangs mtha' yas rtag tu rnyed// bcom ldan mchod rten gos kyis bkris byas na// de ni
74a1(mdo): btsam ma thag tu gos mchog 'thob// lha'i khyad 'phags dang gos rab bzang rnyed// btsas ma thag tu de lus shin tu bzang // gang zhig gos kyis bcom ldan mchod rten dang // 'dre nad pa mtshungs myed nas la/ 
74a2(mdo): mchod byed pa// de 'as mtshungs pa myed pa'i lus 'thob ste// suM bcu rtsa gnyis mtshan kyi me tog gis// bcom ldan mchog rten gos kyis bkris byas na// lag mthil nas ni mu tig 'phreng ba mdzes// sna tshogs
74a3(mdo): ngag dang seng ge'i 'phreng ba dang // gser skud rab mdzes bskal pa mtha' yas 'byung // bcom ldan mchod rten go kyis bkris byas na// lha 'am klu 'am myi 'am lto 'phye che// su yang de la ma dang skyed myi byed// rtag par tshangs
74a4(mdo): par spyod pa mchog 'dir byed// bcom ldan mchod rten gosas bkris byas na// steng gi 'jig rten gos kyis bkris byas na// stong gi 'jig rten khams kun zil gis gnon// 'jam gling gser gi
74a5(mdo): ser de zi'i mnan bzhin// skye dgu'i don ni dpag tu myed pa byed// gal te rin chen rab mchog snang bdun gyis// stong gi ni kun rab tu bkang ba'i// de 'dra'i dpal 'di zad par bya nus kyi/ 
74a6(mdo): rgyal ba'i mchod rten gos gcig phul ba'i byin// nor bu rin chen zla ba'i 'od rnams kyis// bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong zhing bka // de 'dra'i dpal 'di zad brtsa gyi nus// rgyal ba'i mchod rten gos cing phul pa byid
74a7(mdo): 'jig rten sangs rgyas 'gyur zhes mos bskyed de// bcom ldan ma chen/ gdugs ni phul byas na// de ni skye bo mang po'i mchod 'os 'gyur// byang chub kyad mchog dam pa zhi ba spyod// bcom ldan mchod rten pa dan
74a8(mdo): pus byas na// dag cig mchog rte gi lus ni thob 'gyur te// dper na gser ltar shin tu dag 'gyur zhing // lha'i sa bsngags la mchod cing bkur bar 'gyur// de'i lus ni gser gi mdog 'drang 'gyur// ras kyi
74b1(mdo): tu sngal dras #/ / seg nad pa mas ci byung // gan ga ga 'ad// 
74b2(mdo): na ma mabadasan// sa pan / sa dad / yin pas 'an 'as sa/ kyad pachog 'didi nga// kyi mag rten nam
74b3(mdo): reg pa pa byed par byed/ nadugs pa 'thob par 'gyung // dedas yo rten/ ma dpa rnamapa su
74b4(mdo): can su yang zag sa med// byam yang ba dag na pa de 'ang 'gyur// rnas gsas ma sa ca mardzogs rnam na thus// ra kyimags napapa rjed pa sa
74b5(mdo): rnamangs na 'ongasems chung rgya 'gyur dman pa'i sems gyi 'gyur// longs spyod rnyed nas 'ged cing bdag kyang spyod// den ya shes byed yid kyi bde ba byed// rgyam po dga' nas grong dang yus 'kho 'ad
75a1(mdo): de la sems can su yang sdig myi skyed// rtse po khyad par 'phags pa mdzad mang zhing // khyi bdag rin chen sna tshogs lus brgyan 'gyur// rgyal po'i bu 'am de bzhin blon po 'am// brgyal por gyur da na stobs
75a2(mdo): ldan rdzab myed// brnyas pa'i rigs dpon thams cad yongs su spong // longs spyod khyad 'phags rigs mchog rnyed nas ni// rtag tu bag yod sems myi 'gyur// 'dod pa rnams ni ngan spyugs khung ltar spong // khyad
75a3(mdo): ga phags dang mtshan rnams rab tu thob// kyang 'phags rigs dang de bzhin dbang phyug nyid// de'i g.yog 'khor rtag tu myi byed 'gyur// skye bo mang pos mdun du bdang bar 'ong // de ni gzhan la gnod pa'i sems myi skyed
75a4(mdo): sems ni rab dang rtag tu bag yod ldan// de la me dang dug dang mtshon myi tshugs/ skye bo tshogs chen gyis ni blta bar 'gyur/ rab tu dga' zhing thub pa'i chos la myod// shes bzhin ldan
75a5(mdo): nas yid bde skyed par byed// 'dzind pa myed cing chags myed sem sa dang ldan// chags byed gyur nas des kyi 'thun byed// de'i/ lus gtsang kun nas nyon mongs myed// rnam dag sems ldan// 
75a6(mdo): de ni bden par smra// 'jigs pas nyen pa rnams la yid bde skyed// sems cad rnams kyi skyabs dbang dbung gnyen 'gyur// de ni bdag myed don rgya chen byas nas su// gzhan yang sengs rgyas ye shes rdzogs
75a7(mdo): la 'god// shang dbang shing mchog dam pa drung song nas// mtshungs pa myed mchog ni byang chub 'tshang yang rgya// sangs rgyas mchod rten mar me phul byas na// 'di nas bzung ste srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar// 
75a8(mdo): sangs rgyas zhing ni 'jam gling gser gis gang // de 'dra'i dpal de zad par yor gyi rgyas/ bcom ldan mchod rten mar me phul byas na// de'i lus ni mdog ngan yod kyi 'gyur// gzugs mchog sra ni
75b1(mdo): lag bzung ba 'dra// snang ba thob nas 'jig rten kun tu rgyu// kal te rgyal pa dam pa byung gyur na// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang nye bar 'gyur// nye dung 'gyur mar yang na bur yang 'gyur// de'i ye shes
75b2(mdo): phung po myur du 'thob// gal te khrag khrig brgya stong sangs rgyas zhing // yongs 'bru dag gis byur bur gang gyurd pa/ 9/ bgrang par dang ni gzhal zhing bzod par nus// bde gshegs mar me gcig phul de'is ni
75b3(mdo): sangs rgyas dam pa sbyin pa'i gnas de la// spyod pa mchod spyad khyad par shes gyur pa// myi mchog 'di sa mchod pa 'dis byas pa// rnam par sbyin pa dam pa gzhal yas 'gyur// gal te myi mched 'jig rten
75b4(mdo): khams 'di na/ nor bu rin chen bai dUr+ya si gang pa// zad par bya// nus sangs rgyas mchod la// mar me gcig phul dpal de zad myi/ 'gyur// kar sha pa nas myi mched 'jig rten khams// 'di
75b5(mdo): nas srid pa'i rtse mo bar gang pa// zad par bya nus sangs rgyas mchod rten la// mar me gcig phul dpal de zad myi 'gyur// sa sa rgyas zhing stong de dag tsan dam gyis// 'og nas srid pa'i rtse ma
75b6(mdo): bar gang ba// zang par bya nus sangs rgyas mchod rten la// mar me cig phul dpal de zad gyi 'byung // tshangs pa'i 'jig rten yod pa'i sku gnas kyi// gos kyis sangs rgyas zhing stong gang gyur pa/ 
75b7(mdo): nod par bya rus sangs rgyas mchod tus// mar me gcig phul dpal de zad myi 'gyur// ku dang swa myan myi dang lto 'phye che// swa'i spa rdzags nor rin tshogs// zad par bya nus sangs rgyas mchod rten la// ma8
75b8(mdo): gcig phus dpas de zad kyi nus// swa'i 'jig rten yod pa'i sa'i sbom// de dag myi mched 'di kun gang rgyu rang ba// zas bya nus sangs rgyas mchod rten la// mar me gcig phul dpal de zad gyi 'gyur/ 
76a1(mdo): phyogs dang phyogs 'tshams cad ni shes par dus// gnas pa la'i khams 'di yin kyang shes par nus// sangs rgyas mchod ted ma me ga cin bum pa'i// de 'dra'i danas de 'ang bar bya gyi nus// ngas/ 
76a2(mdo): rgyas dab pa phyi mchog bzhud pa'i che// 'dren pa'i mtshungs pa skyed pa dang / byas te// bston pa'i sku la nyi zer gyi 'bal pang // me tog ma li ka gdug bcom ldan phul // de nasu mdzes dmapa gus byas pas/ 
76a3(mdo): lha dbang brgya byin du ni len 'bus kyur/ 'jig rten kun tu tshangs pa'i bdag por 'gyur// rgyal po'i mchod rten la di 'bum phul nas// 'khor los sbyar ba'i rgyal po stobs ldan 'gyur// / stong phrag bcu la
76a4(mdo): dbang par 'gyuras te// nor chen rab tu mdzod mang tshong dpon gyur/ nga// khyim bdag blo ldam bsod nams ldan par 'gyur// bdegadashegs kyi mcho bye ba nyi shu ngan// ngas ni mnyes byas gams
76a5(mdo): na 'thal mas// myo ma chog dag bla mar sti stang byas// de dag su gsag khang la sadzes kyis bslus pa'i khadon ngan pa kun byed gyur/ ngas ni tsa dang grang dang ngas pa spangs// sangs rgyas spyan pa
76a6(mdo): dman byed sems gyur ba cing // de dag mchod pa dam pa mchog gis mchod// rgyand kyis brgyan pa'i gdugs mdzes blta sug gsu dag bcom ldan mchod rten 'bus byed pa// de 'di sum ni mtshungs pa byed par 'gyur te/ 
76a7(mdo): sum bcu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyi go char 'gyur// gang gis rgyal pa'i spu ni rab 'bar zhing / khyad par 'phags pa'i gzugs dang / ser 'dra dang / 'jas gling gser ltar rab 'dzes bstan sug/ mtshad gi me tog rgyas pa
76a8(mdo): mngon du gang // mngon par shes pa 'thob cing dbang cher grags// byang chub 'apyod mchog dpal zhi pa byed// de ni rnams kyang longs khyod bkrob myi 'gyur// lus kyang sti stang bya zhing mchod par 'os// bstan pa
76b1(mdo): 'dod pa'i longs spyod gzhar myi dga'// tshul khrims rnam dag rab mkhas tshangs par spyod// yi dam bcas nas nams dang / nags 'dab song // mngon par shes 'thob cing khyad par 'thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan mchod rte nang
76b2(mdo): rnams la gdug 'bul pa/ ji ltar bur yang byang chub sems kyi 'dor// byams la gnas shing phyi lan seMs su 'gyur/ de'i shes pa rnams kyang nyams pa myed// rol mo'i sgra yis kyi mchog mchod byas nas// phyi'i 'dzag
76b3(mdo): bya ngang myed cing dbang ldan rgyal por 'ong // myi'i 'jig rten yid 'od sgra ldan 'gyur// de spa yan lag chan dag par 'ong // bcom ldan mchod rten rol mo'i sgra byas na/ shes bzhin ldan zhing myig ni rnam dag 'gyur/ 
76b4(mdo): na larnam par dag cing sems kyang dka'// sA'i dbang po mchod dang ldan par 'gyur// de'i sde la ni rab 'dzes bstan sdug/ thog mar nams ldan mad ra ma la skyes shing sgra yid ldan/ dper nang su'i dzin chen be ru 'dra/ 
76b5(mdo): bla zang yin sad bye ba dpag byed 'byid// bcom ldan patho rje'i rten romad so sgra byas // phyas du myi 'byung sde byed kyi 'gyur te/ zham 'astsar po ya o can gyi 'gyur/ lus ni khyad par 'phags
76b6(mdo): gan tu mnges// bcom ldan 'asum ma dzin rol yos sgo byas na// sA 'as bya lam gyi ma sko bye che/ su yang de la pa dang byin gyi 'gyur// dbugs byin thos nas 'jig rten kun tu smra/ bcom ldan mchod kyi/ 
76b7(mdo): rol po sgra byas na// de ni ma ning ba ma zhar gyi 'gyur // nams kyang mdzel dang sha bkrang gyi 'gyur zhing / bsngags par 'os pa'i lus ni thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan mchod rten rol mo'i sA byas na// tshe ring
76b8(mdo): 'byung zhing sum gyi che bar 'byung // dper gyi gzugs snya ma dog 'phang bar 'og// ting ladzi nad brtan zhing ga na tu rtog par 'gyur// bcom ldan mdze ngos po'i sgra byas na// swA dang bdag por 'gyu ni
77a1(mdo): dbang phyug 'gyur// TI 'jig rten skyes nas dgal bar 'ong // brtson 'grus ldan zhing sus ni 'bar par 'gyur// bcom ldan mchod rten ros po'i sgra byas na// des su yang yid kyi bde gyi skyed/ 
77a2(mdo): de la u yod tshig phrul smra ba byed// phra ma thams cad spangs shing yang dag sma// bsod nams 'dod pa su zhig phyags thogs te// bcom ldan mchod rte na gus par phyag byed pa// de ni sprad cing kyi rtsang lus kyi 'gyur
77a3(mdo): ba cu khung nas can dang dri dad 'byung // bcom ldan mya ngan 'das pa'i mchod phyugs// bskas pa bye ba khrag zhag brgya stong du/ yan lags pad kyad 'phanas sum 'thob cing // mdzes sa mtshan gyis go char
77a4(mdo): byas par 'gyur// bcom ldan mya ngan 'das pa'i mchod rten phyags// lha'i tsan dan khyad 'phags rab mdzes pa'i// gzhan myed khang mchog yid 'ong dri ldan 'thob// de ni de la gzhar
77a5(mdo): yang sred myed skyed// bcom ldan 'amya ngan 'das pa'i mchod rten phyags// yid 'ong du sngon mchod du blta sug pa// sA'ibu mo bye ba stong 'thob cing // de ni de la rnams kyang chags
77a6(mdo): kyi skyed// bcom ldan mya ngan 'das pa'i mchod rten phyags/ bskyed mos tshal mchog yod pa'i rdzing bu ni// yan lag brgyad ldan chu rdzang mdzes gyurd pa// me tog ud pa las ni rgyas pa tho'o// bcom ldan
77a7(mdo): mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten phyags// de'i g.yog 'khor rtag tu 'thob 'gyur zhing // myi dman sems can lA'i sgra yang thos// spra mo rnams kyi klu dbyangs snyan sgra thos// bcom ldan mya
77a8(mdo): ngad 'das pa'i mchod rten phyags// 'jig rted kun tu skyes che bdag nyid kyis/ 'di nas shi 'phos ngad 'grong gyi 'phyer zhing // mya'i 'jig rten sangs rgyas mthong bar shes/ bcom ldan 'das
77b1(mdo): kyangarnas pa 'das pa'i mchod cen phyags/ de ni mas pasla nga pa'i gtas byas te/ sangs rgyas le she sa rdzogs sa su bkod nas// shi ba'i rjes byas 'das bu'i grong tu sh+ye
77b2(mdo): mya ngan 'das pa'i mchod rten phyogs/ bcas ma lag tu bzhas pa mthal mas d+hAd// sngon gyi sangs rgyas tshe rnams bsgyur pa dang // de dag pa can dang yon tan chos kyang dran// 'jig ched pa
77b3(mdo): rgyas ji ltar 'gyur zhes te/ mos pa bskyed nas mje sa skyes sespa // de'i phar yod de dag ras bshad kyis/ za ba'i dri sol dang mam sems kyis nyen du mu chen skyes bu ngas pa kyang 'phags pa// rgyas
77b4(mdo): pa ngas pa ma 'ongs dus na mthong // de dag mchod pa dam pa ma/ chog gis mchod// de ni gzhal smras dad pa dam pa 'thob// / sangs rgyas stonas bcu ded dpon des mthong nas// 'dren pa
77b5(mdo): mtshungs pa bgyid pa la mchod byed// mtshan da kyis go char bya sa pa'i sangs rgyas su// / 'gyur zhes thugs dgyes de dag la ya nga stond// grong khyer yangs pa nyams dka' mchog gnas
77b6(mdo): shing / nga ni chos ston gang gis mthong gyur pa// de dag phyi dus rab tu 'jigs pa'i che/ rgyas mchog kya ngan las 'das pa'i chos 'dzin 'gyur/ mchod rten du skyes semed par byed pa ni// rgyas
77b7(mdo): pa ram pa kyi rdul mthong 'dod pa'i// sgyu dang sa bon 'gyur ba 'di yin no// 'dod dang myal rang dud 'gro'i skye gnas spong // byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig mdo mchog 'di// phyi ma rab 'jig byas na 'dzind/ 
77b8(mdo): byed pa// de ni 'jig rten sangs rgyas lha'i sA la// bsod nams kyang 'phags mtshungs myed nyid du 'gyur// 'di bshad tshen gad 'dir mchod pa// rgyas 'di bshad pa gang dag thos pa dang // gang dag
78a1(mdo): mdo mchog 'di ni 'dir bzung ba// de dag phyi ma'i dus na 'dir myi 'jigs// gang dag phyin can mdo mtsho'i 'dzi nad pa// de dag rtag tu nga dang mthun pa'i sras// sangs rgyas bye bas de dag 'asngags brjod kyang
78a2(mdo): de dag bsngags pa mtha' ni phyin gyi 'gyur// gang dag phyi rgyas rgyal ba'i chos 'dzin pa// sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig rgya mtha' yas/ bskasad pa bye bar bzhugs te de dag gi// bsngags pa brjod kyang tha mar phyin gyi chus
78a3(mdo): dri zhim ying 'ong spos kyi cho ga bzhin// sangs rgyas mchog rten sa ni skud pa// de la 'thob rnyed 'jig rten kun tu d+hu de ni sa 'dir snying po blangs par 'gyur// rgyal ba'i mchod rten spos byug pus byas na// bcom ldan
78a4(mdo): 'das kyis bstan pa 'jig 'gyur che// 'jam bu srid du skye bar myi 'gyur zhing // de ni de che mtho ris bdag por 'gyur// rgyas pa'i mchod rte nad spos byug pus byas na// trid myi zhim dang myi rtsang smad
78a5(mdo): pa rnams// / rtag tu spong sar zhing tshul khrims por gnas// de ni rtag tu tshangs spyod mchog 'di myod // rgyal ba'i mchod rten spos phyag yul byas na// 'di nas shi 'phos mtho ris lha dang
78a6(mdo): 'gyur// ring por phyi thogs de ni stobs rnams rtog/ sma rnams la ni rgya chen don kyang byed// rgyas pa'i mchod rten spos phus byas na// gang gi chen gyi'i 'jig rten na// zhe sdang sems myed 'jam zhing mnyen
78a7(mdo): 'gyur ba// de tshe de na 'dzam bu'i glo r+ya gnas// rgyal po'i mchod rten spos phul byas na ya// khyad 'phags tshig ldan sgra dbyangs yid 'ong 'gyur// skye bo mang po'i yid 'od dka' zhing bkur// de'i kha bzhin rtag
78a8(mdo): gsal bar 'gyur// rgyas pa'i mchod rten spob byug pus byas na// de ni ngam song rnams ma lus spong // de bzhin gshegs dang nye bar thob par 'gyur// dad pa thob cing rtag tu bde la dga'// rgyal ba'i mchod
78b1(mdo): spos byug phul byas na/ rgyal po stobs ldan 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur// blon po tshong dpon khyim bdag bsod nams ldan// chos rje 'od mdzad sangs rgyas su 'gyur// dka' ba'i sems kyis mgu pa'i shugs bskyed de
78b2(mdo): bcom ldan mchod rten nor bu'i dra ba 'bul// de ni rgyal po mtshan gyi go cha nang// mthu chen bla mar khor los sgyur bar 'gyur// blta 'os mtshan gyi ko cha ldan gyur na// gzhal myed khang chen rab mdzes blta stug sa// kha dog sna
78b3(mdo): tshogs dpag myed ldan dang // rin chen khang bzangs che 'os dag pa 'thob// rgyal po'i pho brang khyad par 'phags rgya rad pa// skyes pa bud myed dag gis gang ba dang // mnyam zhing legs byas rab mdzes blta sdug pa// tra ba
78b4(mdo): sna tshogs bde byed bde 'jug 'thob// rgyal mtshan pa dad gsal// par mdzes byas shing // gtugs bres shin tu mdzes lta bltan stug/ mu tika dra ba 'phreng ba de 'dra ba'i// rgyal srid
78b5(mdo): yon tan kyang 'phags gzhan yang 'thob// de'i yu 'drag zhan nom 'jigs byed pa// chos chun g.yo ldan g.yon can gnas kyi 'gyur// sems can rgya chen blo mchog ldan praH/ ban byed
78b6(mdo): byams ldan pa de de na gnas/ shi 'phos bag yod de ni lhar 'gro ste// dkar gnas gang yin bdag dzA ster gnas// 'di nas shi 'phos ji ltar myur skye zhes// blo ldan de ni mtho ris 'di gnas
78b7(mdo): 'byung // sangs rgyas spyon gnas byang du mthong 'gyur te// mthong nas mchod cing mtshungs byed sto ltar byed// sangs rgyas mthong nas byang chub pos skyed cing // rus bral rnams la phyir zhing sti steng byed// ye shes
78b8(mdo): mtha' yas sngan dang 'thu chen 'argyang / khyad lde 'phags pa'i sems can 'byung // bcom ldan 'das la dad pa'i sems bskyed na// 'di 'dra'i dpas 'di phyir zhing myong bar 'gyur// nga'i bya sa 'di ni 'dzod
79a1(mdo): par bya// ngas brjod 'di sa the tsom ma skyed cing // sangs rgyas bka' spangs man myed 'phro gyur cing / byin ci sdug bsngas nyen par gyu rod ta re/ 'jig rten skyon ma mtshungs byed bsod nams
79a2(mdo): zhis/ de mchod rtend pa rgya lus dral pa/ bag yod pa nas de ni bdud rgya 'dras// dus nu skyes kyan tu ngan song yang spong // rtag tu sangs rgyas rdul bral sti ltung byed/ rtag tu stobs ldan 'khor so pa myur
79a3(mdo): par 'gyur// phyi'i 'jig rten skyes na bsod nams ldan// rgyal po kun gyi mchod pa'i gnas su 'gyur// snga nas sla'i dbang po mchog gnas 'gyur// de ni nin tu sa'i tshe yang 'jod// dpas sngon ni zer
79a4(mdo): ki gzhas byed khang ba rnyed// sA'i 'dod pa ma myangs pa byed dbang phyag nyid// gzugs dang sgra dang tri ba re mchog dang // reg bya dpas swan su'i 'jig rtend 'thob// mthu chen ston zhing blta ba'i/ 
79a5(mdo): 'os su 'gyur// snga mo rnams la 'dod pa'i sred kyi skyed/ bcom ldan mchod rten pa rgya bsas byas na/ 'di nas n-i 'phos kyi 'jig rten 'gro// yan sa na segs gnas khyang
79a6(mdo): par 'gro bar 'gyur// nam yang bstan chos kyi nyung mang po 'thob// bcom ldan mchod rten pa rgya bsal byas na// de ni phyi 'o ba brgyad po kun spong zhing // de ni ngas 'gyur de bzhin khyad par 'iphags
79a7(mdo): de ni sangs rgyas mtshungs byed mchod pa byed// bcom ldan mchod rten pa rgyabasal byas na// bag yod blo gros brgyan la dpa' bor 'gyur 'od 'gyur// 'dod pa'i yon tan ya dgal dgal gyi skyeng // myi ngasas
79a8(mdo): sems kyis mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan mchod rten pa rgya bsas kyas na// de ni rnams kyang byang chub sems kyi 'dong // rgyam rnabs spyod kyang gnid tu bsdams par 'gyur// rnam dag 'ad
79b1(mdo): chags bral ba'i chos kyang 'thob / oM bcom ldan mchod rten pargyabs sa byas na// de ni ma dog dadu rnams kun du spong // 'chal pa'i shes rab ma sus rnam par spong // shes rab rgya chen gyu rang nas bapyod pa la gdas/ 
79b2(mdo): bcom ldan 'as rje pa rgya 'ams byas nas// kha mas chang sa dag kyang rnyed 'gyungs// gyad 'phags kha dog ldan zhing blta sug la// reg dang sman zhing rab mdzes blo rnams 'thob/ rang ba'i thugs skyes bcom ldan
79b3(mdo): mchod rten la// me tog skam mo nyas nyiyi phyag byas na// 'dod pa spad pa sdug bsngal bye ba spong // stobs bcu mda' ba'i ded dpon mnyes par byed// mchod rten n+do d+his pa su 'phyag ya// de ni mdzes shing rnam dang/ 
79b4(mdo): lus su 'gyur// skye bo mang pos mchod 'os par 'gyur// de la rgyal po gnod par sems kyi 'gyur// bcom ldan mchod rte/ dedag la lnga rabs kyis// me tog zhus pa bskam po phyog byas
79b5(mdo): ni/ ngan spos yi sas ngan thams cad gcod// byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims phung por gnas// mchod rten me tog sa pa su'i phyag pa// bag yod mya ngan rnams dang skyon rnams spong // 
79b6(mdo): nad rnams rnams sus rnam par spong // bskas pa mtha' yas rnams su dbugs byin 'jo// mchod rten me tog rnyis pa su 'phyag pa// basbyin gnas mtshungs byed sangs rgyas 'thob par 'ong // mtshungs byed
79b7(mdo): 'thob cing spa'i myis mchod 'os 'gyur// lha'i me tog rab mdzes tsaman dang / mtshungs myed pa ta la yang su 'bul dang // mchod rten me tog nyal/ la su 'phyag pa// de dag rnam spyan 'dra ste mchog tu gyuras
79b8(mdo): mchod rten me tog rnyis pa su 'phyag la// de la drug gis kyi tshugs mtshon gyi tshugs// me 'bar 'od 'gro phung po ches myi tshugs// nor gi phung po rkun po brgya myi 'gyur/ mgu zhing rab tu dga' ba'i
80a1(mdo): shugs bskyed de// bcom ldan mchod rtend me tog skam 'phyag na// de ni bsod nams bzung bar gar gyu rad pa// grangs sam cha ya brjod par sla ma yin// mchod rten me tog rnyis pa su 'phyag pa/ 
80a2(mdo): sum bcu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyis go char 'gyung // kyi'i 'jig rtend ni rtag tu dga'// mthu dang ldan zhing yid 'ong sgra skad 'byung // mthu dang ldan zhing yid 'ong sgra skad 'byung // mchod rten me tog rnyis pa su 'phyag pa/ 
80a3(mdo): chos mchog rab mdzes yang dag bskyod rnying // de lus rnam par dag la chen po 'ong // ring por gyi thogs 'jig rten sangs rgyas 'gyur// 'jig rten sangs rgyas 'gyur byar pos bskyed de// stond pa'i mchod rten thas
80a4(mdo): spyang phyag 'tshal ba// 'jig rten dag na bla mar bkur sti/ byas// de ni mdzes shing bstan sug par 'gyur// de 'dir rgyal/ srid thob nas lha klu gyi// lto 'phye che dang 'jig rten thams cad
80a5(mdo): 'dud// stong gi 'jig rten khams kun rgyas par 'gyur// dbang phyag nyid du dbang thob rgyas srid byed// de'i yul na sems can gang gnas pa// de kun sangs rgyas ye shes rdzogs la bkod
80a6(mdo): des ni ngan song sa yang rnam par spong // de dag rnas kyi don mchog dam pa byed// bsod nams blo gros dran ldan mchod 'os 'gyur// dbugs phyin thol nas 'jig rten kun tu rgyu// de'i g.yog 'khor yid 'ong sgra skad
80a7(mdo): ldan// bsam pa ji bzhin de dag dka' ba skyed de// sems can rnams la myi lhod zhi tshig stond// de la su yang dbang phyug myed kyi byed// skye bo tshogs chen dag gis blta 'os 'gyur// de yi g.yog kyang sgra dbyangs
80a8(mdo): yan lag dge/ sangs rgyas mchod rten zas sbyar phyag 'tshal pa// sbyin dang snyan par sla dang don bapyod dang // don mthun pa da skye bo sangs byed// spyos shing brgyad kyang khro ba'i dngos phyi skyed// sangs rgyas man
80b1(mdo): rten thal sbyar 'tshal ba// mtho ris 'jig rtend gnas shing lha dbang 'gyur// mying gyur da na yang myi'i rgyal por 'ong // de ni gzhar yang yongs su nyams myi 'gyur// sangs rgyas mchod rten thal sbyar phyag 'tshal ba/ 
80b2(mdo): de ni gnar yang ngan song phyim gyi srung // 'jig rten 'dir de rtag tu 'dod pa 'ang// nor can dang na phyag cing mdzod pang 'gyur// yon tan ldan la cig cig su smra ba// de ni phyi rigs bsngags la gnang gyi spyod// rdzong
80b3(mdo): 'jig rten gnas sbyin 'apyod kyi 'gyur// de la sems can mya ngoms dka' bar 'gyur// yid 'ong dbyangs ldan po brang 'khor gshegs shing // 'jig rten 'gon po sgo gtad bzhugs pa'i tshe/ su zhig zhugs bskyed me rton
80b4(mdo): blangs te gtor da// de ni brgyad nas rgyal ba dam pa mthong // rang gi khyim du stobs bcu bsnyen bkur byed// de'i bshos gsol chos bzang stand pa mdzad// dad pa skyes nas mchog bsnyend bkur byed// gos
80b5(mdo): kyang thogs te rnam par 'dren lam 'phul// sangs rgyas byang chub mtshungs myed mchog thob nas/ stobs bcu sngan zhing g.yo ba myed 'gyur sas byang chub sangs rgyas sdug bsngal skye bo 'grom
80b6(mdo): 'jig rten kun tu mtshungs myed sangs rgyas shog/ de'i smon lam 'di 'dra 'di dang ni// sangs rgyas ye shes de sems dga' mkhyend nas/ stobs bcu mdzum sa mdzad 'jig rten thams cad du// mtshungs
80b7(mdo): byed sangs rgyas 'gyur nas sungs ston to// skyes bu dam pa mchog gi gsung thos nas// bde gshegs mchod gsung gzhan du gyi 'gyur te// bdag ni rgyas pa mchog 'gyung dogs byed ces/ dga' ningasagu nas 'am
80b8(mdo): sngang kun tu rgyu// 'jig rten spa'i skar byu nga sangs rgyas su// khyad 'phags mtshungs kyi spyan gnas 'gyur ba dang // de sems dpyod dang dga' bar gnas mkhyend nas// des stobs brgya mngal bas zhes par gyur
81a1(mdo): bde gshegs mchog gis gos ni bzhes rig nas/ de na shugs skyes rab dga' sems mgu ste/ mtshungs myed 'jig rten mgon la blta ba nas// 'jig rten sangs rgyas bdag 'gyur mos pa skyes// skye shi
81a2(mdo): rol sems can bsgral par byas// gros das skye bo mang po 'dus byas dgrol// 'jig rten kun ni long ba'i myig bdag 'gyur // snang ba thob nas mun pa rab rib sel de ltas phan yon dam pa 'di thob nas// me tog/ 
81a3(mdo): phrer ba rgyas mtshan gos mchog dang / ros mo smra dang gdugs dang phyag btugs kyi// mgon po mchogs sangs rgyas 'byung bar gyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' sus das nas// dge slong / 
81a4(mdo): de dag dang // blo gros rnam yar dag pas sas rdzogs pa// byang chub sems dpal de dag dang lha dang myi dang snga ma yin dang // dri zing bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te// bcom ldan
81a5(mdo): 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / 'phags pa spyan ras gzig/ sa shes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// rdzogs spro
81a6(mdo): rgya kar gyi mkhan po 'dzin na mya tre dang / da na shaM sa dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur da cing zhus te/ skadagasar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/ 
81a7(mdo): h+ya kar skad du/ ar+ya a wA ya ma ti no de shA na ma ma hA yA na su tra/ 'di skad du/ 'phags pa blo gros myi zad pas bstand pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chuH
81a8(mdo): sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i rgyas gcig na// bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khaban// de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul// rin po che bkod pa'i 'khor gyi khyams/ 
81b1(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gnas/ bsod nams chen po'i rkyen kyi tshogs bsags pa// spyod pa chen po'i rgyu mthun pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos rnams par sbyin pas mngon par grub pa// byang chub sems dpa' sa
81b2(mdo): chen po'i gnas// chos kyi dbyings mtha' yas par bstand pa// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par sprul pa'i byi nad kyis rlabs/ chags pa myed pa'i pyod yul gyi ye shes la 'jug pa// dka' ba chen po yang dag par skyed
81b3(mdo): pa/ dran pa dang / blo gros dang / rtogs pa la 'jug pa/ kun nas ma smad pa/ ye shes kyis rnam par dpyod pa de la ma chags pa'i rtogs pa la 'jug pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i skald par mngon par bstod pa// yon tan thams
81b4(mdo): cad kyi tshogs dpag tu myed pa na bzhugs te// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid ni/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/ chos kyi 'khor lo ni rab bskor/ blo ba ma sha nid tu rus pa @#
81b5(mdo): yas pa'i tshogs ni ma dze zhi de/ chos sems cad thams cad kyi bas/ pa'i tshul ni shi nod tu mkhyend// dbang po dam pa'i mchog ni brnyes/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyi mtshams
81b6(mdo): sbyor pa legs par 'joms pa la ni mkhas// sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa snyun kyis grub pa ni rgyun ma bcad cing // dge slong brgya stong phrag drug bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig ste// thams cad kyang
81b7(mdo): cang shes pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shi nad tu rnam par grol ba// nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyi mtshams spyor thams cad legs par mjongs pa la brtson pa// de bzhin gshegs pa 'i
81b8(mdo): chos kyi rgyal po'i sras// sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo la gnas par mkhas// dmyigs pa myed pa'i chos las nges par byung ba pyod lam mdzes pa phun sum tshogs pa// sbyid pa'i gnas chen por gyur pa
82a1(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa'i bkal la zhugs pa sha stag go// byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang yang thabs cig ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs nas 'dus pa grangs myed chad myed dpag tu myed bsam gyis kyi
82a2(mdo): khyab/ mtshungs pa myed/ dpe byed/ gzhal du myed/ bskyed du byed/ brjod du byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang thabs cig ste/ sems kyi skad cig la sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas brtsal gyis gnod
82a3(mdo): ci 'ong ba dang / la grol la mkhas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod cing rim 'gro byed par 'byung ba la// sangs rgyas kyi chos mnyan pa dang / yongs su tshol bas kyi ngoms pa rtag tu rgyun gyi ched par sems can thams
82a4(mdo): cad yongs su sbyin par bya ba la brtson pa// thabs dang shes rab dang / pa'i/ mchog thob pa/ slob pa myed pa'i rnam par thard pa dang / ye shes la rab tu gnas pa/ rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / 
82a5(mdo): smos pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ thams cad mkhyen/ pa nyid kyi sa la nye pur gyur dpag stag sa/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' glog pa/ lha zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'
82a6(mdo): g.yul las rnam par rgyas pa dang / byang chub sems dpal rnam par snang ba'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtsal kyis dpal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' yod gnyis shi nad tu 'joms pa dang / byang chub ses
82a7(mdo): dpal sAH rnam par bsgrags pa dang / byang chub sems dpal rnam par lta ba'i byig dang / byang chub sems dpa' mun pa dang / bral ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / 'jam dpal sa rdzogs pa
82a8(mdo): byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po grangs byed/ dpag tu byed/ bskyed du byed/ bsam kyis kyi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa byed/ dpe byed/ gzhal du byed/ chad byed/ brjod du byed pa'i yang brjos tu
82b1(mdo): dri bzhin gshegs pa'i bkal la bzhugs pa sha stag go// byang chub sems dpa' dge 'dun chen po dang yang thabs cig ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs nas 'dus pa grangs myed tshad myed/ dpag tu myed bsam gyis myi
82b2(mdo): kyi khyab/ mtshungs pa myed/ dpe byed/ gzhas du byed/ brgyad du byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang thams cig ste/ sems kyi skad cig le sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas brtsal kyi sa gnan/ 
82b3(mdo): cing / 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba la mkhas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod cing rim 'gro byed par 'gyur ba sa// sangs rgyas kyi chos mnyan pa dang // yongs su tshor pos kyi ngoms pa rtag tu rgyan gyi chad par sems/ 
82b4(mdo): can thams cad yongs su sbyin par byin pa la brtson pa// thabs dang / shes rab dpa pa'i/ mchog thob pa// sgrib pa myed rnam par tha rad pa dang // ye shes pa rab tu gnas pa// rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog
82b5(mdo): dang // spros pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ thams/ cad mkhye nad pa nyid kyis sa nye bar 'gyurd pa sha stag la/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' glog gi swa zhes bya ba dang / byang chub
82b6(mdo): sems dpa' gsus sas rnam par rgyas pa dang // byang chub sems dab larnam par snang ba'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' zas kyis dpal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' yid gnyis ni nang tu 'jobs
82b7(mdo): pa dang // byang chub sems dpal sgra rnam par bsgrags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam par lta ba'i phyig dang / byang chub sems dpa' thun pa dang bral ba dang / byang chub sems dpal byams pa dang / 'jam dpal
82b8(mdo): papa/ sa ses pa'i sems pa chen po rlangs byed dpag tu byed babyang sa byeng / sa / rgyas pa cang / byed/ gnas du thong / da byed / 'jod pa med pa'i mang brje dun
83a1(mdo): mi yang brjod du skyed bu dag dang / thabs cig go// menas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i pyod pas 'jug pa dang / nges par 'byung ba sgrib pa byed pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i chos kyirnam grangs
83a2(mdo): byang chub sems dpa'i srog/ bkod pa su da phyogs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi zab so thams cad dang / stobs brgya dang / gyi 'jigs pa yongs su 'grub pa'i/ ye shes kyi byung gnas/ chos thams cad ma byed pa'i rgyas
83a3(mdo): dang / gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i sgor 'drug pa/ so so yang dag par rig pa shinang tu rnam par nges pa sa gzung ba'i sgor 'jug pa/ mngon par shes pa chen po'i ye shes sa gzud ba'i sgong 'dun pa// phyir gyi ldog pa'i chos
83a4(mdo): kyi 'khor so// myi skye zhing gyi ldogo pa'i chos rab tu ston pa/ bgrod pa'i cig pa'i lam du yang dag par gzhos pa/ me Ta thams cad theg pa gcig tu brgyangs pa nyid ma yang dag par gnas pa/ tshul
83a5(mdo): gcig pa'i chos kyi dbyings dbyer myed la 'jug pa/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang / dbang po la bzung ba bstand pa/ snying po'i rjes su song ba'i chos rnam par nges pa bdud kyi 'khor
83a6(mdo): thams cad shinang tu rnam par 'jo ba byed pa// tshul bzhin gyi chos sa gzud pa'i sgor 'jug pa/ nyon mongs pa dang / sba bar gyu ngad pa thams cad 'dul pa/ chags pa byed pa'i shes rab dang / ye shes kyi rjes su
83a7(mdo): 'jug pa/ mtha' yas shing mtshungs pa myed pa'i bsngo ba las mkhas pa'i thabs kyi ye shes bstand pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi rjes su 'jug pa/ thogs myed pa'i ye shes
83a8(mdo): kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi sgod 'jug pa/ chos thams cad ji ltal bzhin tu gning tu gtad sa phab par 'aldan dang/ kyi rtog pardzi bar gyi rtog pa'i mnyam pa nyidas 'jug pa// rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab mo khong / 
83b1(mdo): chud pa/ bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs chen po thams cad brtsegs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sku dang / gsung dang thugs kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi rgyan gyi rjes su song ba/ drad pa dang / blo gros dang / rtogs pa dang / mos pa dang
83b2(mdo): shes rab myi zad pa mngon par sgrub pa/ nyan thos kyi theg pas gdul ba'i phyir 'phags pa'i bden pa'i tshus 'jug pa// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas gdul ba'i phyir/ lus dang sems rab tu dben pa shes pa/ theg pa
83b3(mdo): chen pos gtus pa'i phyir/ thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes kyi ser dbang bskur ba thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan brjod pa'i phyir chos thams cad la dbang byed pa'i tshul la 'jug pa gsung ngo // ston to// rab tu ston
83b4(mdo): to// mos par mdzad do// 'dzind du 'jug go// klog tu 'jugago/ shes rab mdzad do/ rnam par rig par mdzad do// rab tu shes par mdzad do/ 'jug par mdzad do/ 'grel to// rna
83b5(mdo): par 'byed do// gsal bar mdzad do// yang dag pAr tu ston to// bde nas bcom ldan 'das de lta bu gnid tu rnam par nges pa'i don/ 'dus pa chen po'i le'u chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rgya cher
83b6(mdo): yang dag par rab tu stond pa na shar phyogs logs nas gser gi 'od chen po snang bar gyurd to// gser gi 'od snang ba des rin po bkod pa'i 'khor gyi khyams thabs cad dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
83b7(mdo): 'di yang gsed kyi 'od chen po des snga bor gyu rang to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od dang // byang chub sems dpal dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams kyi 'od ma gtogs par// gang gzhan stong gsum gi steng chen po'i 'jig
83b8(mdo): rten gi 'ams 'di kyi b+h+yo dang / rna ba mi 'od dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten stong pa rnams kyi 'od dang / sku dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / drin dang / sa ma yin dang / nam mkha' ldi dang / 
84a1(mdo): myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen blo rnams kyi 'od dang / me dang nor dang / rin po che dang / klog dang / skar ma rnams kyi 'od de dag thams cad men men bor byas te/ bsid kyis nod cing phyogasas par gyurd to// gang stong gsum
84a2(mdo): phyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten kau khams 'di la 'jig rten gyi bar na bsags pa'i gzugs su byugyurd pa dang / mun nag ki snang bas nyi ma dang / zla ba 'di snyed rdzu 'phrul che ba dang / 'di ltar mthu che ba 'di ltar dbang che bas kyang lam ma
84a3(mdo): snyan ne skang der ma gyudad pa de dag kyang / 'od des sal ler gyur to// 'od de mA dang / shing byel pa dang / sman dang / nags tshas rnams sgrib par gyi byed do// ri nag po rnams ma yin gsad kyi ri dang / ri rab dang / 'khor yul
84a4(mdo): dang / mu khyud dang / ri btang bzung dang / ri btang bzung chen po yang rung ste/ ra'i rgyal po chen po thams cad 'akyang sgrib par myi byed de/ ma dang myed pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen po yan chad thams cad tu
84a5(mdo): thal te/ stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten ga khams thams cad snang bar byas nas sa ler gyurd to// gang sems can dmyalab rnams sam/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa rnams sam/ gshin rje'i
84a6(mdo): 'jig rten pa'i sems cad rnams kyi lus la 'od des phog par gyuradad pa de dag thams cad/ sdug bsngas kyi tshor ba myed par gyur te/ sus dang sems rab tu sim par gyurd cing // bdag nyid bde ba thams cad dang ldan pa
84a7(mdo): ba snyam bya shes so// rin po che bkod pa'i 'khor gyi khyams su bcom ldan 'das kyi spyad sngar 'khod kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor yug thams cad du rin po che sna bdun gyi pad kha con shing rta'i phang lo tsam/ 'das ma bye ba brgya
84a8(mdo): du ma dang ldan pa/ dri zhim pa dang / bkra ba bstan sug pa/ kha dog dang ldan zhing yid du 'ong pa// steng rin po che'i gdugs kyi dra bas g.yogs pa/ ka tsa sin da spang 'jam zhing reg na bde ba// bye ba phrag drug bcu sa
84b1(mdo): rum nas 'thon te mngon par 'phags so// rin po che'i pad ma de dag re re las/ dri gar 'byung ba'i dri des stong sum gyi stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten kyi khams kun tu rgyas te/ stong gsum gi stong chen po la 'jin
84b2(mdo): rten gi khams 'da'i lha dang myi 'i spos de dag thams cad/ pad ma'i khri des zil gyis non par gyur da to// lha dang / kyi dang gyi dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri ze dang / lha ma yin dang / nam ma'al lding dang / myi 'am
84b3(mdo): ci dang / lto 'phye chen po da mAn ya rig pa dang / pad ma'i dri des phog pa de sa dag thams cad kyang chos kyi dga' ba dang ldan te/ bdag nyid nyon mongs pa dang bral ba snyam du shes so// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos// gse
84b4(mdo): gyi 'od de dang / padam bkod pa byung ba de dag mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang ngo mtshar du gyur rmad du gyur nas stan las sangs te// zla gos phrag pa cig du gzur nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lnga ngas
84b5(mdo): la btsugs te// bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su zal mo sbyar btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gso sad to// bcom ldan 'das 'od blta na sdug pa 'di lta bu
84b6(mdo): 'di rab gda' zhing / pad ma dkod pa sngon mthong ma thos pa 'di dag byang su'i sngo ltas 'a lags// de snyed ces gsold pa dang / bcom ldan 'das ched kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsa la to// 
84b7(mdo): kun dka' bo 'di ni shar phyogs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' blo gros myi zad pa zhes bya ba// byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag drug bcus yongs su bskor cing / bdun du ba dang nas sman cig tu 'ong ba ste/ de
84b8(mdo): dag 'ong ba'i sde ltas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsa lad pa ring po ma yod par/ de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' blo gros kyi 'ashad pa/ sa cher g.yos par byed cing / 'od gzes
85a1(mdo): de rab tu gtong ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul che ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'grus pa chen pos/ me tog gi cher chen po na 'babs te/ thos stan
85a2(mdo): rtsa khran khrig brgya gang dang / klu rab tu len cing // byang chub sems dpa' bye la phrag drug bcus yongs su bskor te/ madrung ngu ba dang nas/ An ga cin tu rin po che bkod pa'i 'khor kyi khyams gal ba dang / 
85a3(mdo): ldan 'das gas deng 'ongs te lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyad sngar steng gi ser snang ya/ ta la bdun srid tsam na 'khor nas/ thal mo sbyar te steng gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams 'di thams cad dbyang
85a4(mdo): kyis go byar byed cing // bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'dra tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// / rdul byed dum dang bral bar dpa' bo 'dod chags dral/ 
85a5(mdo): ye shes rab ra'i myi mnga' spyan gsum rnam par sbyangs// skyon rnams bsal ba dri ma gsum dang tha spangs// / nus bras sangasargyas thugs rje can la phyag 'tshas so// 'jigs dang bral zhing
85a6(mdo): gti mug dran pa rnam par bsas// stobs bcu dgos pa'i tshogs kyis shin tu thul par dka' log pa'i lam du zhugs pas ro ma tshogs skrag mdzad// seng ge lta bur brnyengs pa kyi mnga' sa la gshegs/ 
85a7(mdo): yul sa steng na yang skyon rnams kun dang bras// khyod kyi yan lag dri ma myi mnga' las mer bzhugs// mun dang rab rab ma rig legs par rab bsal nas/ sAn ka dri ma las grol nyi me bzhin du snyan// 'gro ba
85a8(mdo): 'dri rnams bkon skyabs myed cing sdug bsngas gyurd// rga dang 'tsha bas mdar cing gnas bskabs pa mchis sa// sems can mchog gis thugs pache thugs rje bskyed mdzad nas// sman pa bzhin du rab tu/ 
85b1(mdo): bros par mdzad cing gshegs// ma rig pa dang / gti mug srid mcho nas dka' ba// nyon mongs rnam par rtog nas yang dpa'o slong po las// gzhan las ma gsad par ni bdag nyid rab rgas te// pad bzhin du chags pa gyi bya
85b2(mdo): rnam par shegs// chos 'di thams can rang bzhin gyis di me dgas ma mchis// brag cha'i sgra skad bzhin du rten nas 'byung la lags// ma ba gyis byed pa po dang tshor ba ma mchis par// 'jig rten pa zhin pos sems can
85b3(mdo): phan phyir rab tu gsungs// 'jig rten chos rnams 'jig rten ro'i rgyu bzhin g.yo// gyi mkhas skye bos bstend pa snying 'o ma mchis pa// chos rnams thams cad ston ka'i sngon dang 'dra mkhyen nas// srod sas nas
85b4(mdo): bar gyurd cing srid pa kun la spod// pad ma pa dang po 'dab ma rgyas 'dra'i sargyad mnga' ba// nyi zla brgya pas lhag pa'i gzi bzad mngal ba'o// / 'jig rten kun na bstod cing bsngags la
85b5(mdo): bstod 'os pa// myi 'dul snyan dang bral ba khyod la phyag 'tshal la/ kye'i khyu mchog mtha' yas pa'i pha rol gshegs// yon tan khyad par kun gyi rol dpyod byu da pa// bde bar gshegs kyi
85b6(mdo): yon tan 'di dag dpag gyi yang / sangs rgyas bsod nams zhing sa mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros myi bzad pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag drug bcu po de dag dang
85b7(mdo): bcas pas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshus dpa'adra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas/ steng gi par sdang las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom
85b8(mdo): ldan 'das la san bdun bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas/ 'khor dang bcas te pad ma'i snying po de dag pa skyes mo grung du 'bod do// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra pA ti/ 
86a1(mdo): shu stan sangs langs te/ bla gros phrag pa cig la bzang nas pus po g.yas pa'i swa pa la sa la bcugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga sa der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
86a2(mdo): gso yod te/ byang chub sems dpa' blo gros kyi zad pa 'di dag gang mchis pa// de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan dang / 'jig rten gi khabs de 'i mying ci zhes bgyi/ 'jig rten gi khams de 'di nas ji srid cig na mchis
86a3(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis bkalas lad pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de'i phyir khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros kyi zad pa 'di la dris shig dang / 'di nyid khyod la stod to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'o byas
86a4(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' blo gros kyi bzad pa/ 'di skad ces smra sa so// rigs kyi khyod ga pa nas 'ongs/ de banani gshegs ba de'i mtshan dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i rgya ci zhes
86a5(mdo): 'jig rtend ka khams de 'di nas ci srid cig na yod/ blo bram zad pas smras pa/ gnas brtan sha ra dwa ti'i bu sa rung yang 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba'i 'du shes 'byung ngam/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu bdag
86a6(mdo): sa 'du shes yongs su shes so// smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra dwa'i ti'i bu/ 'du shes yongs su shes pa dang ldan pa ni gnyi ga la blo myi 'jug na/ de ci'i phyir khyod 'di ster gang khyod gang nas 'ongs snyam du sems
86a7(mdo): btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'ong ba zhes bya ba de ni bsdu ba'i tshig go// btsun pa sha ra dA'i ti'i bu 'gro zhes bya ba ni bsal pa'i tshig go// gang la sku pa'i tshig myed pa dang / bsal pa'i tshig myed pa de la/ 
86a8(mdo): 'ong ba la yang byed/ 'gro ba yang myed do/ 'ong ba dang 'gro ba myed pa ni 'phags pa rnams kyi 'gro ba'o// btsun pa sha ra dA ra ti'i bu 'ong ba zhes bya ba de ni las kyi rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid do// btsun pa
86b1(mdo): sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'gro ba zhes bya ba de ni las kyi rang bzhin zad pa'i mtshan nyid do// gang la las kyi rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid byed pa dang / las kyi rang bzhin zad pa'i mtshan nyid myed pa de sa 'ong ba byed/ 'gro ba yang myed 'ong
86b2(mdo): ba dang 'gro ba myed pa ni 'phags rnams kyi 'gro ba'o// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'ong ba zhes bya ba de ni smon lam gyi mtshan nyid do// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'gro ba zhes bya ba de ni smon sam thang ba'i mtshan nyid do// gangs
86b3(mdo): smon lam gi mtshan nyid dang / smon lam zad pa'i mtshan nyid myed de la 'ong ba yang myed/ 'gro ba yang myed de/ 'ong ba dang 'gro ba byed pa ni 'phags pa rnams kyi 'gro ba'o// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'od zhes bya ba de ni skye 'i
86b4(mdo): mtshan nyid do// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'gro ba zhes bya ba de ni 'gogapa'i mtshan nyid do// gang la skye ba'i mtshan nyid myed pa dang / 'gog pa'i mtshan nyid myed pa de la/ 'ong ba yang myed/ 'gro ba yang myed de/ 
86b5(mdo): 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba myed pa ni 'phags pa rnams kyi 'gro ba'o// btsu/ na ba ga ra dwa ti'i bu 'ong ba zhes bya ba de ni rnam par rig pa'i sgo// 'i mtshan nyid do// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'gro ba zhes bya ba de ni
86b6(mdo): rnam par rig pa'i sgol zad pa'i mtshan nyid do// gang sa rig pa'i sgo'i mtshan nyid myed pa dang / rnam par rig pa'i sgo'i zad pa'i mtshan nyid myed pa de la yang 'ong ba yang myed de/ 'gro ba yang myed de/ 'ong ba dang / 
86b7(mdo): 'phro ba byed pa ni 'phags pa rnams kyi 'gro ba'o// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'ong ba zhes bya ba de ni pA'i yul lo// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'gro ba zhes bya ba de ni 'gro ba'i yul lo// gang la 'ong ba'i yus myed
86b8(mdo): pa dang / 'gro ba'i yus myed pa de la 'ong ba yang byed/ 'gro ba yang byed de/ 'ong ba dang 'gro ba myed pa ni 'phags pa rnams kyi 'gro la'o// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'ong ba zhes bya ba de ni rkyen kyi'i mtshan nyid do// 
87a1(mdo): btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'gro ba zhes bya ba de ni rkyend zad pa'i mtshan nyid do// gang la rkyend kyi mtshan nyid myed pa dang / rkyen zad pa'i mtshan nyid myed pa la 'ong ba yang myed/ 'gro ba yang myed de/ 'ong ba dang 'gro ba
87a2(mdo): myed pa de ni 'phags pa rnams kyi 'gro ba'o// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu'i 'od pa zhes bya ba de ni rted cing 'breld par 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid do// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'gro ba zhes bya ba de ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba
87a3(mdo): zad pa'i mtshan nyid do// gang la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid myed pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zad pa'i mtshan nyid myed pa de la 'ong ba yang byed do// 'gro la yang byed de// 'ong ba dang 'gro ba myed/ 
87a4(mdo): ba ni 'phags pa rnams kyi 'gro ba'o// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'ong ba zhes bya ba de ni rgyu las 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid do// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'gro ba zhes bya ba de ni rgyu las byung ba zad pa'i mtshan
87a5(mdo): nyid do// gang la rgyu las byung ba'i mtshan nyid myed pa'i dang / rgyu la/ sa 'byung ba zad pa'i mtshan nyid myed pa de la 'ong ba yang myed/ 'gro/ pa yang byed de/ 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba myed pa ni 'phags pa rnams
87a6(mdo): kyi 'gro ba'o// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'ong ba zhes bya ba de ni tha snyad kyi sgra dang / yi ge dang brda'o// btsun ba sha ra dra ti'i bu 'gro ba zhes bya pa de ni za snyad kyi sgra dang / yi ge dang / brda yongs su shes pa'o// gang la tha
87a7(mdo): snyad kyi sgra dang / yi ge dang / brda byed pa dang / tha snyad kyi sgra dang / yi ge dang / brda yongs su shes pa myed pa de la 'ong ba byed do// 'gro ba yang byed de/ 'ong ba dang 'gro ba myed pa de ni 'phags pa rnams kyi 'gro ba'o/ 
87a8(mdo): de nas tshe dang ldan pa ga ra dwa ti'i bus byang chub sems dpa' blo gros myi zad pa la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyi spobs pa 'di lta bu'i phyi ma yin gyi/ ci nas de lta bu sngon ma thos pa'i gnas/ 
87b1(mdo): rnams mnyan pa'i phyir 'dri'o// rigs kyi bu lci ste dper na yul bcas dang / sho gam gcod pa'i myi zhig yod de/ des phyi reng dag/ 'ur thogs de lam nas 'gro ba la/ gyi khyod ci zhig thogs zhes 'dra zhing / ngas yus btsam
87b2(mdo): sho gam byin cig ces rem pa de bzhin du/ rigs bu bdag cag nyan thos gzhan gi sgra'i rjes su 'gro ba/ gzhan las thos pa las mos par bdag gi sems kyi rgyud la snang ba nye bar gnas pa rnams kyis rtag tu rgyun
87b3(mdo): myi chad par khyod lta bu'i skyes bu dam pa rnams/ gang las nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas mang po 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i theg pa chen po 'di rjes su gzung ba'i phyir dri bar bya ste/ de bas na rigs kyi bu khyod gang nas 'ongs
87b4(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan dang / 'jig rten gyi khams de'i phyi ci zhes bya/ 'jig rten gyi khams de 'di nas ji srid na yod legasabar ston cig/ blo gros kyi zad pas smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti
87b5(mdo): 'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa 'di khyod kyi mdun na bzhugs kyis/ 'di sa zhus shig dang / des khyod la san ldon par 'gyur te/ 'khor thams cad the rtse ma byed par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das
87b6(mdo): la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di skad ces gsosang to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' blo gros kyi zad pa 'di gang nas mchis/ de bzhi na gshegs pa de'i mtshan dang / 'jig rten gyi khams de'i mying ci zhes/ 
87b7(mdo): bgyi/ 'jig rten gyi khams de 'di nas ji srid cig na mchis/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i myang thos nas/ sems can dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis pa'i rnams byang chub
87b8(mdo): kyi phyir go cha 'tshal bar 'gyur bar/ de bzhin gshegs pas bstan du gsoso/ bcom ldan 'das bde bar gshegs pas bstan du gsoso/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsas ba/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de'i phyir legs par
88a1(mdo): sa tu nyon la yid la cung zhig dang / ngas khyod la bshad do// 'jig rten gyi khams de'i sa yon tan yongs su brjod pa dang / byang chub sems dpal de dag dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de'i phyir thos nas/ dad pa dang mos
88a2(mdo): bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chags pa myed cing / sgrib pa myed pa la myi skrag par bya'o// the tsom za bar myi bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol nas// bcom
88a3(mdo): ldan 'das kyi sar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' brtsal to// sha ra dwa ti'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ shang phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gi klung bcu'i bye ba snyed kyi rdus phra rab
88a4(mdo): kyi rdul rnyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gi khams myi 'dzums pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra ba bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun kyi bzang po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs
88a5(mdo): to mo zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston to// byang chub sems dpa' blo kra sa myi zad pa de nas 'ongs so// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'jig rten gyi kham sa myi 'dzums pa de ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams
88a6(mdo): kyi mying yang myed de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i de dge 'dun yang byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' shig ste/ sngon yongs su bskyad ba byas pa/ sbyin pa dang / tus pa dang / legs par sdom pa dang / nges pa dang / tshul khrims
88a7(mdo): dang / thos pa dang / bag yod pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang yod byad bsnyungs pa sa gnas pa/ bzod pa'i stobs kyis 'od khro ba myed cing / byang chub tu brtson 'grus brtan pas dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs bsags pa/ bsam
88a8(mdo): gtan dang / rnam par tha rad pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyom par 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pas rnam par ros pa/ shes rab kyi 'od dang snang ba chen pos sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi cho ga rab tu/ dbyel
88b1(mdo): bstan pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa/ byams pa'i sems nam mkha'i dkyil dang mtshungs pa/ snying rje'i bsam pa brtan pas sems can thams cad yongs su spyan par bya ba'i cho ga shes pa dgal bas chos la yang dag par dga'/ 
88b2(mdo): pas chos la yang dag par dga' bar byed pa/ nyes pa dang rjes su chags dang / khong khro ba ni/ nga rgyal shi nad tu spangs pa/ btang snyoms kyis gnyis dang bral ba/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan pa myed pa dang / smodad pa myed pa'i chos
88b3(mdo): kyi tshul la gnas pa/ bdud kyi sngags kyu dang / nyon mongs dang / zab mo'i rnyog pa rnam par sel bar byed pa/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang / dbang po mchog dang ma yin pa shes pa// so so la ci rigs par chos
88b4(mdo): dang nor dang / shes pa rab tu sbyin pa/ sems sa dang / chu dang me dang / rlung dang mtshungs pa/ pha ros rgol dang / sog pa'i tshogs can tshogs thams cad rab tu 'jom pa g.yul las rnam par rgyas te/ 
88b5(mdo): rgyal mtshan dang ba dan spring zhing mya zlogs par dpa' pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo dang / stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pas 'khor kyi 'jigs pa dang / bag tsha ba myed pa/ rten cing 'bres
88b6(mdo): bar byung ba la 'jug pa yod pa dang / byed pa dang / gnyi ga'i mthar lta ba dang bral ba/ dbu ma'i lam du zhugs pa/ bdag dang / bdag gi dang / sems can dang / srog dang / skye ba blo dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu
88b7(mdo): dang / rkang zag dang / shed bu dang / shed las skyes dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / rtag pa dang / chad pa dang / 'byung ba dang / 'jig pa dang / lta bar gyu pa'i kun nas sdang ba thams cad dang bral ba/ gzungs
88b8(mdo): rang / mdo sde'i rgyas po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas btab pa/ chags pa myed pa'i ye shes kyi byin gyirje rlabs kyis/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du swa bsgrags kyang spobs pa rgyan gyi chad par
89a1(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul pa dang / cho 'phrul stond pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pas gnod pas dang / rnam par gnod pa dang / 'gro ba dang / 'gro ba dang 'ong ba la mkhas pa/ 'jigs pa/ 
89a2(mdo): dang / khro ba dang / nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs pa kun chad pa/ seng ge'i sgra mngon par bsgrags pa/ sems can rab 'bring tha ma thams kyi mdza ba shes brtan pa/ mya ngan las 'da' ba la 'god pa/ chos kyi sprin
89a3(mdo): las 'brug gi sgra 'byung zhing / rig pa dang rnam par grol ba'i klog dang / bdud rtsi cher rab tu 'theb pa/ chos rin po che rab tu gtod pas dkon mchog gsum ga rigs kyi 'chad par byed pa/ nor bu rin po che lta bung bas
89a4(mdo): padag cing / phyi nang du blo rab tu sbyangs pa/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po'i mchog dang / rang gi gzi brjid kyi rgyan dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba brgyad stong gis shi nad tu rgyan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad sa dbang bskur ba
89a5(mdo): skye ba gcig gis thogs pas rgyal tshab tu gyu rad pa/ sems can thams cad kyi mos pa dang / rnam par bros pa dang / gargyal ba 'du/ la pa'i cho ga shes pa/ byang chub kyi sa'i snying po rdo rje'i gdas
89a6(mdo): gnan pa dang / rnam par gnan pa la myi 'jigs pa'i tshul shes pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi cho ga dang / sangs rgyas kyi rab tu ston cing / rab tu bzung ba dang / char gcod pas sems la dpa' zhing dbang byed
89a7(mdo): ba dang / bla na byed pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rin po che rab tu bskor ba sha stag ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu bcom ldan 'das de'i dge 'dun na byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu sha stag go/ de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des
89a8(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi bsngags pa dang / yon tan dang / phan yon bstan pa 'di ste bu 'di dag thos nas/ tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dka' nas dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/ lha'i me'i tog ud
89b1(mdo): gal dang / pad ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad ma dkar po dang / man da ra ba dang / man da ra ba chen po dag gis bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros kyi zad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag la gtong nas
89b2(mdo): skyes bu dam pa 'di 'dra dag la lta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba rnyed pa ni/ bdag cag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed de/ gang dag byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan dang / phan yon bstan pa 'di thos nas/ bran
89b3(mdo): myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i sems can de dag gis kyang rnyed pa legs par rnyed do zhes ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// de na srog chags brgya stong phrag sum bcu drug gis bla na myed pa yang
89b4(mdo): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan sha ra dwa ta'i bus bka' stsa sang pa / sha ra dwa ti'i yang 'jig rten gi khams myi 'dzums pa de na ngan song
89b5(mdo): dang / myi 'om pa dang / sdug bsngal gyi sgra yang myed ltung ba'i 'khrum pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgra yang byed/ log par sgrub pa dang / bslab pasas 'das pa'i sgra yang myed/ bud myed du skye bar 'gyur
89b6(mdo): pa'i sgra yang byed/ ser sna dang / 'chas pa'i tshul khrims dang / gnod sems dang / le lo dang / g.yeng ba dang / 'chas pa'i shes rab kyi sgra yang myod/ sgri ba dang / chod pa dang / kun nas ldang ba dang / bag chags
89b7(mdo): kyi sgra yang byed/ rab 'bring tha ma'i sgra yang myed/ sems can dang / theg pa dang / theg pa dang / zhing tha dad pa'i sgra yang byed/ sangs rgyas tha dad pa'i sgra yang myed/ chos tha dad pa'i sgra yang myed/ dge 'dun tha dad pa'i
89b8(mdo): sgra yang byed/ bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / bkres pa dang / skom pa'i sgra yang byed/ ngar 'dzid pa dang / nga'ir 'dzin pa dang / yongs su 'dzind pa'i sgra yang myed/ bdud dang lta ba dang / kun nas sdar ba dang / 
90a1(mdo): bag chags kyi sgra yang myed do// 'jig rten gi khams de ni yangs shing rgya che ste/ sring bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug bcu yod de// byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gis/ nyi ma dang zla ba gcig gi 'od
90a2(mdo): kyis kun tu snang ngo // 'jig rten gi khams de yang / lag 'jil bzhin du mnyam zhing / byed du r+ya sngon po'i sa gzhi la rin po che thams cad kyi pad mas rab tu smras te/ ka tsa lin de ltar mjam zhing reg na bde ba
90a3(mdo): pa/ myig mangs ris su bris gang // rin po che'i shing gi ra bas legs par brgyan pa rtag tu me tog rgyas pas mdzes par byas pa/ rdo dang / seg ma dang / kye mo dang / bod ba myed pa/ ri nag po myed
90a4(mdo): de ri rab kyis legs par brgyan pa/ lha dang myi'i longaspyod bye brag myed cing / sems can de dag gi zas kyang chos kyi dga' ba dang / bsam gtan gi zas te/ 'jig rten gi khams de na de bzhin
90a5(mdo): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs khengs rgyas kun tu bzang po chos kyi rgyal po bla na myed pa ma gtogasapar/ rgyal po gzhan gang yang myed do/ bcom ldan 'das de yang
90a6(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' de dag la/ yi ge dang / sgra dang / brda'itshig rab tu dbye bas chos kyi ston te// gzhan du na byang chub sems dpa' de dag bcom ldan 'das de'i drung du lpags te/ myig myi 'dzums
90a7(mdo): par smras pas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob ste/ myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par srung bstan pa yang byin no// de phyir na 'jig rten gi khams de yang myi 'dzums pa zhes bya'o// 
90a8(mdo): des sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa gang zhe na gang gzugs kyi mtshan nyid kyis rab tu ma phye ba/ rigs dang / rus pa dang / tshe rigs kyis rab tu ma bye ba/ sngon gi mtha' dkar po spyod pas rab tu ma bye ba
90b1(mdo): phyi ma'i mtha' shes pa la sems pas rab tu ma bye ba/ da ltar byung ba la gnas pas rab tu ma bye ba/ phung po dang / khams dang / skyes ched kyis rab tu ma phye / mthong ba dang / zos pa dang / bye brag byed pa dang / 
90b2(mdo): rnam par rig pas rab tu ma bye ba/ sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pas rab tu ma bye ba/ spros pa dang / rgyu bas rab tu ma bye ba/ skye ba dang // gnas pa dang / 'jigs pa dang / 'jig pas rab tu ma
90b3(mdo): bye ba/ gzung ba dang / 'azod pa dang / gtang bas rab tu mabye ba/ dran pa dang / yid la byed pas rab tu ma bye ba/ rtog pa dang rnam 'ang rtog pa dang / yongs su rtog pas rab tu ma phye ba/ chos kyi mtshan
90b4(mdo): nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid kyis rab tu ma bye ba/ gcig pa dang / tha dad pa dang / so spo bas rab tu ma phye ba/ sems kyi dmyigs pa grang pas rab tu ma phye ba/ nang dang phyi ron
90b5(mdo): tu g.yo bas rab tu mkhye ba/ rnam par rtog pa'i mamanyid dang / blang ba dang / dorang bas rab tu ma bye ba/ kha don dang / dbyings dang / rtags kyi rab tu ma bye sa/ spyongs pa dang / kya na
90b6(mdo): dang / spyod pas rab tu ma phye ba/ rgyas khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol yi ye shes mthong ba yid la byed pas rab tu ma bye ba/ stobs dang / 
90b7(mdo): gyi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par btags pas rab tu ma phye ba yin te/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa ni / bsam gyis myi khya ba/ rgyu ba myed dang / rnam par rig pa myed
90b8(mdo): pa'i mtshan nyid de/ nga'i ba byed pa/ yid la byed pa dang bras pa/ dran pa byed cing yid la byed pa myed pa/ gnas myed pa/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched 'byung ba dang 'jig pa'i gnas ma rI
91a1(mdo): thogs pa myed pa ma yin/ 'jug pa ma yin/ gnas pa ma yin/ myi gnas pa ma yin/ rab tu gnas pa yin/ yang dag par gnas pa ma yin/ gzugs kyi rnam par shes pa'i gnas ma yin/ 
91a2(mdo): cho sa dang / ban+du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pas shes rab bya ba'i gnas ma yin/ sa'i khams kyi rnam par shes pa'i gnas ma yin// chu'i rims kyi ma yin/ me'i khams kyi ma yin/ rlung na sa
91a3(mdo): kyi rnams par shes pa'i gnas ma yin/ myig dang gzugs kyi rnam par shes pa'i gnas ma yin/ de bzhin du na ba li ma yin/ sgra'i ma yin/ sna'i ma yin/ dri'i ma yin/ s+ye'i ma yin/ mo'i ma yin/ 
91a4(mdo): lus phyi ma yin/ reg bya'i ma yin/ yid kyi ma yin/ chos rnam par shesu pa'i gnas pa yin no/ sa pe sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa ni dbyigs pa thams cad sa rgya gnas pa 'o// mtshan
91a5(mdo): thams cad kyi ldan pa'o// g.yo ba dang / sems pa dang / bskyod thams cad kyi rgyu myed pa'o// mtho pa dang / phyebrag byed pa dang / rnam par rig la gyi skye ba'o// dbang po dang
91a6(mdo): rnam pa gros pa'i mngan nyid thams cad kyings su kyi 'grol lo// sems gcin nas cig tu ting mtshams skyes pa byed pa'o/ rtog pa dang rnas pa rtog pa rams cad kyi yin 'o// 
91a7(mdo): rjes su chags pa dang / 'pho tho ba bcom pa mo// sgyu mtshan nyid rnam par chad pa'o/ ba royo dang / tshu me da nga dang / mam 'dzin pa/ thams cad yang dag par chad pa/ 
91a8(mdo): sgo btags pa byed pas 'odrabasam pa'o// bye ba byed pa'i phyir dga' ba byed pa'o// byang ba byed pa'i phyir bde sa da do// thongam drag ni mam yongs su gdung mi byed pa'o// 'a'ad pa thams cad dang bral bapo
91b1(mdo): grol ba'i mtshan nyid do// gzugs byed pas lus byed pa'o// tshor ba myed pas tshor bar 'gyur ba myed pa'o// mdud pa byed pas bdud pa dang bral ba'o// 'du kyi byed pas 'dus ma byas pa'o// rnam par shes pa myed pas
91b2(mdo): rnam par gyi rig pa'i mtshan nyid do// kyi 'dzin pas med pa byed pa'o// phyi gtong pas dong ba byed pa'o// gnas myed pas bye gnas pa'o// tshe dang bral bas kyi 'dug pa 'o// myi 'byung bas byed par gyi 'a
91b3(mdo): pa'i mtshan nyid do// dran pa dang / yid la byed pa dang / sems dpa' dang / sems las byung ba'i chos thams cad kyis su bzung ba/ drug tu 'dzind pa byed pa/ len pa myed pas 'do pa myed pa// rab tu
91b4(mdo): zhi ba gzod ma nas su skyes pa// gyi skye bas rab tu phye ba/ chos da kyi dbyings su yang dag par 'du ba/ mnyam zhing myi mnyam pa/ myed par gyu dad pa// nam mkha' dang mtshungs shing mnyam pa
91b5(mdo): myig dang gzugs kyi sem las 'das pa/ de bzhin du rna ba dang / swA dang / swa dang dr-i dang / sre dang / ro dang / na sus dang reg bye du/ yid dang chos kyi sem las 'das pa yin te/ sangs rgyas rjes su
91b6(mdo): dran pa 'di 'dra ba/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis 'thob bo// de dag gis sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa 'di thob ma thag tu/ chos thams cangs bsgril ba byed pa'i ye shes thob par gyur te/ sangs rgyas bam
91b7(mdo): ldan 'das thams cad kyis gsungs pa 'dzin cing rjes pa yang gyi byed/ dran par gyi byed de/ sgra mngon rnams cad rnam pa tshangs par yang rnyed par 'gyur ro// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dkri bcom
91b8(mdo): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu bzang po ni/ ji ltar 'di na gzhon gi sgra dang / so so rang gis tshul bzhin yid la byed pa ltar rgyu dang rkyen gnyis kyis yang dag par lta ba myi ston te// sha ra dwa ti'i bu
92a1(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa de mthong ma zag tu/ don rnam par nges pa las pha rol tu phyind pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed do// myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa'i lung bstan pa yang thog 'o/ 
92a2(mdo): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang gzugs kyi mtshan nyid sa mngon par zhen pa spangs pa 'di ni spyan pa'i pha ros tu phyind pa'o// gang gzugs kyi mtshan nyid rgyun bcad pa 'di ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// 
92a3(mdo): gang gzugs kyi mtshan nyid zad pa'i chos nyid 'di ni bzod pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa'o// gang gzugs kyi mtshan nyid la dben par mthong ba 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyin pa'o// gang gzugs kyi mtshan nyid
92a4(mdo): sems la myi gzhog pa 'di ni bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyi nad pa'o// gang gzugs kyi mtshan nyid la spros pa'i rgyu myed/ 'di ni/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa'o// de ltar byang chub
92a5(mdo): dpa' de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu bzang pomathong ma thag tu/ don rnam par nges pa las pha rold tu phyind pa
92a6(mdo): drug yongs su rdzogs nas/ myi skye ba'i chos sa bzod pa'i lung bstand pa lnga thob bo// ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu bzang po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing / 'jig rtend gi khams kyi
92a7(mdo): 'dzums pa lta bur/ gang dag na byang chub sems dpa' yongs su dag pa 'di ste bu dag 'khod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag ni shin tu nyung ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ byang chub sems dpa' blo
92a8(mdo): gros kyi chad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// skyes bu dam bdag gang khyed kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu bzang po de dang / byang chub sems dpal de dag dang / 
92b1(mdo): 'jig rten gi mas kyi 'dzums pa de mthod pa ni rnyed pa legs pa rnyed do// blo gros kyi zad pas smras pa/ btsun bshar dwa ti'i bu khyod 'jig rten kyi khams kyi 'jums pa de dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
92b2(mdo): kun tu bzang po de dang / pad ma bkod pa de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag lta 'dod dang / sha ra dwa ta'i bus smras pa/ rigs kyi bu thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'di yang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rab tu 'phel bar
92b3(mdo): 'gyur gyis/ bdag gis blta'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros myi bzad pa de'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rigs kyi bu
92b4(mdo): de snyoms par zhugs ma zag tu/ de nas thams cad ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / gnas brtan sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ 'jigadan gyi khams myi 'jugs rno ba de dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
92b5(mdo): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu bzang po de dang / pad ma bkod pa de dag dang / byang chub sems dpal de dag mthong ste/ mthong nas kyang thams cad rang ra
92b6(mdo): gi sta nad las langs te/ thal mo sbyang nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu bzang po dang / byang chub sems dpal de dag la phyag 'tshal lo
92b7(mdo): de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros myi zad pa'i byin kyis rlabs kyis/ de dag gsag pa g.yas par sngon ma mthong ma thos pa'i me tog gi pur madri rab tu zhim zhing sna tshogs pa khaldan
92b8(mdo): sdug pa/ kha dog dang ldan zhing yid du 'ong ba dag byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag gi me tog gi phur ma de dag shar phyogs su/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
93a1(mdo): kun tu bzang po ga la de sogs su gtor to// me tog gi pur ma gtod pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing deng chags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu bzang ba de dang / byang
93a2(mdo): chub sems dpal de dag la mngon par gtor nas/ de dag gis 'jig rten gi khams de dag thams cad me tog gis gang par sa gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' gang dag 'jig rten gi khams de na gnas pa de dag gis
93a3(mdo): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu bzang po de la bcom ldan 'das me tog blta na sdug pa 'di lta bu 'di dag char ka las bab ces zhus so// bcom ldan 'das des
93a4(mdo): bka' stsal la/ rigs kyi bu dag 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' blo gros myi bzad pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs bshag kyang thub pa de la blta ba dang // phyag bya ba dang / mchod pa bya ba dang
93a5(mdo): bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos nyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das shag kya thub pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mjed der phyin nas/ 'jig rten gi khams deng phyogs bcu nas
93a6(mdo): 'byas pa'i byang chub sems dpal de dag gis me tog 'di dag gis me tog ni dag gtong to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pashad kyi thub pa de yang / 'dus pa chen po'i le'u zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs
93a7(mdo): ston te/ der yang sems can dpag tu myed pas chos mngon tu rtogs par 'gyur ro// de dag gis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub
93a8(mdo): de bzhugs pa'i 'jig rten gi khams de 'di nas ji srid cig mchis// bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas chub phyogs logs su/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ka'i klung bcu'i
93b1(mdo): bye ma snyed kyi nus than ras kyi dus skyed kyi/ 'jig rten gi khams 'das pa na'ajig rten ni khams kyi mchen ces bya ba yod de/ den bcom ldan 'das de bzhi gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yas ngas par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
93b2(mdo): nan kya grub pa da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes sa chos kyang stond to// de dag gsegaso yod pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis 'jig rten ni khamam gyi mjed de dang / com ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
93b3(mdo): bzang 'os stsalas 'di lta bu'i 'on byung ste/ 'od des sang / rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad lus pas nas/ 'jig rjes gi yo gyi mjen 'di dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshenas bla zhan gyi
93b4(mdo): thus pa dang / bya chub sems dpa' da / rang ga bya sems dpa' de dag la bsten te/ de dag gis mthong nas cad rang bani snyan sams 'i rte/ byung nas thacom na
93b5(mdo): 'das de bzhin gshegs pagag kyi thub pa 'di rung / byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag phyag 'tshal zhing / cig 'di skad smra'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di skar la ni rten ni rnams 'din sku'i the mo gnan ma tsam sang/ 
93b6(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sa ma gang pa ma mchis na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyed ga pa nas 'dus/ bcom ldan 'das des bkal saHsa dang / rigs kyi bu ngag byang chub sems dpal 'di dag ni// phyogs brgya'i
93b7(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad byed pa nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dus so// de nas tshe dang ldan pag ra dwa ti'i bus/ byang chub sems dpa' blo gros kyi zang pa la 'di skad smras so// de ci'i phyir/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyi rna
94a1(mdo): blo gros myi zad pa zhes btags// blo gros myi bzad pas smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ blo gros myi zad pa zhes bya ba 'di ni chos thams cad kyi dbyigs pa'i rgyu mthun pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad
94a2(mdo): myi thod pa'i phyir ro// smras pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos myi zad pa bstan pa la baphams te/ spobs par gyis shig// blo gros myi zad pas smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems
94a3(mdo): dpa' rnams kyi dbo sems bskyed pa yang myi zad pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ma 'dres pa'i phyir ro// sems de ni nyon mongs pa thams cad ma 'dres par skyes so// theg pa gzhan la 'dod pa myed pas sems de ni ma 'brel
94a4(mdo): par skyes so// phas kyi dgol ba thams cad kyis kyi 'phrogs pas sems de ni sra bar skyes so// sems de ni bdud thams cad kyis myi byed par skyes so// dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par smrab
94a5(mdo): pa'i phyir/ sems de ni brtad par skyes so// 'dus byas myi/ rtag par shin tu rig pas sems de ni rtag par skyes so// sangs rgya/ sa kyi chos thams cad yang dag par sdud pas sems de ni myi g.yo ba/
