116b4(mdo): bsam gtan yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam rten ni de la ma chags pa'o// bdag bde ba la chags pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan rnams ni ro
116b5(mdo): byang ba byed pa'o// sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa 'aspong ba li phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sapam gtan ni snyi rje chen po sa dmyigs pa'o// 'dod pa yi khams su dmyigs pa
116b6(mdo): phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam ni ting nge 'dzin ldog pa'o/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi dpyod pa kun shes pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni mngon par shes pa yongs
116b7(mdo): spyad pa byas pa'o// sems kyi dbang phyug shes pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni/ sems las su rung ba'o// gzugs dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams zil gyis gnon pa'i phyir/ byang chub
116b8(mdo): sems dpa' rnams kyimamapa gtan ni bsan dang / rnam par thar da pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyems par 'dug pa dang / sngang pa thams cad shes pa'o// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snyoms par 'phran/ 
117a1(mdo): pa 'isrid kyis gnod pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni ni pa dang / bar tu zhi pa'o// shin tu mthar thug pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gyi bsam gtan na gyi 'byu
117a2(mdo): ba'o// nyon mongs pa dang / bag chags kyi mtshams spyod pa thams cad legs par 'joms pa'i phyir// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni sog par sgrub pa'i gnyen pa'o// 'jig rten thams cad las bsgral pa'i
117a3(mdo): phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni shes rab sa 'jug pa'o// sems can thams can bsgral pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa'i
117a4(mdo): sngon du 'gro'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'am gtan gyi zad pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' na sa kyi bsam gtan ni/ dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs myi gcod pa'o// 
117a5(mdo): rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa'i phyir// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni ma nyams pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi me thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems
117a6(mdo): dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni chos thams cad ni chos thams cad la dbang byed pa'i ye shes so// ye shes bdag nyid che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan na po 'a' khyab ste/ btsun pa she rang
117a7(mdo): ta'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan gyi pha rosad tu phyind pa rnam pa bcu drug ste/ gam nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams sa myed pa'o// de la bsam gtan yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/ 
117a8(mdo): mngon par shes pa dang / ye shes yongs su rdzogs pa'o// de la mngon par shes pa ni gang / ye shes ni kang zhe na/ gang gis gzugs su sdang ba thams cad mthong ba 'di ni mngon par shes pa ni bya'o// gang gas
117b1(mdo): gzugs thams cad kyi chos nyid myi zad par shes kyang myi zad pa'i chos mngon gsum du myi byed pa 'di ni ye shes zhes bya'o// gang gis sgrar grag pa thams cad thos pa de ni mngon par shes pa zhes bya'o// gang sgra thams cad sngon
117b2(mdo): kyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mthar brjod du myed pa shes pa 'di ni ye shes zhes bya'o// gang gis sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa rnams shes pa 'di ni mngon par shes pa zhes bya'o// gang sems 'gog par
117b3(mdo): shes pa la/ sems 'gog pa mngon gsum du yang myi byed pa 'di ni ye shes zhes bya'o// gang sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' rjes su dran pa 'dri ni mngon par shes ga ca kyi ni zhi pa zhes bya'o// gang
117b4(mdo): rgyas thams cad kyi zhing du 'gro la 'di ni mngon par shes pa shes bya'o// gang gis zhing nam mkha' dang mtshungs par shes pa 'di ni ye/ shes zhes bya'o// rkang 'byer myed pa'i chos 'dod pa 'di ni
117b5(mdo): mngon par shes bya'o// gang chos thams cad mnyam par mthong ba 'i shes pa 'di ni ye shes zhes bya'o// gang 'jig rten tham sa cad dbyer myed pa'i mtshan nyid 'di ni mngon par shes pa zhes bya'o// 
117b6(mdo): kang 'jig rten gi chos thams cad dang ma 'dres par shes pa 'di ni ye shes zhes bya'o// gang brgya byin byin dang tshangs pa dang 'jig rton spyod pa rnams zil gyis gnon pa 'di ni mngon par shes pa shes bya'o// gang nyan
117b7(mdo): thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyi bor shes pa 'di ni ye shes zhes bya ba ste/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan yongs su sbyar pa zhes bya'o// yang sems
117b8(mdo): cad thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang // sems g.yeng ba cing snyed par byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan gyi tshogs dang / sems gzhag pa shes pa'ang de snyed de/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs par
118a1(mdo): sems g.yeng ba ji snyed pa de snyed du/ byang chub sems dpa' kyang bsam gtan gyis tshogs yang dag par bsgrub bya'o// mnyam pa nyid des gnas na de'i phyir mnyam par gzhag pa zhes bya'o// sems can mnyam pa nyid dang / 
118a2(mdo): bsam pa mnyam pa nyid dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa mnyam pa nyid dang / sbyor ba mnyam pa nyan dang / sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab mnyam pa nyid dang / sangs
118a3(mdo): rgyas kyi chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la gnas pas na/ de'i phyir mnyam pa kra/ zhes bya'o// ting nge 'dzind gang dang mnyam pa/ byang chub kyang de dang mnyam mo/ byang chub gang dang mnyam pa sems can thams cad kyang de dang
118a4(mdo): mnyam mo// sems can thams cad gang dang mnyam pa/ chos thams cad kyang de dang mnyam ste/ mnyam pa nyid de sa stobs par zhugs pas na/ de'i phyir snyoms par zhugs pa zhes bya'o// byung
118a5(mdo): dmi mapa btsun pa tham bsanadon gyi sgrim sa par chugs pa zhes byam/ sa nyid shi dang ma 'byo sa sa pa sa no// ma byed pa ga mnyam pa sems
118a6(mdo): mas cad kyang de rang mnyam thom/ sems can thams cad dang dang mnyam pa chos cad kyang rengang mnya / mnyam pa nyid des snyoms par zhugs pas na/ den phyir snyoms par zhugs pa zhes bya'o// mtsham
118a7(mdo): myed pa gang dang mnyam pa smon pa myed pa'ang de dang mnyam mo// smon pa myed pa gang dang mnyam pa sems can thams cad de dang mnyam mo/ sems can thams cad gang dang mnyam pa/ chos thams cad kyang de dang mnyam pa ste/ 
118b1(mdo): mnyam pa nyid de la snyoms par 'thugs pas na/ de'i phyir snyoms par zhugs pa zhugs pa zhes bya'o// smond pa myed pa gang dang mnyams ma 'du myi byed pa yang de dang mnyam mo// mngon par 'du myi byed la gang dang mnyam pa sems
118b2(mdo): can thams cad de dag mnyam po'o// sems can thams cad dang mnyam pa chos thams cad kyang de dang mnyam pa ste/ mnyam pa nyid de sa snyoms par zhugs pas na/ de'i phyir snyoms par zhugs mas na/ de'i phyir snyoms
118b3(mdo): ba zugs pa zhes bya'o// mngon par 'du gyi byed pa gang gdang mnyam 'gyi skye ba yang de dang mnyam tho'o// kyi skye la gang dang mnyam pa sems can thams cad kyang de dang mnyam so// sems can thams cad gang dang mnyam
118b4(mdo): chos thams cad kya de dang mnyam ste/ mnyam pa nyid des snyoms dbar zhugs pas na/ den phyir rnams par zhugs pa zhes bya/ bya rgyab gang dang mnyam pa kyi 'byung ba 'ang de mnyam 'o// 
118b5(mdo): sprom pa par chugs pa zhes bya'o// kyi 'byung ba gang dang mnyam pa dngos po byed pa'angab de dang ma nyam mo/ dngos po myeng po gang dang mnyis pa/ sems can thams cad de dang mnyam mo// sems cad thams cad da
118b6(mdo): mnyam pa/ chos thams cad kyang de dang mnyam ste/ mnyam pa nyid de la nyams par zhugs pas na/ dem gyi ba snyoms par zhugs pa shes bya'o// dngos po byed pa gang 'ang mnyam pa/ nam par ngan pa dang dang mnyim
118b7(mdo): rnam pa da bkang batsham lamams can ma cad kya da / sems ca dmas bdag sa sa / ma thamad/ 
119a1(mdo): snyoms par 'azhugs pa zhes bya'o// rang gi sems mnyam pas/ sems cad thams cad kyi sems mnyam pa nyid de/ de la zhugs pas nas/ de'i phyir snyoms par 'jug pa zhes bya'o// ban par byed la dang / phan par/ 
119a2(mdo): gyi byed pa thams cad la snyoms zhing / sa dpan ni sems/ chu dang mnyam pa'i sems/ me dang mnyam pa'i sems/ rlung dang mnyam pa'i sems/ nas klu dang mnyam pa'i sems te/ khyim ze phyi sadzangs par gnas shing / myi g.yo bar
119a3(mdo): gyurd pa// spyod lam thams cad du mnyam par gzhag pa/ pyod lam ma bcos po// rang bzhin gyis snyoms par zhugs pa/ myi rgod pa/ myig yed pa/ mu cor myi smra pa/ tshig ma 'chal pa/ don shes pa/ chog shes pa/ 
119a4(mdo): rgyas shes pa/ chod shes pa/ dus man shes pa/ 'jig rten bams cad kyi rjes su snyegs shing 'jig rten dang ma 'dres pa/ 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad las 'das pa/ nyon mongs pa thams cad dang
119a5(mdo): 'dres pa/ 'du 'dzi ni na yang spyod lam dben pa ste/ de ste bu'i chos sa gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ mnyam par gzhag pa'i gnas kyang myi 'dor la/ 'jig rtend gi bya ba thams
119a6(mdo): du yang snang ste/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i thabs dang shes rab kyis mngon par bsgrubs pa'i bsam gtan gi pha rosad tu phyind pa zhes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa'i thabs ni gang zhe
119a7(mdo): nad gang byang chul sems dpa' mnyam par gzhog pa na/ sems can la lta ba'i phyir snying rje chen po'i dmyigs pa la sems 'dogs la 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i thabs shes bya'o// rab tu zhi bar gsam gtan du byed pa
119a8(mdo): 'di na de'i shes rab so// gang byang chub sems dpa mnyam par gnon yan sangs rgyas kyi ye ges la rton pa 'di na de'i thangs so// gang byang chub sems dpa' mnyam par gnog nga sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la rton
119b1(mdo): pa 'di ni de'i thabs so ka rmo gang la yang myi gnas par bsam gtan byed pa 'di ni de' shes rab bo// gang byang chub sems dpa' mnyam par gzhog pa na dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung pa la lta pa 'di ni de'i thabs so// 
119b2(mdo): gang chos kyi dbyings dbyer myed par bsam gtan byed pa 'di ni de'i shes rab pa'o/ gang byang chub sems dpal mnyam par gzhog pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi sku'i rgyan mngon du byed pa 'di ni de'i thabs so// gang chos
119b3(mdo): sku dbyer myed par bsam gan byed pa 'di ni de'i shes rab pa'o// gang byang chub sems dpa' mnyam par gzhog pa na/ sangs rgyas kyi gsung tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs la sems pa 'di ni de'i thabs so// gang chos nyid brjod
119b4(mdo): du byed par bsam gtan byed pa 'di ni de'i shes rabya ba'o// gang byang chub sems dpa' mnyam par gzhog pa na/ sems rdo rje lta bur byin gyis rlom pa 'di ni de'i thabs so// gang rang bzhin
119b5(mdo): kis g.yeng par myed par tha bas gtan byed pa 'di ni de'i shes rab go// gang mnyam par gzhog pan/ sngon gyi smon sam gyis sems can yongs su sbyin par byin gyis rlob pa 'di ni de'i
119b6(mdo): thabs so// gang sems can thams cad la bdag myed par bsam gtan byed pa 'di ni de'i shes po3/ gang mnyam par gnon pan/ dge ba yim pa thams cad sdug par daphyogs te bsam gtan byed
119b7(mdo): 'di ni de'i thabs so// gang dge ba'i rtsa ba'i gnas nam ka dang mtshungs par bsam gtan byed pa 'di ni de'i shes pa'o// gang mnyam par gzhog pa na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa mngon du
119b8(mdo): byed pa 'di ni de'i thabs so// gang zhig nam mkha' dang mtshungs par bsam gtan bye ba 'di ni de'i shes rab po// gang mnyam par gzhag pa na/ byang chub kyi snying po'i bkod pa sa dmyigs pa 'dun
120a1(mdo): de'i thabs so// gang nyon mongs pa thams cad zhi bar bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan byed pa 'di ni de'i shes rab bo// gang mnyam par gzhog pa na/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar 'dod pa 'di ni de'i thabs so// 
120a2(mdo): gang 'askor ba yang byed/ bya rgo pa yang myed par bsam gtan byed pa 'di ni de'i shes rab bo// gang byang chub sems dpa' mnyam par gnon pa na/ byang chu gros mas yan sag gi yogs sa rnam par phyi g.yengs pa mthos
120a3(mdo): byed pa 'di ni de'i thabs so// gang nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis mkhyen pa/ sems dang ldan pa dang / sems da gyi ldan pa dang / 'du shes myed pa dang / 'du shes
120a4(mdo): yongs su shes pa ji snyed pa de dag bsas pa'i phyir// byang chub sems dpal thams cad kyi nges par byar ba dang mthun par rnam pa gtad byed pa na de'i zhes rab ste/ de sA bu dang ldan pa'i byang rgyal sems dpa'
120a5(mdo): ni mam gtan gyi pha ro mad tu phyin pa myi zad pa yin no// bdud mas cad kyis kyang des grags kyi snyed cing / des sangs rgyas kyi ni ma chos thams cad kyi snod kyang nye bar gnas pa yin te/ 
120a6(mdo): thams cad ma byen pa'i ye shes kyang 'thob bo// bsam gtan gyi zad pa zhi pa 'di bsnyen pa na/ byang rgyab sems dpa' stsal zhi nyis ste nga nyi pa'i smod pa'i ting nge 'dzin thos par gyur te/ rtsom phyir ting nge 'dzod
120a7(mdo): pam smon ma zhes bya snyen 'dzid ste ste dper na/ nyis 'ar ba nga/ rna ba dang / ma mi ma dang / mar 'a ldan pa dang / me'i rnamam sa cad thog man po 'gyung ngo // de bzhin tu byang
120a8(mdo): dgas nyi ma'i sngon ma'i ting nge 'dzad pasan/ ya rabs dang / nye'i pa'i zhes rab thams cad shes rab kyi snang bris kyis mnan te/ bral ba dang / bya rnal pa thams cad kyi nas ras dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi
120b1(mdo): ma gyi na ni tshe sa da yun pa// kyi shes dpar byed da/ sa kyi phung pomasarnamapa 'dzin pa rnam dang / ras ma
120b2(mdo): ngami byed pa dang // rgyas bcad rtse mor bubargyad nyin mozhes/ dran pa ni mi stobs nams rab tu 'jos pa stobs bcu 'a'adas pa las dang ldan pa dang ga
120b3(mdo): da/ na ldan ban 'dzin pa ni btan pa'i rang ban // kun ma#
120b4(mdo): dang/ rgyanas byed pa/ skan shing than pa nga/ ldan dag tshun sem
121a1(mdo): phyi zlog pa dang ldog pa skyed pa dang / byis kyi 'dus dang bdag byed pa dag dang / rtan tu ston pa yings pa 'dun pa dang // rtag tu mtshan byed rgyag tu phyi slo dang // gnas par bsam gtan gyis kyi chags dang / rdo rjo
121a2(mdo): chu'i ting / ma ni la bags dngangs pa padang // bya ras sa sa rnam sa dag pa dang // nges papa semams cad tsas sa/ 
121a3(mdo): pa na pan tan 'jus pa dang // dran rtogs zugs shes rab sngab pa dang // stongs pa da/ na kyi byed pa dang / ston pa dang den pa mchong pa dang // 'dzin pa zhes kyang dran nyid dzid// rgyad kyim dang me
121a4(mdo): pa'i rnam par dag la 'jug pa dang // btang snyoms gnyis mapa dang // chos don chos byed ye shes ta sa la// kyi 'khrugs/ pa rang mi shes rgya mtsho dang // 'gro ga cim byed rnam par nus pa
121a5(mdo): rnam par thos pa'i ye shes rabang bye nga// rdo rje rgyam mtshad kyi po pad sa dang // pang sa 'das dang 'jidig rten chos bras dang / gso ba zhes bya ba'i ting la ning dang // rdo rjes bu'i ting nge lan
121a6(mdo): gdang // dpa' bar 'gro zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/ sangs rgyas dgongs dang de bzhin gyi 'khrugs dang // gzi 'jid can dang gzi brjid 'od gzer dang // rnam par grol pa'i ye shes mchog sbyin dang // sangs rgyas rgyan
121a7(mdo): rnams shim bkod pa dang // kun tu snang dang sangs rgyas zhing dag dang // sems can bsam par rab tu 'jug pa dang // mgu byed shi nang tu mgu byed ting 'dzin dang // byang chub lam ki rjes su mthun pa dang // ba rom
121b1(mdo): byin brgyan gtsug na rin po che// byang chub yan lag me tog sbyin pa dang // rnam par thos pa'i 'bras bu sbyin pa ste// gyi 'chi dbyangs dang dbyigs byed rlung bzhin 'gro// rin che mtha' dang rgya mtsho'i shugs 'dzin dang / 
121b2(mdo): ri dang brag rnams rdob par byed pa dang // rdzu 'phrul don chen yang dag skyed pa dang // sangs rgyas dpag tu myed pa mthong ba dang // thos pa thams cad 'dzin dang myi g.yeng dang // skad cig gcig sa ye shes sbyin pa dang / yon tan
121b3(mdo): mtha' yas rgya mapo rnam das// de ltar ting 'dzin 'di dag mtha' yas dpag myed de// bsam gtan bye ba khrag khrig dag gi pha rol song / byang chub sems dasa'adas pa mchog rab 'jigs byed pa// brtan mchon sems dpa'
121b4(mdo): chen po ting 'dzin rnam padag rtogs/ btsun pa sha ra da ti'i bu/ 'dzinabyang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan gyi zad pa zhes bya'o// / de nas tshe dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i dus byang chub sems dpa' blo bras
121b5(mdo): mya zad pa la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa rnams kyi bsam gtan gyi zad pa 'di ni khyod kyi legs/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi zhes rab kyi zad pas brtsams
121b6(mdo): te// ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab myi zad par 'gyur ba khyod spobs par gyis shig/ blo gros myi zad pas smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyang myi zad
121b7(mdo): ma yin te/ shes rab de 'i rnam pa ni ji ste bu/ 'jug pa ni tsi zhe na// thos pa ni dzi ba'o// tshul bzhin yid la byed pa ni 'jug pa'o// thos pa yang rnam pa ni ji lta nu// 'jug pa ni tsi ni na/ byang chub sems dbu
121b8(mdo): rnams kyi thos pa'i rnam pa ni brgyad cu ni ste 'di lta ste/ bdud pa'i rnam pa dang / bsam pa'i rnam pa dang / ldag pa'i rnam pa dang / sbyor ba'i rnam pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rnam pa dang / nga rgyas myed pa'i tshe/ 
122a1(mdo): pa dang / bag yod pa'i rnal pa dang / gus par byed pa'i rnam pa dang / 'jan par 'dzind pa'i rnam pa dang / bka' blo bode pa'i rnam pa dang / bsnyen nyung byed pa'i rnam pa dang / na blanas te nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / yid la byed
122a2(mdo): ba'i rnam par dang / rnam par myi g.yeng ba'i rnam pa dang / gnas kyi rnam pa dang / rin po cher 'du shes pa'i rnam pa dang / sman du shes pa'i rnam pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i nad thams cad zhibar byed pa'i rnam pa dang / dran pa'i snod kyi rdo
122a3(mdo): pa dang / rtogs pa shes pa'i rnam pa dang / blo gros 'dod pa'i rnam pa dang / blos 'jug pa 'i rnam pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos la myi ngoms par nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / gtong ba spel ba'i rnam pa dang / dus zhing cing shes pa'i rno ba dang/ 
122a4(mdo): mang du thom pas ston pa'i rnam pa dang / sti ltung du byas te dga' ba skyed da par byed pa'i rnam pa dang sus bde ba'i rnam pa dang / sems ras tu dga' ba'i rnam pa dang / kyi skyo bar nyad pa'i rnam pa dang / dor nyid
122a5(mdo): pa'i rnam pa dang / chos nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / nan tan nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / gzhan gos bstan pa nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / choms thos pa'i nyan pa yi rnam pa dang / mngon par shen pa'i rnam pa dang / 
122a6(mdo): theg pa gzhan sa 'dod pa myed pa rnam pa dang / pha ro sad tu phyi ning pa nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sde snod nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / bsdu pa'i dngos po nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / thabs mkhas pa nyan pa'i rdzo ba nga
122a7(mdo): tshangs pa'i gnas pa'i nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / dran pa dang / shes bzhin nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / skye ba la mkhas pa nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / nagyi skye ga la mkhas pa nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / myi sdug pa'i rnam pa dang / byams pa'i
122a8(mdo): rnam pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i rnam pa dang / kyi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag byed pa'i rnam yangang / ni pa'i rnam pa dang / stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dang / mtshan ma byed pa'i ji
122b1(mdo): pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i rnam pa dang / mngon par 'du myi byed pa'i rnam pa dang / dge ba mngon par 'du byed pa'i rnam pa dang / bden pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i rnam pa dang / chud myi zon pa'i rnam pa dang / rang gi khan las pa'i rnam pa dang / 
122b2(mdo): rang gi sems bsrung ba'i rnam pa dang / brtson 'grus myi gtong pa rnam pa dang / chos la nges par sems pa'i rnam pa dang // nyon mongs pa'i gnyen po'i rnam pa dang / rang gi phyogs bsrung ba'i rnam pa dang / pha rold kyi phyogs dang nyon
122b3(mdo): mongs pa tshar gcod pa'i rnam pa dang / nor bdun yang dag par 'dra ba'i rnam pa dang / dbus pa thams cad gcod pa'i rnam pa dang / 'dzangs pas bsngags pa'i rnam pa dang / mkhas pa mngon par dga' ba'i rnam pa dang / 
122b4(mdo): 'phags pas kun shes pa'i rnam pa dang / 'phags pa'i ma yin pa dang / par byed pa'i rnam pa dang / bden pa'i mthong ba'i rnam pa dang / phung po'i smo rno par spongs pa'i rnam pa dang / 'dus byas kyi skyon la yongs su
122b5(mdo): 'jam 'i rnam pa'i dang / don la rton pa'i rnam pa dang / chos la rton pa/ 'i rnam pa dang / ye shes la rton pa'i ye shes rnam pa dang / nges/ ba'i don gyi dod sde la rton pa'i rnam pa dang / sdig pa thams cad
122b6(mdo): byi bya ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag dang gzhan la phan pa'i rnam pa dang / legs bas byas pa'i las kyi rnam pa dang / myi 'byor pa'i rnam pa dang / khyad par byal 'grom pa'i rnam pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos zas
122b7(mdo): cang 'thob pa'i rnam pa ste/ de dag ni byang chub sems kyi pa' rnams kyi thos pa rnam pa brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi zhes bya'o// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'o de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyas bzhin yid byed pa la 'jug pa
122b8(mdo): gnyis te/ sum bcu rtsa gnyis gang na na 'dis ste/ ni gnas sa 'jug pa dang / sman mthong rnam par dbyed pa'i 'dug pa dang / sems sus su rung las 'jug pa dang / sus dben pas 'jug pa dang / sems da
123a1(mdo): gro mo 'jug pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung bas 'jug dang / bden pa'i rjes su mthun pa la 'jug pa dang / tshad myed pa la 'jug pa dang / rtag pa myed pa la 'jug pa i dang / rgyu dang rkyen la 'jug pa dang / bad/ 
123a2(mdo): myed pa dang / sems can myed pa dang / srog myed pa dang gang zag myed pas 'jug pa dang / 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang / gnas pa myed pa la 'jug pa dang / gyi 'pho zhing rgyu dang 'bras bu chud byi za ba la 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / 
123a3(mdo): mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa 'dris par byed pa la 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa mngon sum du myi byed pa la 'jug pa dang / bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms pa
123a4(mdo): 'dug pa skyed pa'i rgyas su 'jug pa dang / bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang kyis kyi skye las 'jug pa dang mngon par shes pa'i ye shes skyed pas 'jun pa dang / zag pa zad pa mngon
123a5(mdo): thul tu byed pa ma yin pas 'dug pa dang / nang rab tu rtog pas/ rkyen su dang / ngos pa gyu pa kyi 'dun pa jug/ 'dus byas rgyun yongs su mngam pas 'dug pa dang / rgyalas byas gyi
123a6(mdo): ma mngon sum du byed par 'jug pa dang / sems can 'amasacan la bdun byed paras sor rton pas 'jug pa dang / snying rje chen rgyan tong gas 'jug pa nga / skyeb thams cad sa 'jog par smra
123a7(mdo): 'dun pa dang / rtag tu bamams bzhin du shes pa sa thams cad yongs kyi 'dzin pa 'dun pa dang / yid byung zhing 'dod chags ngas thas par 'jug pa dang // 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos kyang mngon gsum tu myi byed par
123a8(mdo): 'jug pa dang / 'dod pa'i rga ba'i yon tan yal par 'dor pal 'jug bu dang / chos kyi dgal ba mya na tong pas 'jug pa dang / sbom pa dang / rnam par rtog pa thams cad spong las 'jug pa dang / thabs ma 'am
123b1(mdo): smos pa dang / rnam par rtog pa gyi spong ba ma 'jug po ste/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de dag ni byang chub mas kyi tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa sa gsum su rtsa gnyis zhes bya'o// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang tshul bzhin zhes bya ba de ni
123b2(mdo): rigs pa'i tshig go// de ni tshus kyi tshig go// de ni sma'i tshig go/ de ni kha'i tshig go// de'i ci/ de ni rgyu'i tshig go// de ni rkyen kyi tshig go// de ni myo klog pa'i tshig go// de ni myi 'gas pa'i tshig go// de ni btang snyoms kyi
123b3(mdo): tshibra go// de ni len byed tshig go// de ni dor ba myed pa'i tshig go/ de ni rten myed pa'i tshig go// de ni myi gnas pa'i tshig go// de ni ma gra yos pa'i tshig go// de ni rnam yang ma g.yos pa'i tshig go// de ni spro ba tags
123b4(mdo): pa myong ba'i tshig go// de ni mnyam pa nyid kyi tshig go// de ni/ mnyam pa myed pa'i tshig go// de ni bden pa'i tshig go/ de ni yang dag pa'i tshin no// de ni myi 'gyur ba'i tshi go// de ni phyir bya ba myed
123b5(mdo): ba'i tshig go// de ni zhi ba'i tshig go// de ni rab tu zhi ba'i tshig gi/ de ni nye bar zhi ba'i tshig go// de ni spros pa myed pa'i tshig go/ de ni gdeg bya'i tshig go// de ni gzhag pa myed pa'i tshig go// de ni mcha
123b6(mdo): ba myed pa'i tshig go// de ni sdug pa'i myed pa'i tshig go// de ni phyir dbyung du myed pa'i tshig go// de ni gnyen po myed pa'i tshig go// de ni dam pa'i chen no// de ni de kho na'i tshig go// de ni de bzhin nyid kyi cho ga go// 
123b7(mdo): de ni ma nor pa de bzhin nyid kyi tshig go// de ni gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi tshig go// de ni ji lta ba bzhin gyi tshig go// de ni chud kyi za ba'i tshig go// de ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i tshig go// de ni dus gsum
123b8(mdo): 'i nyid kyi tshig go// de ni dus gsuM yongs su ma chad pa'i tshig go// de ni gzugs la rnam par shes pa myi gnas pa'i tshig go// de ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes/ 
124a1(mdo): pa gyi gnas pa'i tshig no// de ni sa'i 'ams la rnam par shes pa gnas pa'i tshig go// de bzhin du de ni chos khrims dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par shes pa myi gnas pa'i tshig go// den gyin ngas / 
124a2(mdo): gzugs dang / m-ig rnam par shes pa'i khams la myi gnas pa'i tshig go// de bzhin ne nin pa dang / sgra dang ldan pa'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / snga dang / dri dang / gA'i rnam par shes pa'i 'ams dang / sde dang / rod
124a3(mdo): sde'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lus dang / reg bya dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / side dang / chos dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la myi gnas pa'i tshig go// de ni don la rton pa'i tshig go// de ni
124a4(mdo): chos sa rton pa'i tshig go// de ni ye shes la rton pa'i tshig ko// de ni nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde la rton pa'i tshig go// btsun pa sha ra dwa 'i bu gzhan yang tshul bzhi na/ zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad do// 
124a5(mdo): de ci'i phyir zhing/ ji ster bdag sa bdag myed pa de bzhin du/ chosathams cad rig pas mthong zhing // ji ltar sems cad la bdag myed pa de bzhin du/ chos thams cad rigs pas mthong na
124a6(mdo): re sngar mthong ba ni tshul bzhin mdzod pa'o// 'khom ba'i khams kyi tshul gnan gang yin pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings kyi tshus bzhin yang de yin no zhes gang gis de skar mtshungs shing bye brag myed par mthong ba de ni/ 
124a7(mdo): tshus bzhin rab tu myong po zhes bya'o// gang gis kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin dang rnam par bya ba'i rang bzhin mtshungs shing bye brag myed bzod pa de ni/ chus banin rab tu sbyor ba zhes bya'o// gang rigs pa rang
124a8(mdo): rigs par myi sems pa de ni chus bzhin rab tu spyom pa yin te/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu mdor na byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bzhin sbyor bci snyed pa de dag thams cad kyi gnas ni sems can no// de sems cad gyi gnas
124b1(mdo): kyang kyi spong ba ya/ chos kyi gnas kyang 'khrugs par gyi byed do// de ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bzhin sa 'jug pa'i sbyong ba zhes bya'o// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lce de'i chos kyi rnam pa dang / zos pa'i rnam pa dang / tshul
124b2(mdo): byanini su 'dug pani sbyor bu'i rgya mthun par ni zhes rabs bya'o// del shes rab ni 'grogs pa bcu drug dang san cig kyi gnas te/ 'udu drug po dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa'i 'grogs pa dang san b+h+yo ga nas bgar
124b3(mdo): rgyal skyengs po rnam pas shes rgyu nga nga dang gzugs dang / kye mched drug dang / pa dang / rabadang / sred pa dang / yin pa dang / spong ba dang / skyil dang / gsheso 'dregs pa dang ni cig gyi gnas
124b4(mdo): ma rig pa 'gog pa'i 'grags pa dang sman cog phyi gnas so// de bzhin tu 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / mying dang / gzugs sgra dang skye mched phyu/ reg pa dang / tshor pa dang / sred pa dang / len pa
124b5(mdo): srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi 'gog pa 'i 'grogs pa dang ldan cen/ myi gnas so// 'jig 'tshogs sa skal ba 'i 'phrogs pa dang snyan cig kyi gnas pa nasa?/ 'jigs tshogs la lta pa'i rtsa ba
124b6(mdo): las kyang / la gyung ba drun bcu rtsa gnyis po mi bar dan na zugs po dang / san cig kyi kun so// yod dpa na gyi 'khrugs pa dang sun cig phyiganas pa nas/ 'dzin rten rgyas pa rnyed pa dang / ma rnyed pa dang / 
124b7(mdo): snyan pa dang / myi snyan pa dang / smad pa dang / stobs dang bden pa dang / sdug bsngal gyi bar gyi grogs pa dang sman myi gnas so// rlo za dang / 'on du 'dzind pa dang / 'chab pa dang / yongs su gdung ba dang / phra dag dang
124b8(mdo): ser sna dang / sgyu dang g.yo dang / ngo tsha myed pa dang / khrel myed pa dang / 'ongs pa dang / cod pa dang / rgyags pa dang / zan myed pa dang / nga rgyas dang sman pa'i nga rgyas dang / nga rgyas sas kyang nga rgyas dang / nga'o snyam
125a1(mdo): brgyas dang / cung zad snyam pa'i brgyal dang / mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang / log pa'i nga rgyas rnams kyi 'phrogs pa'i dang / lhan cig myi gnas pa ras/ nye la mnyan mongs pa thams cad kyi bar gyi 'grogs pa dang ldan cin/ 
125a2(mdo): myi gnas so// 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi kun nas snang ba phra mo dang / sbom po dang / chu r+ya dang / 'bring po dang / chen po'i 'grogs pa rang skan cig myi gnas pa nas/ nyon mongs pa'i kun nas sdang ba thams/ 
125a3(mdo): da kyi bar gyi 'grogs pa dang ldan cig gyi gnas so// gti mug kyi mun pa dang / rab rib kyi ming rton dang / sgrib pa dang / chod pa'i 'grogs pa dang lhan cig kyi gnas pa nas/ nyams par 'byung ba'i mdang 'thun
125a4(mdo): ma'i chos kun nas sdang ba thams cad kyi bar gyi 'grogs pa dang lhan cig/ myi gnas se// 'dod pa dang / 'thab mo'i rnyog pa dang / phung po nga/ nyon mongs pa dang / 'chi bdag dang / sA'i bu'i bdud rnams
125a5(mdo): lhan cig myi gnas pa nas/ bdud kyi las thams cad kyi bar dang lhan cig myi gnas so// bdag dang / sems can dang / srog/ dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes
125a6(mdo): dang / shed bur 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa dang lhan cig myi gnas pa nasa'adzin pa la mngon par zhen pa thams cad kyi bar dang lhan cig kyiganas so// las kyi sgrib pa dang / chos kyi slob pa dang / 
125a7(mdo): nyon mongs pa'i smi'i pa dang / sba ba'i sgo sa dang / 'gro ba'i spros pa dang / rnam par sbyid pa'i spring dang / shes bya'i sgrib pa dang / skan cin rgyo gnas pa nas/ bag chags dang / mtshams spyor pa thams cad kyi bar
125a8(mdo): snyan cig myi gnas so// rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / yongs su rtog pa dang / mtshan ma dang / dmyigs pa dang / mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / bye brag phyed pa dang / rnam par rig pa rnams
125b1(mdo): rang ldan cig kyi gnas pa nas/ matud pa dang / sgro btags pa thams cad kyi bar dang / lhan cig myi gnas so// bdag dang / rtag pa dang / gtsang ba dang / bde ba'i 'phrogs pa dang / sman cig myi gnas pa nas/ byin gyi
125b2(mdo): ci la ga thams cad kyi bar dang / yun cig kyi gnas so// sems can gyi sems kyi 'apyod pa brgyad rdzo 'di stong dang lhan cig myi gnas pa nas/ chos ma kyi phung po brgyad khri bani grong gi par dang lhan cig kyi gnas so// ser snga dang nartos
125b3(mdo): pa dang / 'chal pa'i tshul khrims dang / gnod sems dang / bzod pa dang / le lo nga / brtson 'grus dang / rnam par g.yeng ba dang / bsam gtan dang / 'chas pa'i shes rab dang / shes rab dang / sman
125b4(mdo): cig myi gnas pa nas/ pha rolan tu phyind pa'i phyogs dang / myi mthun / pa'i phyogs sems pa dang / lhan cig mya gnas so// nges par / ma nges pa dang / yang ba dag pa dang / log pa dang / dge pa dang / 
125b5(mdo): byed dge ba dang / ba na tho ba dang / bcas pa dang / kha na mtho ba myed pa de/ zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zad pa myed pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / 'jig rtend pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa
125b6(mdo): bzang po dang / ngan pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / 'khor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa dang / lhan cin myi gnas pa nas/ chos thams cad kyi myi mthun pa'i phyogs dang / gnyes
125b7(mdo): po'i bar dang lhan cig myi gnas so// theg pa tha dad pa dang / sems can pa dad pa dang / zhing 'a dad pa dang / sangs rgyas tha dad pa dang / chos tha dad pa dang / dge 'dud ma ngad ba dang / sun cin gyi gnas pa shA la dang thams cad
125b8(mdo): na sud cin byig rim zo// phyogs byadang / shes pa dang / rna shes dang / rje'i dang / don ma/ na cin kyi rganamarnams spangs byeng ba thams cad kyi kya dang san
126a1(mdo): gyi gnas so// shes rab ni gang rgyu ba myed pa lus myed pa/ mtshan nyid myed pa/ maman tsha myed pa dang / de ni mtshan ma dang / yid sa byed pa thams cad rang sems dang / yid dang rnam par shes pa dang gnas dang / 
126a2(mdo): kyi mtshan pa nga / can pa dang / ba dang pa dang mun gyig kyi gnas te/ btsun 'gar tam su shes rab ni 'grogs pa bcu rgyan po dedag dang sun can gyi gnas so// pamanas pa thothos kyi ma pa
126b1(mdo): na/ sa byed/ skye du na/ ma yin no// sgyu ma'i rang bzhin / ma shes pa'i rang bzhid pa du yi / 'dis ma pan gyi
126b2(mdo): rkyen song yang bdag ma yinasems can ma yin/ nan/ gsol ma 'i ga byan ma yin no// rkyen yo kyi dang canan nang yin paphung po rnams kyi
127a1(mdo): zhes bya'o// phung po rnams ni sprul pa lta bu ste/ sprul pa yang bdag ma yin/ sems cad ma yin/ srog ma yin/ gso ba ma yin// skyes bu ma yin/ gang zag ma yin no// sprul pa'i rang bzhin gang lI pa phung po rnams kyi rang
127a2(mdo): bzhin yang de yin te/ gang 'di la mkhas pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i phung po la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// phung po zhes bya ba de ni 'jig rten te/ 'jig rten yang 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid do// 'jig rten gyi khams rang bzhin gang yin
127a3(mdo): ba de rang bzhin gyis myi rtag pa'o// rang bzhin gyis sdug bsdus pa'o// rang bzhin gyis stong pa'o// rang bzhin gyis bdag myed pa'o// rang bzhin gyis zhi nga ste/ gang 'di la mkhas pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i phung po
127a4(mdo): la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa'i khams pa mkhas pa gang zhe na/ gang chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa'i ye shes so// / chos kyi dbyings ni sa'i khas yin mod kyi/ chos kyi dbyings sra ba'i mtshan
127a5(mdo): nyid ni ma yin no// chos dbyings chu'i khams yin mod kyi/ chos kyi rgya ngas rlan pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no// chos kyi dbyings me'ims yin mod kyi/ chos kyi dbyings yongs su smyin par byed pa'i mtshan
127a6(mdo): nyid ni ma yin no// chos kyi dbyings rlung ni khams yin mod kyi/ chos kyi dbyings g.yo ba'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no// chos kyi dbyings phyig gi khams yin mod kyi/ chos kyi dbyings su ba'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin/ chos kyi byings
127a7(mdo): na pa'i 'amam yin pad kyi/ sa kyi dbyings kya pam mtshan cad nam yin no// rtsab tshungs lnga'i 'ams yid mod kyi/ chos kyi myong ba sngob pacom tsha sbyid da do/ rab kyi byangs so si po yin mod tu ma
127a8(mdo): byas kyang ba byed pa'i mtshan nyid min/ chos kyi dbyings sus kyi mam can gyi/ sa kyi kyang sa tham ma na nyid ni ma mad / sumapas 'o kyis kya tsangs mam pan
127b1(mdo): da kyi/ rab kyi dbyings rnam so rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no// chol kyi dbyings snga ma rnam par shes pa'i khams yin po kyi/ kyi gyi man po sa nom par rig pa'i mtshan nyid nam yin no// mas kyi gyis
127b2(mdo): lce'i rnam par shes pa dzin yo // chom kyi dbyings rlo mo song rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin do// chos kyi dbyings sus kyi rnam pa shes pa'i khams yin mo rkye/ cho sa dbyings chen pa ma sor rnam par rig pa
127b3(mdo): mtshan nyid ni mi yin na/ chos kyi dbyings yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'ams yin mod kyi chos kyi dbyings rlo su mngasor rnam par / rnam macad nyid ni na do// chos kyi dbyings gzugs kyi khams
127b4(mdo): yin mod kyi// chos myu byangs phyin gi rnam par shes pas rnam pamarin par bya bani mtshan nyid ni ma yin no// chos kyi byings sgra yinamam min dzad kyi/ ma kyi dbying smra rjes par shes pas dzab mi
127b5(mdo): ma na yid/ sa sa kyi/ sa rnayinas nga shes sa ma / nyidadam zhi
127b6(mdo): byangs ste'i ma shes pastanas pa bdag par byang ma na/ chos kyi dbyings sus kyirnam par shes pas rnas par rig par bya bamamatshan nyid ma yin no// tshe gyings chos kyi sa
127b7(mdo): kyi/ rnam kyi dbyings yi kyi ma par shes pas rnas pa marig par bya ba mtshan nyid ma yin no// mam gyir zungs gzugs kyi rnams yan med kyi// rdo bra gyings gzugs su rnapa yang rig pa'i mtshan ta
128a1(mdo): yin no// chos kyi dbyings spu'i khams yin mod kyi/ chos kyi dbyings sbrang rnam par rig par bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no// chos kyi dbyings dri'i khams yin mod kyi/ chos kyi dbyings dri dam par rig pa'i mtshan
128a2(mdo): nyid ni ma yin no// chos kyi dbyings ro'i khams yin mod kyi/ chos kyi dbyings rong rnam par rig pa yi mtshan nyid ni ma yid no// chos kyi dbyings reg bya'i khams yin mod kyi/ chos kyi dbyings reg bya rnam par rig par
128a3(mdo): rig pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no// chos kyi dbyings kyi chos kyi khams ma yin mod kyi/ chos kyi dbyings chos su rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no// chos kyi dbyings dang bdag gi khams de ni mtshungs so// chos
128a4(mdo): dbyings dang / 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi 'am 'ang / gzugs nyid byed pa'i khams de ni mtshungs so// chos kyi dbyings dang / 'khor ba'i rnam pa dang / mya ngan sa sa'adas pa'i dbyings de ni mtshungs so// sa
128a5(mdo): dbyings dab sems can gyi khams da nam ma' mi khams dang chos khri bya ches kyi khams de ni mtshungs so// de ci'i phyirade mtshungs zhe na/ stong pa nyid du mtshungs pas na de ni ma tshungs so// 
128a6(mdo): man ma myed par mtshungs pa dang/ smon pa byed par mtshungs pa dang / mngon par 'du gyi byed pa ma tshungs pangs skye byed par mtshungs pa 'byung ba byed par mtshungs pa dang / rjem lo byed bur mtshungs
128a7(mdo): dang/ chos thams cad ma dad pa myed par mtshungs pa dang / sgrib pa myed par mtshungs pa dang / nam mkha'i khams su mtshungs pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa ni dbyings su mtshungs byas/ de dag mtshungs pa'o// 'dus bya
128a8(mdo): kyims sa 'jug pa dang / 'dus ma byas kyi 'amal la 'jug pa chad byed de/ gang bstadad pa des chos kyi dbyings kyi nus kyi sgo nas 'jug pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i khams la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// des byad
128b1(mdo): byang chub sems dpa'i skye mched la mkhas pa gang zhe na/ gang chos kyi skye mched la 'jug pa'i ye shes te/ chos kyi skye mched ni myig gi skye mched yin mod kyi/ chos kyi skye mched lta ba'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no// chos kyi skye mched rna
128b2(mdo): bu'i skye mched yin mod kyi/ chos kyi skye mched nyan pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no// da kyi skye mched yin mod kyi chos kyi skye mched sdom pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no// chos kyi skye mched lce'i skye mched medado kyi/ chos kyi skye
128b3(mdo): ngomached myong bu'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no// chos kyi skye mched lus kyi skye mched yin mod kyi/ chos kyi mched nom pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no// chos kyi skye mched yid kyi skye mched yin mod kyi/ chos kyi skye mched
128b4(mdo): chos rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no// chos kyi skye mched gzugs kyi skye mched yin mod kyi/ chos kyi skye mched myig ni// rnam par shes pas rnam par rig par bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni yin
128b5(mdo): do gcom gyi skye mched lnga'i myi mched yin ma tu skyemedan pa'i rnam 'ar shes pa stan pa par rig par bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin do// / rjes kyi skye mamed dri'i skye mched yin meng kyi/ 
128b6(mdo): ros kyi skye mched sna'i rnam par shes pas rnam par rig par bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no/ chos kyi skye mched ro'i skye mched ma yin mod kyi/ chos kyi skye mched lha'i rnam par shes pas rnam par rig par bya ba'i mchun
129a1(mdo): bdag dang bdag gi stong ngo // de bzhin du na pa'i skye mched dang / mA 'i skye mched dang / sde'i skye mched dang / lus kyi skye mched dang / yid kyi skye mched dang / gzugs kyi skye mched dang / sku'i skye mched dang dri'i skye
129a2(mdo): ched dang / ro gyi skye mched dang / 'og bye'i skye skye chos kyi skye mched kyang / bdag ra byong ba kris stong ngo // rlom ldan 'das kyis ji skad du phyog ni bdagu dang / bdag gis stong ste/ de ni de'i rang bzhin no// de bzhin
129a3(mdo): dang / sna dang / s+ye dang / sus dang / yid ni bdag dang bdag bris stong ste/ di ni de'i ring po zhin no/ de bzhin du gzugs dang / sgra ngo/ ts+li / ro dang / reg gyi dang / chos rnams ni bdag dang / bdag gis
129a4(mdo): ste/ 'di ni de'i rang bzhin no zhes gsungs pa'o// 'di ltaragang skye mched rnams 'bri bar myi myi byed cing myi dge ba'i chosakyang myi stsogs/ dge ba'i chos kyang 'bri bar myi byed la/ dge ba dang / 
129a5(mdo): mye dag la la 'du shes gnyis su myi 'byung ba 'di ni/ byang chub/ sems dpa'i skye mched laM mkhas pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yangaskye mched la mkhas ni/ myig gi skye mched kyi 'dod chags kyi gnas dang
129a6(mdo): gzugs kyi skye mched de/ grang myig gzugs la 'dod chags dang bral bar mthong sa / 'dod chags dang bras pa'i chos kyang mngon gsum du myed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i skye mched la mkhas
129a7(mdo): zhes bya'o// de bzhin gyi skye mched kyi sgra'i skye sand dang / sI'i skye mched kyi dri'i skye mched dang / su'i skye mched kyi ro skye mched dang / sus kyi skye mjed kyi reg bya'i skye mched dang / yid kyi skye mched kyi 'dod chags
129a8(mdo): kyi gnas dang rten ni chos kyi skye mched de/ gang yid chos las 'dod chags dang bras khar mthong sa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos kyang mngon sum du myi byed pa 'di ni ro/ byang chub sems dpal skye mched la mkhas pa
129b1(mdo): skyes bya'o// skye mched ces bya bya nI/ 'phags pa'i skye mched dang / 'phags pa mu yin tha sa 'i shing sam yang dag par ba sgri ba mi n+do/ 'phags bya sa ston pa'i skye mched ni grangs ma dang kyi mdzun pa'o// de la byang chu
129b2(mdo): sems dpa'i semasu gnas nas/ sas dang kyi mthun pa su spyod pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje chen bro skyed cing / lam gyi skye mchod kyang myi 'dor 'di ni myong rgyu'i so sos dpe'i skye mched mya mkhas pa zhes bya'o// de la bya
129b3(mdo): sa da pa'i phyi mas 'as bya chub zhi na/ 'jug pa bzhi ni byang chub sems de pa'i then pas khas pa yin te/ 'dun pa ba ni keng zhen/ grong 'di sdug thasdus shes pa dang / kun 'byong ba shes pa dang / 'gog pa shes
129b4(mdo): moshes man des sug bsngal shes pa zhes byani/ gang phung po rnams kyi skye bar shes na 'byung ba zhe bya zhem kyi na/ gang sred pa legs pang 'jos pa shes pa'o// 'don
129b5(mdo): zhes bya ba ni// ma rjes su dang / bka sa nyas rnams rgya'abyung ba'o// lam shes la zhes bya ba ni/ mnyam pa nya byor ba'i chos thams cad sa spro gyi 'dogs pa ste/ de ni byang chub
129b6(mdo): su pa'i bden pa shes pa'o/ ngas byang chub se tha dpa' 'phrogs khwa'i bdun pa ldan po de dag su u bur nas re'u dadu skye na gos kyang / semasnyananas skye pa'i phyir mngon sul du myi byed cing
129b7(mdo): sems chen nem su yongs su sbyin par byed nge/ 'di ni byang rgyul sems dpa'i byed ni la sa po sa pa zhes kyi/ gan no slong byang tshum snyoms dpa'i 'dod pa rnam pa gsum ste/ rnam pa gsum dang zhe na/ nang
129b8(mdo): kun rdzob kyi bden pa de / don dam pa'i bden pa dang / mtshan nyid kyi bden pa ni/ dris kun rjen gyi 'dem yang nga zhe na/ 'jig rten gyis da du gas mi shing dang / sgra dang / 'aras bstan pa ji snyed pa'o// don dam pa'i
130a1(mdo): kya 'a rgya sa su bya bya dang ma da pa sa du ci ded pas 'do sa su bya / 
130a2(mdo): sa dpa'i bden pas sa sa kyi'o// gnan yang bden pa das pa gnyis te/ rnamam gnyis zug med/ gang 'ding snyed kyi dre dang / dod kyi'i 'ded ma kyang kyi rdo 'i / de rjes su
130a3(mdo): smra ba ste/ gang 'di sdug bsngal gyi bden pa dang / kun 'byung gA bden pa
130a4(mdo): dang / 'gog pa'i bden pa dang / lam gyi bden pa dang / 'dzade chend kyi sa snyad dang / yi ge dang / sgra dang / brdas bstan pa ji snyed
130a5(mdo): dpa' tha snyad kyi bden pa bstan pas kyang yongs su myi skyo/ don dam pa'i bdon pa mngon sum du byed par yang myi snang la/ sems can rnams kyang yongs su smyin par byed de/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i bden pas mkhas pa zhes
130a6(mdo): bya'o// gzhan yang bden pa ni gcig ste/ gnyis su byed do// de la 'den pa gcig ni shing 'a chis thams cadangs sgro 'jogs pa byed cing / sgo ba sa su snang ba'i sems can rnams kyang 'ded pas rab tu 'jud pa/ 
130a7(mdo): pas byang chub sems dpal slo 'dogs pa'i bden pastan pas kyang gyi myos blo ba rigs pa snyed pa'i bden pa gcig bstan pa yang mngon dus du byed du skye / bco rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed pa 'dzin
130b1(mdo): byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa la mkhas pa' zhes bya 'o// gzhan yang phung po lnga ni sdug bsngal pa ste/ gang phung po lnga rnams kyi sdug bsngal gyi mtshan nyid de ni sdug bye sngal zhes bya'o// gang gi sdug bsngal gyi mtshan nyid de stong pa
130b2(mdo): rtogs pa 'di ni// sdug bsngal la sug bsngal du shes pa 'phags pa'i bden pa lo// gang phung po lnga'i sred pa'i rgyu dang / swa'i rgyu ba ka la nyal po 'di ni kun 'byung ba zhes bya'o// gang gis sred pa'i rgyu dang / lta pa'i rgyu de dag
130b3(mdo): myi sen pa dang / sgo myi 'dogs pa dang / reg par myi byed pa 'di ni/ kun 'byung ba la kun 'byung bar shes pa 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o// gang phung po lnga po dag shin zud de 'gags nas/ sngon gyi mthar myi 'byung ba dang / 
130b4(mdo): phyi ma'i mthar myi 'pho pa dang / da ltar byung bar phyin pa myed pa 'di ni 'gro ga pa la 'phags pa'i bden pa ste/ de la gang gis de ltar zhes/ shes pa 'di ni/ 'gog pa sa 'dog par shes pa 'di no// 'gog pa
130b5(mdo): la 'gog par shes pa 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o// lam gang la brten te sdug bsngal shes pa dang / kyad 'byung shes pa dang 'gog pa shes pa reg cing \u0f7f/ gnyis su myed pa'i ye shes su 'jog
130b6(mdo): pa 'di ni/ sdug bsngal 'gogabagro ba'i lam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o// kang 'di stong pa nyid du shes pa 'di ni/ lam la lam du shes pa 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o// gang gis 'phags pa'i bden
130b7(mdo): ba bzhi po 'di/ de ltar ye shes kyi shog cing / bded pa'i rtog pas kyi rtog pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang tshor ba thams cad sdug bsngal te/ 'di ni sdug bsngal zhes
130b8(mdo): bya'o// tshor ba des rnam papa' rig par shes pa 'ang ni/ sdug bsngal la sdug bsngal tu shes pa 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o// tshor ba de ni rgyu ba kas kun 'byung ba 'di ni kun 'byung ba zhes bya
131a1(mdo): kaung kis rgyu de yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa 'di ni/ kun 'byung bas kun shes pa 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o// gang tshor ba thams cad rgyun chad de/ tshor ba myed pa yang tshor zhing / tshor la 'gog pa
131a2(mdo): khang rtog pa/ sems la lta bu 'i nyid tshor ba 'gog mngon sum du yang myi byed ye yang mi 'gog pas 'gog pa 'a shes pa 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o// tshor ba gang gis bsgrubs pa'i lam de ni gzings lta bu ste/ 
131a3(mdo): gang tshor ba 'dod pa de ni lam 'dod sum yin no// 'di ni sems la du shes pa 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o// gang de ltar 'den pa bzhi po 'di dag mthong ba dang / rnam par ngan pas mnyam par mngod par rtogs pa 'di ni/ bya rgya
131a4(mdo): sems dpa'i bden pa mkhas pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang mdor na skye ba/ ni sdug bsngal ba ste// 'di ni phug bsdum pa zhes bya'o// gang // kyi skye bas rtog pa'i shes pa 'di ni/ sdug bsngas la sdug bsngal du shes
131a5(mdo): pa 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o// srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba ste/ sra pa gang yin la kun 'byung ba'o// gang srid pa 'jig pa shes pa 'di ni/ kun 'byung ba la kyang 'byung bar shes pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o// 
131a6(mdo): sa cad ni skye la byed pa kyi bye ba canags so// gangs skyes des 'anas pa brjod / nga'agon pa byed pa shes pa 'don/ 'angasum bzhes 'a 'bags pa'i 'de pa zhes bya'o// 
131a7(mdo): 'gral ba dang / 'jam pa dang / chos pa dang / rtogs pa dang / 'jug pa'i shes pa ni lams sam du shes pa 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o// gang 'den pa skyes pa 'dis 'jug cing / bden pa'i shes pas yang gyi gnas pa
131a8(mdo): 'dzin / byang chub sems dpa'i bden pas mkhas pa zhes bya'o// des byang chul sems dpa'i rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa ga zhe na 'di ste/ rgyas bzhini ma yin ba kun 'byung ba sum ma rig pa kun 'byung ngo // 
131b1(mdo): mchog pa kun 'byung ba las 'du byed kun 'byung ngo // 'du byed kun 'byung ba las rnam par shes pa kun 'byung ngo // rnam par shes pa kun 'byung ba las kyi dang gzugs kun 'byung ngo // myong dang gzugs kun 'byung ba las skye mched drug
131b2(mdo): kun 'byung ba las reg pa kun 'byung ngo // reg pa kun byung ba las tshor ba kun 'byung ngo // tshor ba kun 'byung ba las sred pa kun 'byung ngo // sred pa kun 'byung ba las len po rkyen 'byung ngo // len pa kun 'byung ba las sred pa kun 'byung
131b3(mdo): sred pa kun 'byung bas skye ba kun 'byung ngo // skye ba kun 'byung ba las/ rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid myi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'byung ste/ de ltar na sdug bsngal gyiphung po
131b4(mdo): 'ba' zhig po 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ro// g.yo ba byed pa/ byed pa byed pa bdag po skyed pa/ yongs su 'dzind bgyid pa'i cho sa ji sang nas pa can na nu 'byung ste/ gang 'di la shes pa 'dir byang chub sems dpa
131b5(mdo): rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba sa mkhas pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang dang / dge ba'i rgyu las byung ba 'am/ gyi dge bani d+h+ya las byung ba 'a gyi g.yo ba'i rgyu las byung ba 'am/ 'khor ba'i rgyu las byung ba 'am/ 
131b6(mdo): kyang na sas 'das pa'i rgyu las byung ba de dag thams cad sa sa nga bzhin du rab tu shes te sems can dbang po'i rgya sa 'jug pa chang mar byed pa de ni dbang po rmyims byung zhingasas kyi skyesas byung ba ste/ 'bras pa
131b7(mdo): 'i rgyu 'brug par byed do zhes zin pa dang mazin ba'i chos rnams ya/ gang de skar rgyu kun 'byung ba las skye ba sa mkhas pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rten cing 'brel 'byung ba la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// gnan yang rten cing
131b8(mdo): 'dres pang 'gyu sa ma pa ni/ nus pani ma yin pa 'gags pas mazhi phra 'anan/ mngon pa 'ananapas 'a byeng bdang/ brgya bye mnanas pas mam shes pa 'gas/ rnam pa shes pa'i nanas
132a1(mdo): rang gzugs 'gas kya da ma zugs 'gag smra bas skye byed du 'ag/ bye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'anan/ reg pa 'dugs pas tshor ba 'ad// tshor ba 'gags pa pa phred pa 'as/ zeng sa na/ 
132a2(mdo): len pa chagags pas thong 'gas/ zing pa 'gags pa ste/ rgashi dang / mya rin dang / sde sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsdus pa dang / yid kyi bde ba dang / 'jug pa rnams kyang 'gas par 'gyur te/ de ltar thun 'dam
132a3(mdo): kyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'gag par 'gyur ro// so ba byed pa/ byed pa byed pa/ bdag po byeng ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa byeda'i chos ji ster gnas paman na bu non par 'gyur ro// gang 'dis mangs pa de ni bya
132a4(mdo): chus sems dpa'i rten cing 'bres pa la ma'as pa zhes bya'o// gzhan sa dngos thams cad ni rgyas rag sus pa'o// rkyen la ragasum pa'o// tshogs pas ran sum mam/ gang byu dang / rkyen dang / gyi / 
132a5(mdo): la rag sus pa re/ bdag la rag ma lus pa'o// sems can sa ra// ma sus pa'o// srogs rags lus pa'o// gang zag sa ra/ ma lus pa'o// gang bdags rab sa lus pa dang / sems can
132a6(mdo): sa rag ma lus pa dang / thogs rag sa sum pa dang / gang bag la rag ma sus pa de/ 'din zhe 'am/ snga ma na zhe 'am/ gzhan na zhes dbrang ba cu yang byed de/ gang de skar rtog pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i rten ci
132a7(mdo): 'bres par 'byung ba la ma'as pa zhes bya'o// gnad 'ang ga byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi rkyen 'ams cad kyang nye ba gzhonas/ rkyen dengs kyang 'ang cing 'anag par rtogs te/ sems can las pa'i phyir ra
132a8(mdo): ci 'dog pa'i yi zhes su lang gyi 'dod pa 'ang / byang chub sems dpa'i rten cing 'dres par 'byung ba sa mkhas pa zhes bya'o// des byang chub sems dpa'i dus gsung ma pangs du dang de/ bdad pa sems cad
132b1(mdo): mau gnan gyi 'das pa'i sems dang sems sas byung ba dge pa dang / phyi dge pa rnams rjes su dradan pa ste/ byi ge ba'i sems dang semams sa byung ba rnams dran nas kyang rnam par rjod kyi na dan na sems dang sems las byung ba nas sa
132b2(mdo): gang de lta bur sems pa na pa de ma thongs pas mangs pa'o// da ltar sa mkhas pagang zhe na/ dang skar byung ba'i chus kyi sems su semam sa sa byeng sa rnams rgyas bzhin lce 'am dge ba'i
132b3(mdo): mngon par byed pa dang / phyi dge ba'i sems dang sems pas byang ba rlon pa dang / rnamapa mamams sa byab pa rnams rgya rgyab tu mngon du byed ni de sna byangs pa ste/ gang 'di dag pa mam
132b4(mdo): ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i dus gsum la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang gang 'das pa'i dargyas kyi chos rnams stong par mos pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyis kyi chos rnams stong par mos pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i
132b5(mdo): dus kyi chos rnams stong par mos pa ste/ de ltar shes rab dang ye shes kyis dus gsum stong pa nyid du yang rtog la/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs la dang / da sngar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bsod nams
132b6(mdo): thams cad kyi rjes su/ thabs kyi ye shes kyis yi rang bar yang byed de/ gang 'di la mkhas pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' dus gsum la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang 'das pa'i dus na zad pa'i chos rnams/ phyi ma'i thar
133a1(mdo): 'phags par myi lta zhing / dge ba mngon par 'du byed pa la brtson 'grus kyang kyi gtong ste/ myi dge ba mngon par du myi byed pa dang / gang ma 'ongs pa'i lus kyi chos rnams kyi skye myi 'byung bar rtog cing / byang chub tu bsngo ba'i
133a2(mdo): brtson 'grus kyang myi 'dor pa dang / da ltar 'byung ba'i dus na chos rnams 'dug pa myed cing / myi gnas par rtog ste/ byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa rab tu brtan pa na/ byang chub kyi sems kyang myi brjed de/ 'di ni byang
133a3(mdo): chub sems dpa'i dus gsum la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang gang 'das pa de ni zad pa'o// gang ma 'ongs pa de ni ma phyin pa'o// da ltar byung ba gnas pa myong de/ gang de ltar sems dang sems las byung ba skye ba dang / zhig
133a4(mdo): ba dang / zhu ba rnams la rtog cing byang chub sgrub pa'i sa sa nas kyi / yo d+hA ba zhini/ chub sems dpa'i tus gsum la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang gang mngon par shes pa la mkhas pas 'das pa'i dus rjes su dran te sngon gyi/ 
133a5(mdo): dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa rnamarje su dran nas/ byang chub tu yong su sngo ba dang na ma 'ongs pa'i dge ba'i sems bskyed pa rnams rab tu shes pa dang / de la smod pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / gang
133a6(mdo): da ltar byung ba'i dus na dge ba'i rtsa ba skyes shing byung ba rnams yid la byed cing gnas par byed de/ byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni dus gsum la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang gang sems can thams cad yongs su spyod par
133a7(mdo): ba'i phyir/ 'das pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs dran nas/ sems can gang dag ci lta bur yongasu spyan par bya ba de dag thams cad de bzhin du yongs su smyin par byed de/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi sems can gang dag sangs rgyas mnyes
133a8(mdo): par byas pas yongs su spyad par bya ba de dag thams cad de bzhin du yongs su sbyin par byed/ da ltar byung ba'i sems can gang dag chos bstan pa 'am/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis yongs su smyin par bya ba de dag thams cad
133b1(mdo): kyang de bzhin du yongs su smyin par byed de/ gang dus gsum 'di dag la bdag gi don dang / gzhan gyi dod dang / byang chub kyi don de dag ma chags pas yongs su rdzogs par byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i dus gsum la mkhas pa
133b2(mdo): zhes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa'i rig pa thams cad las khas pa gang zhen/ gsum po 'di dag ni theg pa ste/ nges par 'byin pa'o// gsum po gang ne ma 'dis ste nyan thos kyi mig pa rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / the pa
133b3(mdo): chen po'o// gnan yang theg pa gnyis te gnyis gang zhed/ lha'i thed pa dang / myi khrig pa'o// des byang chub sems dpa'i nya thos kyi theg pa sa mkhas pa dang med/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba byed thad nyan thos kyi theg pa yang byed do// 
133b4(mdo): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyan chos rnams kyi yang dag par lta ba ni pa ro/ byi sA'i rjes su 'gro ba'o// de la nyam pa ni gang 'di tshul khrims sngo ma ste/ ji ltar bslab pa bcas pa'i rjes su 'jug pa ni/ tshus khrims
133b5(mdo): kyi phung po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ tshul zhim gyi phu thoyong su rdzogs nas/ ting nge 'dzind kyi phung po yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / ting nge 'dzind kyi phubapo yongs su rdzogs nas/ shes rab/ 
133b6(mdo): kyi phung po yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / shes rab kyi phung po yongs su rdzogs nas/ rnam par grol pa'i thung ze yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po yongs su rdzogs mas rnam par gros pa'i ye shes
133b7(mdo): mthong ba'i phung ba yengs su rdzogs par byed pa ste/ gang 'dis mkhas pa de ni nyan thos kyi min pa la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang nyan thos kyi theg pa sa mkhas pa ni gang bsod napas dang / maso rnams ma yin pa sa
133b8(mdo): mapas mche/ gsum ma ca ma pa brgyan/ maca ba sa ca sacig pa dang / thun pas su mdzi 'a thams cangs / 
135a1(mdo): darnabams sul gtug pa su bya gas dang/ na las zod stong bas zung tu gas pa dang / banas masacangs kyi bong ba'i 'atugs sa gnas par rtsangs
135a2(mdo): ba mas par gyung ban byi gcig la rteg pa dang / rangabyung na legs kyis rab tu das pa dang/ dbyigs pas na pa ga pa dang / gtad dang/ ma byu nga/ da phyin sa mya 'argyan
135b1(mdo): rgyun ma chad pa dang / gnan gyi dringal gyi 'jog pa'i ye shes skyed pa dang / dmyigs pa gang yang rung ba la rkyen gyis ye shes rtogs pa ste gang de skang 'chad pa dang / ston pa dang / rab tu spyod pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i rang sangs rgyas kyi chen
135b2(mdo): pa la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// / de la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa chen po la mkhas/ gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg ces byos mkhas pa ni dpog tu myed de / do la phyogs tsam ci zhig bstan to// theg pa de ni seMs
135b3(mdo): can thams cad kyi go skabs 'byed pas na dpag tu myed pa'o// theg pa de ni chags pa myed pa'i ye shes la btang ba ste/ sgrib pa byed pa'o// thog pa de ni sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba ste/ bsod nams kyi
135b4(mdo): da sa susan so/ ga pa de ni sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi sapyor pa / las su rung ba'i phyir pha rol tu phyind pa thams cad yongasu spyang par bya'o// theg pa de ni thogs pa myed par byang chub kyi snying por
135b5(mdo): 'gro bas no// sems cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes kyi tshogs nyams su lon me ra byed pa'o// theg pa de mi sems can thams cad sbyin pa'i gnas kyi phyir/ sems can thams su thogs pa myed pa'i 'od dazer mnyam
135b6(mdo): par gtong ba'o// theg pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon gsum du mngon du 'gyur ba'i phyir/ sam ngan pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad las 'das pa'o// theg pa de ni byang chub thams cad dang / rten cing 'bres
135b7(mdo): dar 'byung ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / gdan bsgreng ba ste/ bdud dang pas kyi nos pa dang / ngan pa'i tshogs can gyi tshogs thams cad rab tu 'jos pa'o// theg pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi theg pa sgrib pa myed par gyur bu smre/ mtha' dang ma ma
135b8(mdo): byed pa dang / chang pa dang / rtag pa dang / 'byung ba dang / 'jig pa dang / ska par gyur pa thams cad dang / kun nas sdang ba dang / spri'i ba dang / chod pa dang / the tsom dang / 'gyod pa sel pa'o// theg pa de ni lhag pa'i bsam
136a1(mdo): bani nga chen thos phye bas na/ chos thams cad phung sum tshogs / dran po mi gas cid 'dug/ phun sum tshagapa pa mas cad rnyedapa/ kyi mu pa'i ma du 'grol/ sems can thams cad
136a2(mdo): pa'o// theg pa de ni thams cad stsakha na ma tho ba myed pa ste// stobs bcu dang / gyimyi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang / mtshan dang / dpe byad bzang po dang / sus dang / ngan dang sems kyi rgyan gyis brgyan
136a3(mdo): ste/ gang 'di la mkhas pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa rig na po sa mangs pa zhes bya'o// des byang chub khrim pa ma bcangs mas pad na de/ sa ma mtshad ces bya
136a4(mdo): ma ngan 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas so// des bya sems dpa'as 'dus byas dang / ma ma tham ste/ na dpa'i rgyas byas sa mkhas pad
136a5(mdo): zhe na/ gang de lus kyi 'du byed dge ba dang / ngag gi 'du byed de/ pa dang / yid kyi 'du byed dge sa mi da 'gran byed pa yang dan par rdzogs pa'i phyi tshul tu yongs su sngo ba 'di di/ byang chub sems dpa'i
136a6(mdo): brgyas byas la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// gang yang dge ba'i sus rang ga yid kyi 'du byed mngon par 'du byed pa de dag thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzos 'di na// de'i 'dus ma byas la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// 
136a7(mdo): gzhan yang 'dus byas la mkhas pa ni/ pha ros tu phyinang pas so dag yang dag par sbya pa ste/ sdug pa den 'di de/ skyon ba'i po ma tu phyinang pa rgyas rgyas kyi rlom cu gyid du dang / bzod cam
136a8(mdo): ba ro mang tu phyind pa dang / 'artson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan ni pa mod tu phyin pa 'i/ 'dzin byeng chus sems pa'i brgyas rgyan skye mthus zhes kyimo// nga 'a na pa ba kyi chos tu phyinas
136b1(mdo): sems cad sud pa 'di phying chub sems dpa'i 'dus byas la mkhas pa'o// gang yang sems can byed pa dang / bdag myed pas/ gyi 'dzin gyi len/ mchog tu badzinas par myo byed kyis/ bsu pa'i dngos pos mangs
137a1(mdo): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rtag tu dran pa dang / blo gros dang / shes rabya la mkhas pas thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes tshad myed cing myi chags pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i phyir te/ de'i phyir chos thams cad la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// 
137a2(mdo): btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu mkhas pa brgyad pa de dag gis zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab ni myi zad pa yin no// gzhan yang dge ba dang myi dge ba'i chos rnams rab tu shes pa ni shes rab 'a'ing po la/ nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang
137a3(mdo): mthun pa'i chos rnams la rtog pa ni shes rab bo// 'phags pa'i chos mngon tu gyur pas na/ shes rab ni tshad mar gyur pa'o// shes rab ni lta bar gyur pa dang / kun nas ldang pa dang / sgrib pa dang / chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta
137a4(mdo): ba bzhin du rab tu rtogs pa'o// shes rab ni 'dod pa dang / re pa dang / smon pa thams cad kyi smon sam dang bral ba'o// shes rab ni nyon mongs pa'i yongs su gtung pa thams cad 'jis pas na sim par byed pa'o// 
137a5(mdo): shes rab ni chos kyi kun dkal la dka' ba'i rgyun ma bcad pas nam chog tu dga' bar byed pa'o// shes rab ni don shes pa mngon sum du gyur bas na rton pa'o// shes rab ni byang chub kyi phyog rgya sum bcu rtsa
137a6(mdo): bdun po dag gi rten to// shes rab ni theg pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'bras bu thob par gyur pas na thob pa'i mtshan nyid do// shes rab ni rang bzhin gyis yo shes snang ba sam/ rab tu shes pa'i mtshan nyid // shes rab ni chu 'o zas
137a7(mdo): cad las spros pas nas/ yang dag par rab tu spros pa'o// shes rab ni yang dag pa skyon myed par 'dren pa'o// shes rab ni dge ba'i chos thams cad rab tu sdud pa'o// shes rab ni sngon gyi nyon mongs pa dang / bag sa nyas
137a8(mdo): thams cad dad par byed pa'o// shes rab ni rtse mor gyurd pa'i chos rnams kyi mchog go// shes rab ni rang byung gi ye shes rtogs pa'i phyir gya nom pa'o// shes rab ni khams gsum lnga khrims cad dang ma 'dres pa'i phyir rgyu ba dang
137b1(mdo): lus pa'o// gas rab ni 'bas can gyis zin pa'o// shes ras ni 'phags pa thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba'o// shes rab ni mtshan pa dang / yongs su rten thams can da dzu gas kyi du garung du byed pa'o// shes
137b2(mdo): rig pa dang / gti mug gi mun pa thams cad dang / bral pas na 'ag byed pa'i gnyen po'o// shes rab ni rnal 'byor da dpyod pa'i sa la gnas pa thams cad kyi sbyor ba 'o// shes ral ni theg pa 'bus rgyud la mdza don tha zhugs pa rnams
137b3(mdo): kyi 'dren pa'o// shes rab ni ma rig pa dang / gti mug gi mun pa dang / rab rib kyi ling tog sel ba'i phyir snang bar byed pa'o// shes rab ni khyogs mi star thos pa rnams so/ byin thams cad skyon pong byed pa'o// shes rab ni byig
137b4(mdo): gzugs kyi lam thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa dang / de bzhin du rna ba dang / sgra dang / sna dang / dri dang lce dang / mo dang sus dang / reg bya dang yod dang / chos kyi lam sus yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir gnas myed
137b5(mdo): 'a'o// shes rab ni bden pa las nges par byung bas na da sa / shes rab ni shin tu dul ba rnams kyi phyi 'khrugs pa'o// shes ra ni ye shes kyi sgo rnams kyi snang ba 'o// shes rab ni thams cad du gyur/ 
137b6(mdo): ste gyi zad pa'o// shes rab ni brten pas 'jug pa mthong ba ste myi 'gal lo'o// shes rab ni 'dzid dang / nyod mongs pa'i bcings pa thams cad gcod pa'i phyir/ rnam par thar pa'i sam mo// shes rab ni nyon mongs pa
137b7(mdo): thams cad dang ma 'dres pa'o// shes rab ni 'grogs pa dang / smob pa dang / sgri'i par 'gyur ba'i chos thams cad dang snyan cig kyi gnas so// sems cad thams cad kyi sems kyi spyong ba ji snyed par/ shes rab dang / 
137b8(mdo): ye shes kyisas kyang de rnyed do// sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang / bag la nyas ji snyed par shes rab kyi spyod pa'i ye shes kyang de snyed do// sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i sgo ji snyed par shes rabs
138a1(mdo): 'jug pa'i sgo yang de snyed do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi shes rab mabyas / rten kyang de snyed de/ de la byang chub sems dpas/ 
138a2(mdo): bslab par bya'o// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes rab myi zad pa 'dis byang chub sems dpa' rnams ye shes myi zad pa thob par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi zad pa mi zad pa bstan pa'i chos kyi
138a3(mdo): le'u 'di bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon yongs su spyad pa byas pa sum khri nyis stong gis myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros myi zad pas/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i/ 
138a4(mdo): bu la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpal gyi byams pa yang myi zad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thug myed pa'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byams pa ni
138a5(mdo): thun pa myed pa'i byams pa ste/ de dag gi byams pa nye bar bsgrub pa/ yongs su chad pa myed do// 'di ltar sems can gi khams ci tsam de tsam du/ byang chub sems dpa' de'i byams pa'i sems
138a6(mdo): bskyed pas khyab par byed do// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/ nam ma'a'i khams 'dis gang yang ma khyab pa myed do/ btsun pa sha ra dA ti'i bu'i de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i byams pa 'dis gar
138a7(mdo): ma rgyab pa'i sems can de gang yang byed do// 'di lta ste dper na/ sems can gyi khams ni chad byed de/ des zad pa myed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i byams pa sgom pa yang tshad myed de/ de la zad pa myed do// 
138a8(mdo): 'di ltar nam mkha' myi zad pas na/ sems can zad do// sems can myi zad pas na byams pa myi zad pa ste/ de'i phyir skyes bu dam pa de dag byams pa myi zad pa zhes bya'o// de skad ces smras rna pa dang / gnas / 
138b1(mdo): shA ra dwa ti'i dus/ byang chub sems dpa' bro gros kyi zad pa la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu sems can kyi khams 'di ci tsa ma~M/ rdo dros kyi med pas smras pa/ 'i btsun 'ag ra dwa ti'i hU~M/ sa mi 'ams dang / rgyu'i 'ams dang
138b2(mdo): me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams ji snyed pa de bas kyang sems cad kyi khams ches yang ngo // smras pa/ rigs kyi bu dpe' bya bar nus sam/ blo gros kyi 'ad btsun pa sha ra tIli bu/ nus mod kyi rgyu chung ngus ni ma yin no// btsun pa
138b3(mdo): sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ dper na/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi 'ams gang ka'i klung bye ma snyed dang / de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / de bzhin du nub phyogs dang / de bzhin du phyogs dang / de bzhin du phyogs bcu kun tu
138b4(mdo): phyogs re reng yang 'jig rten gi khams gang 'ga' klung gi bye ma med de dag nyam sa cad rgya mtsho chen po chus yongs su gang pagacin tu rgya la/ ngas can gang 'aka'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag 'dus te/ skra'i rtse mo brgya
138b5(mdo): bshags pa'i chas/ de las chu'i thogs pa gcig blangs la/ de banin du gzhan yang sems can gang 'ga' klu'i ni bye ma snyed dan 'dus taM/ bzlas pa gang bka'i klung ni bye ma dag na/ skra'i rtse mo brgyam
138b6(mdo): bshags pa'i chos chu'i thigs pa gnyis pa blangs sa/ mtshan ma gnag po 'di dang / bgrang ba 'di ste bus/ bskas pa gang 'ga'i klung ni khyi ma snyed cing / sems can dang 'ga' byung gi bye ma snyed dag gis smra'i rtse
138b7(mdo): so brgyar bzhags pa'i ches chu'i thigs pa re re blangs pas/ chu'i phud du tsam zang par gyur kyang / sems can gyi khams de ni thug pa'am/ zad pa gapa yang byed do// btsud pa sha dwa ti'i bya de ltar sems can gi khams
138b8(mdo): tshad myed de/ de dag na byang chub sems dpa'i byams sa khyal pa byed do// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ rkang gis byams pa de lta bur sgom pa'i rin pa 'i rtsa mched myeng pa de zang par chu masam/ 
139a1(mdo): sbas pas/ rigs kyi bu de ni ma yin te/ byams pa bsgom pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di 'dra ba lan par su 'dod pa de/ nam mkha' zad par 'dod do// byang chub sems dpal gang gis byams pa myi zad pa 'di thos nas skrag par
139a2(mdo): skyed pa dang / gnod sems kyi phas pa'i skyon dang / zlo la dang / 'on tu 'dzid pa thams cad rab tu 'jos pa'o// bka la nyas dang / kun nas sa pa dang bras pa ste/ dad pa skyed cing sems can thams cad kyisakhrug pa la
139a3(mdo): nyes par myi lta ba'o// yongs su gdung myed cing lus dang sems bde ba skyed pa ste/ gzhan gyi gnod par bya ba las shin tu 'das pa'o// nyes pa thas cad kyi 'jigs pa dang bral ba ste/ 'phags
139a4(mdo): pa lis ma dang / mthun zhing / gshe ba dang / sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams dang bar byed pa/ gsum thams cad sas spros pa ste/ dbyig pa dang / mtshon cha 'chang ba ma yin no// 
139a5(mdo): sems can thams cad rab tu tha rang par bya ba la dka' ba/ khong khro ba thams cad dang bras pa/ tshul chos pa dang / Sha gsaka dang / thob kyis 'jal pa thams cad dang brus pa/ rnyed pa dang / bkur sti ring / tshigs
139a6(mdo): bcad pa thams cad 'byung bar byed pa// brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyod pa thams cad kyis phyag byas pa/ rang gi gzi brjid kyi rgyan kyis brgyan pa/ mkhas pas rab tu bsngags pa/ byis pa
139a7(mdo): thams cad srung ba/ tshangs pa'i lam dang mthun pa/ 'dod pa'i khams dang ma 'dres pa/ sems can thams cad tha dad pa'i sam gyi la mchog/ theg pa thams cad yang dag par smras pa zang zing myed pa'i bsod nas
139b1(mdo): kyis gzung ba/ bsod rnams kyi tshogs thams cad bsags pa/ rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po thams cad kyis zil kyis non pa/ skyes bu'i chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang
139b2(mdo): brgyad bcus brgya pa dbang po nyams pa dang ma chang pa thams cad 'angs la/ bde 'gro thams cad mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam dang mthun pa/ ngan song thams cad da / skye 'og la brgyad mas 'das kyi/ chos kyi
139b3(mdo): kun dan las dga' bang bos pa/ 'dod pa dang / mongs khyod kyi dbang phyug sa mngon par dku' ba byed pa/ sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa sbyin pa'i sbyor ba tha da pa dang bras pa/ chus rnams dang / bslang
139b4(mdo): thams cad kyi sgo dang kyi dang / rgyal khrims 'chas #cad yongs su spyod pa/ bzod pa'i stonas ston pa/ ngargya dang / rgyangs pa dang / dregs pa thams cad dang bras pa/ 'phags
139b5(mdo): rnams 'jug pa'i bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyom pa 'jug pa'i rtsa ba gyi 'khrugs pa'i brtson 'grus brtsams shing / yang dag par spyod pa bya ba thams cad sas yang dag par spros
139b6(mdo): bsam gtan dang / rnam par thad pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'dun pas/ nyon mongs pa thams cad mas nges pham par 'byung sngags dang / chos pa thams cad pa 'dzid pas nges par sems dang
139b7(mdo): sa rab kyi rgya byed pa/ rang ni phyogs dang / nan ga phyonas sa nges pa/ brgyad kyi phyogs dang / nyon mongs pa rnams mamamadapa 'grog pan 'des/ bsnyen bkur dang / 'jug pa'i rgyu 'dun las sems
139b8(mdo): ngas sa byung ba byed nga/ nod thathams cadasas 'das pa/ rgyal gyis sa sem pa/ tshornas pa dang / rnas 'ang bas rgyan pagang brinas pa ste/ chags dang / marnams byung ba dang / nyan
140a1(mdo): ba'i drin pam myong ba mo// btsun pashar dwa ti'i bu/ byams pa ni sems cad thams cad yongs su myos pa ste/ byams pa chen po na bdag na bde sa gteng zhing / sems cad rnamams bde sbyin 'a'o// nyan zim
140a2(mdo): rnams kyi byams pa ni bdag skyob pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byams pa chen po ni sems can thams cad yongs su skyob bo// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byams pa ni chung po las sgrol 'o// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byas
140a3(mdo): baM ni gsum po 'di dag ste/ 'di lta ste/ sems can la dmyigs pa'i byams pa dang / chos sa dmyigs pa'i byams pa dang / dmyigs pa myed pa'i byams pa'o// das sems can sa dmyigs pa'i byams pa ni/ sems dang po
140a4(mdo): bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi'o// chos sa dmyigs pa'i byams pa ni spyod pa la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi'o// dmyigs pa myed pa'i byams pa ni myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i
140a5(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ste/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byams pa myi bzad pa zhe sa bya'o// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' nas
140a6(mdo): kyi snying rje chen po yang myi zad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sngon 'gro ba'i phyir ro// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ste ste dper na/ dbugs 'byung ba dang / rngub pa ni skyes bu'i srog gi dbang po'i sngon du 'gro ba 'o/ 
140a7(mdo): de bzhin du theg pa chen po yang dag par 'asgrul pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po ni sngon du 'gro ba'o// 'di lta ste dpe / Ta tham pa sbyang ba'i rgyas po'i mkho mas pa sde babyon kyi sngon tu 'gro
140a8(mdo): pa'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams thams cad mkhyend pa 'i ye shes yang dag par sgrub pas snying rje chen po ni sngon du 'gro ba'o// 'di lta ste dbar tshod dartson+da nas/ khyim bdag cin du cig sa snying thag
140b1(mdo): nas sug par 'dzind pa de bzhin du snying rje chen pos rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang / sems can thams cad la snying zag pa nas sdug par 'dzin pa yin no// btsun pa sha mo dwa ti'i thun snying rje che che khro zhes bya ba ni/ 'di
140b2(mdo): dan nyid kyis bya bas ma/ re'i phyir snying rje chen po zhes bya'o// rang gis byas pas na snying rje chen po'o// gzhan gyis skabs kyi rnyed pas na snying rje chen po'o// g.yo la myed pa las byung bas na/ snying rje chen po ni zasam padzin pa
140b3(mdo): nas bya ba'o// rgyu myed pa las byung bas na/ snying rje chen po ni spyor par bya'o// phyir myi ldog pa las byung bas na/ snying rje chen po ni ga pa'i bsam pas bya ba'o// ma bcos pa las byung bas na/ snying rje chen bro ni
140b4(mdo): bzhin rig pa 'o// lam drang po nas byung bas na/ snying rje chen po na rong bzhin byis yongs su dag pa'o// gsal pa las byung bas na/ snying rje chen po ni sems b+h+rUM byA myed po'o// sems can thams
140b5(mdo): cad sa mdud pa las byang bas na/ snying rje chen po ni nga rgyal myed pa ni sems can chad myed pa'i phyir snying rje chen po ni ched byed pa las byung ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mthob pa las byang bas na
140b6(mdo): snying rje chen po na zhin gi lus la myi lta'o// sdig pa thabs cad myi bya ba las byang pas na/ snying rje chen po ni srog la myi rton pa'o// byang chub kyi sems las byung bas na/ snying rje chen po ni pha ros srung ba'o// rang gi
140b7(mdo): sems yongs su dag pa las byung bas na/ snying rje chen po ni sems can srung ba'o// sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal sel ba byas byung bas na/ snying rje chen po ni dbul po dang / sug bsngal bya dang / mgon byed
140b8(mdo): yal blta'o// zlo myi 'gyur ba las byung bas na/ snying rje chen po na dam bcas la brtan pa'o// bdag dang sangs rgyas dang / lha rnams kyi slu pa las byung bas na/ snying rje chen po ni bden pa la bsti'o// legs pa/ 
141a1(mdo): byas pa'i las las byung bas na snying rje chen po ni pyod pa dag pa'o// pha rol pa bde ba rab tu sbyin pa las byung bas na/ snying rje chen po ni bdag gi bde ba gtong ba'o// sred byasas byung bas na snying rje chen no// 
141a2(mdo): ni gzhan gyi bde ba bskyed pa'o// brtson 'grus brtan pa rtsom pas byung bas na/ snying rje chen po ni sems can thams cad kyi khyer pa'o// sems can mthu chung ba'i nyes pa dang du len pa las byung bas na/ snying rje chen po ni
141a3(mdo): bla ma'i bzod pa yang dag par blangs pa'o// sems can na rnams la rim 'gro byed pa las byung bas na/ snying rje chen po ni tshigs pa dang / smod pa sel ba'o// dman pas thos pa sems can rnams yongs su sbyin par
141a4(mdo): bya gsas byung bas na/ snying rje chen po ni chos kyi dbang phyug tho'i // pha rol kyi yon tan brjod pasas byung bas na/ snying rje chen dzani rang gi yon tan gyi spongs pa'o// zad pa myed pa'i bde la 'dod sa
141a5(mdo): las byub pa sa// snying rje chen po ni sdug bsngas thams cad la ji n+ya / pa'o// sas sogs par byas te myi 'gyur ba las byung bas na/ snying rje chen po ni sdug cing phongs pa su dngos po thams cad
141a6(mdo): yongs su gtong ba'o// rgyal zhams 'chas pa'i sems sems can rnams srung ba las byung bas nang / snying rje chen po ni tshus khrims legs par srungs pas phyug pa'o// rdo rje'i lus thog las byung bas na// snying rje
141a7(mdo): rje chen po ni lus la gnod pa byas pa dang du len pa'o// sus dang / srog la myi lta ba las byung bas na snying rje chen po ni sems can thams cad yongs su sbyin par bya ba'o// yan sa pa dang nyin lag
141a8(mdo): yongs su gtong lasas byu babs na/ snying rje chen po ni myo lta ba'o// rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba myi 'dod pa las byung bas na/ snying rje chen po ni sems can pha rol po 'i dge ba'i rtsa la bskyed bya'o// 
141b1(mdo): byi yang yod pa'i khams yas su dbyigs pas byungs/ rje chen po ni sam gtan kyi ma/ shes byams byung sa da / yon kyimadas pa brjo na pa'i tshob ga
141b2(mdo): snying rje chen po ni sems cadan thams cad rab tu bar bar byed pa'o// 'dus byas la sems can yongs su sbyin par bya ba las byung bas na/ snying rje chen po ni 'as ma byas sa kyi rig pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims su sems can
141b3(mdo): rnams 'dod pas ma byung bas na/ snying rje chen pod rgyas mamapa las da pa'i sems can rnamasas bsta // btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de/ sang byang chub sems dpa'i dis par myo na kyi yang rung ste/ deng / 
141b4(mdo): thams cad ni stos rje chen po mas byes pa ste/ rim gyir sti chen po zhes bya'o// 'di sku skyed par byed pa dang / nus khris sa byed pa dang / bzod par byed pa dang / brtson 'grus bu byed pa dang / 
141b5(mdo): sa brtan gyi byed pa / shes rab tu bying dang / thabs su byed pa dang / kyi rtsonas rgya sems cad byed pa na ste po chen po'o// rabyu zhi shes smrab par byed padang / legs par byar
142a1(mdo): btsun pa sha ra dwa tili bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dga' ba chen po yang myi zad pa ste/ de la dga' ba chen po gang zhe na/ gang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam dran pa dang / rjes su dran pa dang / dgal ba
142a2(mdo): mos pa dang / mchog tu dgal ba dang / sems ma gong zhing myi rdzab dang / srid pa myed pa dang / 'dod pa dga' ba thams cad gtong ba dang / chos kyi dka' ba thams cad kyi rten dang / sems mchog tu dga' ba dang / 
142a3(mdo): lus rab tu sim pa dang / sangs rgyas la dga' zhing yid rangs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la dga' zhing / mos pas/ mtshad dang dpe byad bzang po'i rkyen tshol ba la mkhas pa dang / dge ba'i chos nyan pas myi skyo ba dang
142a4(mdo): de kho na'i chos la rton pa'i nan tan dang / dka' ba dang / dad pa dang / mchog tu dgal ba dang / rab tu dga' bas chos sa mos pa dang / rtag tu rgyun myi chad par sems can rnams sa khong khro myed pa'i blo dang / 
142a5(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi chos tshol ba la shin tu 'dun pa dang / chos la 'dun pa de yang myi 'dor ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya chen po dag la mos shing rnam par grol pa dang / nyi rtse pa'i theg pa gsal te ses
142a6(mdo): bskyod pa dang / ser sna myed pas ma zhum par sems bskyed pa dang / spong ba la sbyin pa byin nas 'khor gsum yongs su dag par sbyangs pa dang / sbyin pas mchog tu dga' ba dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams
142a7(mdo): sa dad pa dang / rgyal khrims 'chas pa rnams sa rjes su 'dzin cing byams pa dang / rang gi tshul khrims yongs su dag pas ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa thams cad sa sazhin tu 'da' bar dathug pa 'byind pa dang / de bzhin
142a8(mdo): gshegs pa'i tshul khrims ma yongs su sngo ba dang / brtan zhing myi phyed pa dang / pha ros ngan du brjod pa dang / ngan du smra ba'i tshig gi lam la khong khro pa myed pa'i sems kyis bzod cing des pa dang / nga rgyal myed pa
142b1(mdo): dang / thams 'dud cing ri mor byed pa dang / rtag tu 'dzum pa'i bzhin dang / bro gnyer byed pa dang / gson por smra ba dang / tshus 'chos pa byeng ba dang / kha gsag byed pa dadun thob kyis 'angs pa byed la dang / bsam pa dang/ 
142b2(mdo): pa dang / sems bslang pa myed pa dang / gya gyu myed pa dang / thams cad la phan yon tu lta bar kyi/ ltung ba myi gleng pa dang / yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba'i chos rjes su 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ston pa
142b3(mdo): star phangs su 'dzind pa dang / chos rnams la bdag bzhin du phangs su 'dzin dang / bran rnams la pha ma bzhin du phangs su 'dzind pa dang / sems can rnams la phun bzhin du phangs su 'dzind pa dang / ma'an kho dang slob dpon nam
142b4(mdo): sa sangs rgyas bzhin du phangs su 'dzind pa dang / nan tan rnams la ma lag gi dam pa mgo bzhin du phangs su 'dzi nad pa dang / pha ro// sad tu phyind pa rnams sa rka lag bzhin du 'phadas su 'jidad pa
142b5(mdo): chos smra ba rnams sa di po mi thams cad bzhini nu yangs su 'dzin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la yid bzhin gyi nor bu bzhin tu phangs 'dzin pa dang / rjes su bstan pa rnams sa nganal
142b6(mdo): brtsed mo bzhin du phangs su 'dzind pa dang / chog shes pa rnams lnga myed bzhin du yangs su 'dzind pa dang / chos btsal ba rnams la bzhin du phangs su 'dzind pa dang / skul zhing dran par byed nams sa sman pa bzhin
142b7(mdo): rtsalas su 'dzin pa ste// brgyan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar gang dbang po thams cad la dbang po ma kong la 'di ni dga' ba chen po zhes bya'o// dga' ba chen po zhes bya ba ni// rtog pa'i ye shes kyi phyir nas 'i rnam na
142b8(mdo): da pa'o// ngas pa mayin pa'i phyir zhin tu sbyangs pa'i rnam pa'o// nam par gyi g.yeng pam phyir dbang po dag sa pa yi rnam pa'o// kyi nyam pa'i phyir btus zhugs kyi rnam pa'o// 'dod pa'i phying nges pa'ajam pa med / 
143a1(mdo): bka' bro bde ba'i phyir thos pa'i rnam pa'o// sems las su rung ba'i phyir nye bar zhi ba'i rnam pa'o// las legs par bya ba'i phyir dga' ba'i rnam pa'o// khan ma tho ba byed pa'i phyir gyi 'gyod pa'i rnam pa
143a2(mdo): ma g.yos pa'i phyir shin tu gnas pa'i rnam pa'o// myi gnas pa'i phyir ma g.yos pa'i rnam pa'o// thul dka' ba'i phyir bsnyen par dka' ba'i rnam pa'o// chud myi za ba'i phyir don rnam pa'o// ma nor pa de bzhin nyi
