143a3(mdo): tha du na/ 'i'i phyir de kho na'i rnam pa'o// stobs kyi phyir spro ba'i garnam pa'o// gyi rdzi ba'i phyir stobs kyi rnam pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi/ chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta bzhin du chos pas myi skyo ba'i phyir
143a4(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs pa'i rnam pa ste/ btsun pa da ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dga' ba chen po myi zad pa zhes bya'o// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang / 
143a5(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi btang snyoms kyang myi zad pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi btang snyoms rgyun rjen/ ka yu~M ste/ rnam pa gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste nyon mongs
143a6(mdo): pa la btang snyoms pa dang / bdag dang gzhan srung ba'i btang snyoms dang / rgyas dang rgyas ma yin yal btang snyoms pa'o// de la nyon mongs po btang snyoms pa gang zhe na/ sto stong du byas/ mthos par gyi sems pa
143a7(mdo): dang / sti stang du ma byas pas dam sus kyi sems pa dang / rnyed pa dag la rlom sems myed pa dang / sa rnyed pa dag la yi chad pa myed pa dang / snyan pa dag la mngon par dga' ba byed pa dang / gyi snyan pa dag sa chub pa myed
143a8(mdo): bdang / smad pas phre ni par gyi 'byur ba dang / bsngags pa la chos nyid rab tu gnas pa dang / sdug bsngal dgas so so ni rtog pa'i stobs dang / bde ba nas kyi rtog pa dang / mun pasasu bya rton pa 'i rdzom
143b1(mdo): rjes su chags pa 'dor ba dang / 'od khro la spong bas/ mang ba dang phyi mang ba dag ma sems mnyam pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang / tshus khrims 'chas pa rnams su tho mnyam pa dang / steg sa khar byas pa dang / 
143b2(mdo): nyes par byas pa rnams la yang gnyis su myed pa dang / sug pa dang myi sdug par gyi lta'o// legs par thos pa dang / nye bar thos pa la myi mdzad pa dang / legs par smras pa dang nyes smras pa sa bag la nyas myed pa dang / 
143b3(mdo): mo myang ba'i nyes dmyigs rnams la mtshungs par yongs su 'jas pa dang / sems can thams cad la bsam pa mnyam pa dang / lus dang srog sa myi lta ba dang / rab dang / 'bring dang / tha ma rnams sa 'od gzer ma
143b4(mdo): dang / bsngags par/ bsngags pa ma yin pa rnams la sems mnye pa dang / bden pa dang / myi bden pa rnams la rang gi sems su dag paste/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar gang sti stang du byed pa dang / 
143b5(mdo): gnod par byed pa la mthon dman du myi sems shing / des byang chub sems dpa' btang snyoms pa yin te/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nyon mongs pa la gtang/ 
143b6(mdo): snyoms par zhes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdag dang gzhan srung ba'i btang snyoms gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' lus dang yan sag dang / nyid lag rnams bcad kyang khong khro bar gyi
143b7(mdo): byed cing / myi tshor te btang snyoms pa yin no/ sus kyi rnam par 'gyur ba las sam/ ngag gi rnam par 'gyur ba las kyang rung ste/ gnyis ka la bzod pas nas/ de'i phyir btang snyoms zhes bya'o// myig gi rnam pas
143b8(mdo): kyang mi gyi phyin/ gzugs kyi rnam pas kyang ma gyi phyir gnyis kas kyang rma gyi phyin to// de bzhin du rna bas ma yin/ smras ma yin/ sngas ma yin/ dris ma yis/ skyes ma yin/ ros ma yin/ sus
144a1(mdo): kyis ma yin/ res byas ma yin/ yid kyi rnam pas kyang ma myi byin/ chos rnam pas kyang ma myi phyir te/ de'i phyir btang snyoms zhes bya'o// mya phyin cing nyams pa myed pas de'i phyir btang snyoms zhes bya'o// rma byung
144a2(mdo): pa la 'am myi 'byin pas de'i phyir btang snyoms zhes bya'o// bdag dang gzhan dang gnyi ka srung bas/ de'i phyir btang snyoms zhes bya'o// phan par byed pa dang / gnod par bye ba la mnyam par spyod pas/ de'i phyir btang snyoms zhes
144a3(mdo): bya'o// btang snyoms ni mchog tu rtsod par byed pa'o// btang snyoms ni rang gi sems la nges par sems pa'o// btang snyoms ni gzhan gi sems srung ba'o// btang snyoms ni bdag la rtog pa'o// btang snyoms ni/ sems na
144a4(mdo): gzhan dag la gnod pa myed pa'o// btang snyoms ni byang chub sems dpa'i mnyam par gzhag pa'i gnas skabs yin te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i bdag gzhan srung ba'i btang snyoms zhes bya'o// 
144a5(mdo): de la byang chub sems dpa rgyas ma yin pa la btang snyoms pa gang / zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ byang chub/ sems dpa' thams cad tu btang snyoms bya bar bka' myi gsol to// 
144a6(mdo): deci phyir zhen/ byang chub sems das tag tu ba ga dang / shin na gi dge ba'i chos bcas pas brtson ning 'bang pa rgyam gyi to// des cus nga chus pa yin pang btang rnams par bya'o// des rgya / 
144a7(mdo): rgyam ma yin pa'i btang snyoms gang zhe na/ snod ma yin pa dang / nyan par gyi 'dod pa'i sems can rnams la btang snyoms pa dang / ma rnyed pa dang / smad pa dang / phyi snyan pa dang / sdug bsngal pas btang snyoms
144a8(mdo): pa dang / sems can nyan thos kyi theg pa can skyon myed las zhugs pa rnams la btang snyoms pa dang / sbyin pa'i chus na chus khrims rtul ba'i btang snyoms dang rgyas khrims kyi rgyas na smyon pa bcus btang snyoms dang / 
144b1(mdo): bzod pa'i dus na brtson 'grus brtul bI btang snyoms dang / brtsod 'grus kyi dus na bsam gtan brtus pa'i gtang snyoms dang / brlabasam gtan gyi dus na sbyin pas chags pa brtul pa'i btang snyoms dang // shes rab kyi dus
144b2(mdo): na pha ros tu phyind pa snga sa phyogs pa btul ba'i btang snyoms te/ 'doni dus dang rgyas ma yin pa sa btang snyoms pa zhes bya'o// gang myi bya ba'i chos rnam pa rgya byed pa 'od snyoms zhes bya ste/ de dang des kyi grom bar
144b3(mdo): gang gdon myo na par bya ba'i chos rnams la myi 'jug pa myed pa dang / 'artson 'grus dang / stobs dang / mos pa dang / maN+Da dang / brtson pa gyi 'dod pa ste/ dge ba'i chos de dang de dag yongs su rdzogs par byed pa 'di ni// 
144b4(mdo): btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi btang snyoms/ gyi zangad pa zhes bya'o// btsun bshar mo'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mngon pa shes pa ma gyi'adang
144b5(mdo): rnathams cad kyi ma gyig dang / gang thu thams cad dang / gnad sbyin thams ca dang / drib dang / skam yin dang / nam ma'a' sring dang / gyi 'am ci dang / tshe 'phye chen po dang / phyi kyis yin pa thams cad kyi
144b6(mdo): choms nges par byang sa rnams kyis na byin namasad // mam// sa sa // / bzlas da 'dzi/ 
145a1(mdo): yin sa kyang dzo // mnganas kyang skye chu na pa can dang / byed / / sa zhin dang / nga nas / dang / chob dang
145b1(mdo): de dag gi phyig de'i gzugs thams cad mthong pas na sgrib pa myed pa'o// de dag gi myig de'i gzugs thams cad la myi chags pa sa khyen so// de dag gi byig de ni bag la nyas dang / sta'i dang / kun nas spong gA sa sbya ba khri
145b2(mdo): grol pa'o// de dag byig de ni rang bzhin gyi 'od gsal bas na rnam par dag pa'o// de dag gi myig de ni yul thams cad la myi gnas pa'o// de dag myig de ni nyon mongs pa dang / 'ogs nyas thams cadas kyi skye ba'o// de dag gi
145b3(mdo): byig de ni the tsom myed pas na rab rib byed pa'o// de dag gi myiki de ni sgrib par gyur pa'i chos thams cad sa kun nas ma yangs pa'o// de dag gi myig de ni chos thams cad snang ba sa gsol pa thob b.lo// de dag gi myog de ni
145b4(mdo): shes pa rton pa ste// rnam par shes pa'i spyod yus ma yin no// / de dag gi myig de ni nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis ma chags kyi snga ma rmongs pa'o// de dag ni byid de ni 'phags pa'i dbang po rnams
145b5(mdo): nges par 'byed pa'i tshe dang mthun pa'o// de dag gi myig de ni sems can thams cad la 'od zer mnyam par gtong bas na/ thogs pa myed pa'i mtshan nyid do// de dag gi myig de ni sems kyi myi dge ba'i chos
145b6(mdo): dang bral bas na rnam par dag pa'o// de dag gi myig de ni rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs ma thams cad ma yin pas na dri ma myed pa'o// de dag gi myo ga de ni bsam pa ma gtang bas na/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis
145b7(mdo): mngon par bsgrubs pa'o// de dag gi myig de ni rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba dang bral ba'i phyir chags ma bcings pa'o// de dag gi myig de ni don gi spyod yul bded pas na nye 'ang bsgrubs shing / chos rnams
145b8(mdo): par dag pa shes pa'i sem las chags par spyod pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar skyes bu dam pa de dag ni snying rje chen po la gnas pa/ chos rnams rig pa/ don shin tu rtogs pa/ kha na ma tho ba myed pa/ ji ltar
146a1(mdo): mthong ba dang / zos pa bzhin du smra ba/ myi dge ba la snyis pa/ byang chub kyi snying po sa mngon tu phyogs pa/ sems gang du yang thogs pa myed pa/ ser sna can rnams la gtong ba dang ldan pa/ tshul khrims 'chal
146a2(mdo): pa rnams la snying brtse ba can/ gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa rnams la gnod sems pa'i sems byed pa la so can rnams so brtson 'grus sgrub par byed pa// sems cad rnam par g.yeng ba rnams sa bsam gtan ki
146a3(mdo): sag ston pa/ 'chal pa'i zhes rab can rnams la/ shes rab kyi skyon spyon par byed pa/ lam ngad par zhugs pa rnamasas lam ston pa/ dman pa su mos pa rnams sa sangs rgyas kyo chos rgya chen po rtogs par byed pa
146a4(mdo): thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes sa 'dzud pa/ byang chub yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i mngon par shes pa ma mnyams pa rnams te 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lha'i myig mngon par shes pa myi zang
146a5(mdo): zhes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpal rnams kyi lnga'i rna pa'i mdze/ mapar shes pa myi zad pa gang zhe na/ gang lha thams cad kyi sa'i rna ba dang gang klu thams cad dang / gnod sbyind thams cad dang / dri za
146a6(mdo): sa ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / gyi 'am ci dang / rdo 'phye chen po dang / phyi dang / phyi ma yin pa thams cad kyi sgra yidzi pa dang / gang grol pa dang / myi slob pa nyan thos thams cad kyis ying pa dang / dang rung sa ngas
146a7(mdo): rgyas thams cad kyi lha 'i rna pa de dag pas/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyend pa nyid las nges par byung ba rgya chen po las nges par byang ba rnams kyi lha'i rna ba ches mchog go// ches dam pa'o// ches rab bo// ches gsal
146a8(mdo): lo/ ches bzang ngo // ches stob dang ldan pa'o// ches 'od gsas te/ lha'i rna ba des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rtend gyi khams mtha' yas mu myed pa dag na/ sgrar grag pa/ lba dang / kU dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / 
146b1(mdo): A le ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / phyi rim ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / spyi dang gyi ma yin pa ma na/ a rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
146b2(mdo): kyi sgra gang yin pa de dag thams cad de'i lha'i rna pa'i dbang po la grags par macan su gtud 'gro'i skye gnas pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa dang / sga bu dang / phye ma leb dang / srur bu dang / bud ba dag gi sgra gang
146b3(mdo): yin pa de dag thams cad kyang thos so// sems kyi dmyigs pa dge sa / lung du myi ston pa gang dag gis sems can gang dag gis gang gi las 'byung ba de dag thams cad kyang yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu
146b4(mdo): shes so// ngag gi las gang dge ba'i rgyu yongs su 'dzind pa dang / reg gi las gang myi dge ba'i rgyu yongs su 'dzin pa dang / ngag gi las gang lung du myi ston pa'i rgyu yongs su 'dzinang pa de dag thams cad kyang
146b5(mdo): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 'dod chags bag la nyal ba'i ngag gi las gang zhe sdang pas 'byin pa dang / 'dod chags bag la nyal ba'i ngag gi las gang rmongs pas 'byin pa dang / 
146b6(mdo): zhe sdang bag la nyal ba'i ngag gi las gang chags pas 'byin pa dang / zho sdang bag sa nyes pa'i ngag gi las gang rmongs pas 'byind pa dang / gti mug bag sa nyes pa li ngag gi las gang chags pas 'byin pa
146b7(mdo): dang / gti mug bag sa nyes pa'i ngag gi sas gang sdang bas 'byin pa dang / 'dod chags bag la nyas pa'i ngag gi sas gang chags pas 'byin pa dang / zhe sdang bag la nyam pa'i ngag gi las gang sdang bas 'byin pa dang / 
146b8(mdo): kati mug bkas pa'i ngag gi sas gang rmongs pas 'byin pa de dag thams cad/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes khyo/ gang gi seMs gang bsam pa dag la sbyor ba nyams pa dang / ngag gi la sa gang sbyor ba dag pas ya ga/ 
147a1(mdo): nyams pa dang / ngag gi las bsam pa yang dag la/ sbyor ba yang dag pa dang / ngag gi las gang bsam pa 'ang ma dag la/ sbyor ba yang ma dag pa de dag thams cad/ lha'i rna pa'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes thogs
147a2(mdo): pa myed pa de yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin tu rab tu shes so// de dag lha'i rna pa mngon par shes pa'i ye shes des 'phags pa dang / 'phags pa ma yin pa'i sgra rnams thos te/ thos nas kyang 'phags pa'i sgra rnams la rjes
147a3(mdo): su chags par yang myi 'gyur/ 'phags pa ma yin pa'i sgra rnams la khong khro bar yang myi 'gyur te/ de dag 'phags pa'i sgra rnams la byams pa chen po 'thob cing / 'phags pa ma yin pa'i sgra rnams la snying rje chen po/ 
147a4(mdo): 'thob bo// sgra thams cad la yang sngon gi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha bye brag 'byed pa shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ras tu shes so// de dag swa'i rna ba mngon par shes pa'i ye shes nges
147a5(mdo): sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa thos te/ mnas kyang dran pa dang / shes bzhin dang / kyi rjed pa'i chos nyid kyis thams cad 'dzid to// bzung nas kyang brjed par gyi byed kyi
147a6(mdo): snod ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams ma dran par byed do/ snying po dang / snying po ma yin pa'i chos rnams kyang yang dag par ji ste la bzhin du rab tu shes so// de dag de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi chos 'astan
147a7(mdo): pa nyan na/ de banan gshegs pa gnyis pa'i chos bstan pa la sprol par byed pa 'am/ kun nas sdang bar byed pa myi byed do// sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa sa phyi myed 'dzin to// dge ba dang/ 
147a8(mdo): phyi ge pa dang / lung rgya sa bstan pa'i bla na pa dag thos pa de dag kyang dran pa dang shes bzhin gis rgyas dus su brjod de/ zhes te 'thor kyi dus yin na yang / chos bstan pa'i dus ma yin par rig na 'dug ste/ 
147b1(mdo): thos kyang gyi ston to// chos bstan pa'i rjes yin/ dbang cig gis 'khod kyi dadus yin sa/ dbang gcig gis 'khor gyi dus ma yin na yang thams cad sa chos kyi ston to// bden par sung bstan pa yang gzhan
147b2(mdo): kanod na sung myi ston to// myi bden pa'i lung bstan pa yan don dang ldan zhing / gzhan rjes su srung ba dang / 'thun na thabs la mkhas pa dang / bdag gi sems yongs su dag pas sung ston to// sgra ji lta bu
147b3(mdo): nyan par 'dod pa de lta bu'i sra thos te/ spa ji lta bu nyan par myi 'dod pa de lta bu'i sgra myi thos so// 'khor gang natshas ston pa de'i sems can thams cad kyi na pa mig nas kyi shes la yang / yang dag pa ji lta ban
147b4(mdo): du shes ste/ shes nas kyang rang bzhin de 'dra ba'i chos ston to// de la sems can gang dag chos shes par byed pa de dag di de'i chos bstan pa thos so// sems can gang dag chos shes par
147b5(mdo): byed pa ma yin pa de dag ni de'i chos bstan pa myi thos so// de dag gi na pa'i khams de'i chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa yin/ de dag gi na pa'i khams de ni ye shes rnam par dag pa
147b6(mdo): de dag gi rna ba'i khams de bdag gti khams shin tu rnam par dag pa yin/ de dag gi na pa'i khams de sems can kyi khams dang / srog gi khams dang / gang zag gi khams rnam par dag pa yin/ de dag gi/ 
147b7(mdo): rna pa'i khams de sgra dang yi ge dang / nges pa'i tshig ji lta ba bzhin du mas pa yin/ 'gro ba lngar skyes pa'i sems can thams cad gang dag sgra dang / yi ge dang / nges pa'i tshig sna tshogs smras pa de dag la
147b8(mdo): skad ji lta ba bzhin du 'jug pas chos ston to// de dag desa'i rna la'i khams de/ theg pa gzhan gyi mnyan pa'i phyir// de bzhin gshegs pa li swa'i snyan yongs su bsngos ya yin te/ de ni byang chul sems
148a1(mdo): rnams kyi lha'i rna pa mngon par shes pa myi zad pa zhes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha rol gyi sems shes pa'i mngon par shes pa myi zad pa gang zhe na/ pha rold kyi sems shes bya zhes bya ba ni gang sems can
148a2(mdo): thams cad kyi sngon gyim tha'i sems shes pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha'i sems shes pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sems shes do// des 'das pa mi sems shes pas sems can rnams kyi sngon gyi rgyasas byung ba'i sems la 'jug ste/ 
148a3(mdo): sems can 'di 'i sems 'di ni rgya che po// sems can 'di'i sems 'di ni rgya 'bring ngo // sems can 'di'i sems ni rgyu chung ngo // sems can 'di'i dbang po rnams ni/ sbyin pa'i rnam pa'i rgyu dang ldan no// sems cad 'di'i
148a4(mdo): dbang po rnams ni tshus khrims kyi rnam pa'i rgyu dang ldan no// sems can 'di'i dbang po rnams ni bzod pa'i rnam pa'i rgyu dang ldan no// sems can 'di'i dbang po rnams ni brtson 'grus kyi rno pa'i rgyu dang ldan no// sems can 'di'i
148a5(mdo): dbang po rnams ni bsam gtan gi rnam pa'i rgyu dang ldan no/ sems can/ 'di'i dbang po rnams ni shes rab kyi rnam pa'i rgyu dang ldan dol/ se/ mas can 'di'i dbang po rnams ni byams pa'i rna pa'i rgyu dang ldan pa'o// 
148a6(mdo): sems can 'di'i dbang po rnams snying rje'i rnam pa'i rgyu dang ldan no// sems can 'di'i dbang po rnams ni dga' ba'i rnam pa'i rgyu dang sngan no// sems can 'di'i dbang po rnams ni btang snyoms kyi rnam pa'i
148a7(mdo): rgyu dang ldan no/ sems can 'di'i dbang po rnams ni nyan thos kyi theg pa'i rnam pa'i rgyu dang ldan no/ sems can 'di'i dbang po rnams ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i rnam pa'i rgyu dang ldan no// sems can 'di 'i dbang
148a8(mdo): bo rnams ni theg pa chen pol rnam pa'i rgyu dang ldan no// sems can 'di ni rgya'i stobs can te/ dag pa'i rtsa pa'i rgyu'i rgyun 'di dang ldan na/ sems can de sbyong ba'i rgyus rigs dma' bar skyes so// sems can 'di na
148b1(mdo): bsam pa dag pa la spyod pa ma dag pa'o// sems can 'di ni'i sbyor ba dag sa bsam pa ma dag pa'o// sems can 'di ni bsam pa'ang dag sa/ sbyor ba'ang dag pa'o// sems can 'di ni bsam pa 'ang ma dag sa/ sbyor la'ang
148b2(mdo): ma dag pa'o zhes/ de ltar gang sems can thams cad kyi rgyu las byung ba'i dbang po rnams las sems kyi spyod pa shes pa de dag thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ shes nas kyang so sor ci rigs par
148b3(mdo): chos stond pa ni sngon gi mtha'i pha rol kyi sems shes pa zhes bya'o// de la phyi ma'i mtha' pha ros kyi sems shes pa gang zhe na/ sems can 'di'i da ltar gyi sbyin pa'i rgyu na mi 'ongs pa'i dus na 'di'i tshul khrims kyi rgyur
148b4(mdo): 'gyur ro// sems can 'di'i da ltar tshul khrims kyi rgyu ni/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'di'i bzod pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro/ sems can 'di'i da ltar bzod pa'i rgyu ni/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'di'i brtson 'grus
148b5(mdo): kyi rgyur 'gyur ro// sems cad 'di'i da ltar brtson 'grus rgya ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'di'i bsam gtan gi rgyur 'gyur ro// sem sa can 'di'i da star bsam gtad kyi rgyu ni/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na
148b6(mdo): 'di'i shes rab kyi rgyur 'gyur ro// sems can 'di'i da ltar 'jig rten pa'i shes pa dang / spyod pa'i rgyu ni/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'di'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rgyud 'gyur ro// sems can 'di'i de 'dab pa
148b7(mdo): dman pa'i rgya ni/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'di'i theg pa chen po'i rgyur 'gyur ro// nes de ltar ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sems can rnams kyi rgya gang dag dang / rkyed gang dag dab/ rnga ya gang dag la 'ongs pa'i dus 'gyur/ 
148b8(mdo): par 'gyur ba'i sems can rnams kyi rgyu de dag dang / rkyen de dag dag dang / rnam pa de dag byang chub sems dpas yang dag pa ji lta ba ban ni bya rab tu shes so/ de sems cad thams yongs su basbyin par bya ba sa spyo
148'a1(mdo): par myi 'gyur te/ de'i sems la 'jug pa'i shes pa dang / chos kyi snod tu gyur pa ji snyed pa de snyed du chos ston no// de'i bras bu yod par chos ston pa yin te/ chos kyi gtam la ser sna'i myi byed pa 'di ni
148'a2(mdo): phyi ma'i mA'i pha rold kyi sems shes pa zhes bya'o// de la da ltar byung ba'i pha rol kyi sems shes pa gang zhe na/ gang da ltar byung ba'i dus na sems can thams cad kyi sems dang sems las byung ba gang dag skye ba de
148'a3(mdo): dag thams cad/ byang chub sems dpas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ des 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems kyang / 'dod chags dang brnyas pa'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes so// 'di
148'a4(mdo): chags dang bral ba'i sems kyang 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// de bzhin du zhes bcas pa dang / zhe sdang dang bral dang / gti mug dang bcas pa dang / 
148'a5(mdo): gti mug dang bral pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang bral ba dang / bsdus pa dang / rnam khang g.yengs pa dang / mnyam par gnyag pa dang / mnyam par ma gzhag pa dang / 
148'a6(mdo): bying ba dang / rab tu 'dzind pa dang / rgod pa dang / myi rgod pa dang rnam par zhi ba dang / rnam par ma zhi pa dang / rnam par grol ya dang / rnam par ma grol ba dang / rgya che ba dang / rgya che ba ma yin pa dang
148'a7(mdo): chu dang yangs pa dang / chen por gyur pa dang / tshad myed pa'i sems kyang / tshad myed pa'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin bya rab tu shes te/ de ltar nyon mongs lag pa dpa gang gis sems can gang dang
148'a8(mdo): gang gi sems la zla zhes par gyur pa de dag thams cad/ yang dag par ji blta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ shes nas kyang shes rab kyis ji ltar nyon mongs pa las nges khapa 'byung ba pa 'gyur bar chos ston to/ 
148'b1(mdo): de 'khor gang du 'gro bar thog ma nyid tu 'khor de'i sems la lta ste/ bltas nas kyang so so ci rigs par chos ston to// de ltar gang sems can de dang de dag gi dbang po mchog dang / mchog ma yin par shes pa de dag thams cad
148'b2(mdo): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin tu rab tu shes te/ bdag gi sems bsgribs pa 'am/ gzhan gi sems bsgribs par myi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' de'i sems kyi rgyun ni ye shes kyis rig pa
148'b3(mdo): dran pas rig pa khri gros kyis rig pa/ rtogs pas rig pa/ shes rab kyis rig pa/ byang chub kyis rig pa'o// sems kyi rgyun ni nyon mongs pa dang bral la/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa yang dag par
148'b4(mdo): ched po// dag pa tI ma myed pa 'od gsal pa/ kha na ma tho ba myed pa myi brlab/ nyon mongs pa myed pa/ rnyog pa myed pa/ chos thams cad snang bas rig pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pas
148'b5(mdo): zhugs shing / sems kyi rgyun shin tu rig pa ste/ de ltar gang de lta bu'i chos la sems 'bab pa shes pa 'jug pa 'di ni/ byang chu/ ba sems dpa' pha rosad kyi sems shes pa'i mngon par shes pa
148'b6(mdo): phyi zad pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes pa mngon sum du byed pa'i mngon par shes pa gang zhe na/ de dran pa des sngon gi gnas rjes su dran te/ dran pa de ni chos kyi dbyings
148'b7(mdo): kyi gnas kyis shin tu byin kyis brlabs pa'o// rab tu rig pa pa na myi g.yo ba'o// ye shes shin tu yongs su spyang bar byas pa na/ mya rgod pa'o// zhi gnas la rab tu gnas pa na rtsa ba myed pa'o// lhag mthong
148'b8(mdo): tunan pan nong sa byeng bamo// mngon gsum bu zhes las ma gnan gaspos kyi mag pa'o// drad nang gyi marjed pa'i chos can pas dran pa bya ba 'o/ ga pa chen po rab tu shes pa'i byor bamed nas bye tshogs
149a1(mdo): bstsags pa'o// gzhan la rag ma lus pas na ye shes kyi tsho gas bstsags pa'o// thams cad kyi pha ros tu 'gro ba'i phyir/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi tshogs bstsags pa'o// de dran pa des sngon phyi gnas su dran te/ 
149a2(mdo): des tshe rabs gcig kyang dran no// gnyis dang / gsum dang / bzhi dang / snga dang / bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum bcu dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu dang / tshe rabs brgya yang dran no// tshe rabs stong dang / tshe rabs brgya phrag
149a3(mdo): du ma dang / tshe rabs stong phrag du ma dang / tshe rabs brgya stong phrag du ma dang / 'chags pa'i bskal pa dang / 'jigs pa'i skam pa dang / 'chags pa'i bskal pa'i du ma dang / 'jigs pa'i bskal pa tum dang / 
149a4(mdo): 'chags pa dang / 'jig pa'i bskal pa tu ma yang rjes su dran no// bskal pa brgya' dang / bskas pa stong dang / bskal pa brgya/ stong dang / bskal pa brgya phrag du ma dang / bskas pa stong phrag tu
149a5(mdo): ma dang / bskal pa brgya stong phrag du ma yang rjes su dran te/ semacan myong che ge mo zhes bya ba de dag byung bar byung ba dang / 'dag kyang byang ste/ bdag gi mying ni 'di zhes bya/ rigs ni 'di zhes
149a6(mdo): bya/ rus ni 'di zhes bya/ kha don 'di 'dra/ kha zas ni 'di lta bu zhig za za/ che'i tshad ni tsam zhig zhug/ yun ni 'di srid gcig gnas gnas/ bde ba dang / sdug bsngas ni 'di lta bu zhig myong ngo / da
149a7(mdo): de nas shi 'phos nas che ge mo zhig du skyes so// de nas kyang shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes te/ de ltar rnam pa dang bcas/ rgyu mtshan dang bcas/ yul phyogs dang bcas par sngon gi gnas rnam pa mang po rjes su dran na
149a8(mdo): des bdag dang sems can gzhan gyi sngon gyi mtha' nas bzung ste/ sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran no// de bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems can gzhan gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sngon gyi rgyu las byung ba dran zhing / bdag ni
149b1(mdo): dge ba'i ma pa dran nas byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed do// sems can gzhan gyi dge pa'i rtsa badran nas/ sems can rnams kyang chub tu kyang sems pa byed du na do// gang gi ban byed kyi srog bsgom de mong gyi na
149b2(mdo): bya dang / sdug bsngal pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / bdag myed par rton par byed do// de myi rtag pa dang / sdug bsdus pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / bdag byed par ston pas gzugs kyis dregs pa myed pa yin mden nas
149b3(mdo): dregs bskyod pa yin/ nad byed pas dregs pa byed pa yin/ yang ces rdegs pa rtsod pa yin/ 'jom pa dregs pa skyed pa yon/ sangs khyod kyis dregs pa byed pa yid/ g.yog 'khod kyis dregs pa byed pa yin
149b4(mdo): dbang phyag gis khregs pa myed pa yin/ brgya byin du 'dod pa myed pa yin/ tshangs par 'dod pa byed pa yin/ 'jig rten skyong bar 'dod pa myed pa yin/ 'khor sos sgyur bar 'dod pa myed pa yin/ skye ba thams cad
149b5(mdo): 'dod pa myed pa yin no// 'dod pa dang rgyal srid kyi dbang phyugs dbang byed pa thams cad kyang / bdag la bde ba'i phyi'i 'dod de/ gzhan tu na sems can yongs su sbyin par bya ba'i phyir gyi 'dod
149b6(mdo): de/ gzhan tu na sems can yongs su sbyin par bya ba'i phyir bas sa bzhin du srid par skye ba 'dzin to// de gyi rtag pa dang / zug bsngal pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / bdag myed pa ston pas/ sngon gyi kun nas nyon
149b7(mdo): mongs pa'i spyod pas ngo che zhing 'dzem ste/ gnong zhing rnam par smod do// da ltar gyi tshe yang srog gi phyir yang myi bya ba myi khyed cing / de sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams byang chub tu yongs su sngo ste/ rgyas par byed do// da ltar
149b8(mdo): byung ba'i dge ba'i phra ba yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du yongs su sngo'o// des myi mthun par yongs su sngo ba spangs te/ sangs rgyas kyi rigs dang 'i dge 'dun ki rigs rgyun chad pa dang / thams cad mkhyen
150a1(mdo): pa'i phyir yongs su sngo ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sngon gyi gnas nga / rjes su brid pa mngon gsum du byed pa'i mngon par shes pa myo bad pa'o// des byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul mngon pa
150a2(mdo): ba shes pa mngon par shes pa gang zhe na/ gang 'dun pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / sems dang / dpyod pas rab tu zin pa'i chos rnams sgrub pa dang / las su rung ba dang dbang byed pas des rdzu 'phrus gi rkang pa bzhi po 'di dag shin tu
150a3(mdo): tha rnams pa'i phyir mngon par 'du byed pa myed pa'i rdzu 'phrul mngon du thob par 'gyur te/ de rdzu 'phrul gi cho 'phrul nas pra ng+ya ma myong bar 'gyur ro// de'i rdzu 'grus kyi cho 'phrul de dag ni sems cad sba ba'i phyir/ rgya cher sems
150a4(mdo): can yongs su sbyin par byed par 'gyur te/ sngo 'phrul gang dang gang gis sems can gdul bar bya ba'i rdzu 'grus gi cho 'phrul de dang de/ sems can rnams sa nye bar ston te/ gzugs su 'am/ stobs su 'am/ byin gyi rlabs
150a5(mdo): su 'ang rung ste/ de gzugs dang / kha dog tu snang ba gang dang gang gis sems can 'dus par 'gyur ba'i gzugapa dang / kha dog tu swA// ra ba de dang de nyid sems cad rnams sa nye par ston to// sangs rgyas
150a6(mdo): kyi gzugs dang / kha dog tu snang ba 'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i gang+gA gas dang / kha tog tu snang ba 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi gzugs de kha dog tu snang ba 'am/ nyan thos kyi gzugs dpakha dog tu snang ba 'am/ 
150a7(mdo): brgya byin gyis gzugs dang / kha dog tu snang ba 'am/ 'jig rten skyong pa'i gzugs dang / kha dog rgya snang ba 'am/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i gzugs dang / kha dog tu sdang ba 'am/ de bzhin du khyab 'jug pa dang / skyem byed dang
150a8(mdo): dbang phyug chen po dang / tshangs pa chen po dang / skye dgu 'i bdag po'i gzugs dang kha dog tu snang dpa 'am/ gang de ma yin pa'i gzugs dang / kha dog tu snang ba/ tha na du 'gro ba'i skye gnas kyi gzugs dang / kha dog tu snang ba gang
150b1(mdo): dang gang gis sems cad 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i gzugs dang / kha dog tu snang ba de dang / de nyid ston te/ mos pa ci lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams la chos ston to// de stobs gang dang gang gis/ stobs snyems pa dang / khro ba dang / nga rgyal dang
150b2(mdo): rgyags pa dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs pa shas che ba'i sems can rnams gtus par bya ba'i stobs de dang / de nyid ston te/ yang na brgya byin gyis stobs sam/ yang dag tshangs pa'i stobs sam/ yang na 'jig rten skyod pa'i stobs sa
150b3(mdo): yang na 'khor los sgyur ba'i stobs pas/ yang na chen po che'i stobs sam/ yang na sred myed khri'i stobs kyi bzhi ce 'am/ Ta sred kyi bu'i stobs kyi phyed dam/ yang na sred myed kyi bu'i stobs kyang rung ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
150b4(mdo): stobs dang ldan pas/ sor mo gsum gis ri'i rgyal po ri rab bteg ste/ 'phang bya dpag tshad 'bum phrag drug bcu rtsa brgyad tsam nas/ rgyang ma dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong du 'phangs pa/ 'di ste ste dper na spyang ru ral
150b5(mdo): 'bras bu gcig bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du 'bangs kyang byang chub sems dpa' de'i stobs la nyams pa myed do// steng gsuM gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams 'di ltar rgya che ba/ 'di ltar yangs
150b6(mdo): pa/ chu'i khams nas bzung ste/ steng du 'og kya myed kyi bar sa thug pa 'di lag 'thos kyi steng du bzhag ste/ bskal pa las skrag par 'jug la spyod lam thams cad kyang ston te/ byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu'i stobs
150b7(mdo): dang ldan pas/ thams cad stobs bsnyems shing zlo za dang / brgyas dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs pa'i shes che ba rnams so// stobs snyems pa dang / grol dang / da rgyal dang / dregs pa 'jug pa'i phyir chos ston du to// daMr+dz+dza
150b8(mdo): 'thul gyi rkang pa de dag nas byin gyi rlabs kyi ye shes 'thob bo// byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi ye shes des gang dang gang sa byi kyis brlabs pa de de kho na bzhin du 'gyur te/ des gas te rgya mo chen po ya yang ga rjes
151a1(mdo): tsam du gyur cig ces/ ba lang gi rje su byin gyis brlabs na/ ba sang gi rjes tsam du 'dug go// gas gyi rjes kyang rgya mtsho chen por gyur cig ces byin gas brlabs na/ rgya mtsho chen po nyid tu 'jug go// gal te bsre
151a2(mdo): pa'i bskas pa chu'i phung por gyur cig ces byin gyis brlabs na/ de chu'i phung po nyid du 'dug go// chu'i phu khro me'i phur por gyur cig ces byin gyis brlabs na/ de'i e'i phung po nyid du 'dug go// me'i phung po yang rung
151a3(mdo): gi phung por gyur cig ces byin gyis brlabs na/ de rlung gi phung po nyid du 'dug go// rlung gi phung po yang me'i phung por gyur cig ces byin gyis brlabs na/ de me'i phung po nyid du 'dug go/ me'i phung po yang sa'i phung po
151a4(mdo): nyid du gyur cig byin gyis brlabs na/ de'i sa'i phung po nyid du 'dug ge// / sa'i phur pa yang me'i phung por gyur cig ces byin gyis brlabs na de me'i phung po nyid dug go// de bzhin du tha ma dang / 'bring dang
151a5(mdo): rab kyi chos las gang dang gang byin gyis rlabs pa de dag de kho na bzhin 'dug go/ de'i byin gyi brlabs pa de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ma gtogs par brgya byin nas/ tshangs pa
151a6(mdo): bdud dam/ bdud kyi ris kyi sgra 'am/ sus kyang rung ste 'jig rten tu chos dang mthun pas sus kyang bskyod ya'am/ bskus la'am// myi snang bar byed myi nus te/ sems can gyi res na gang byang chub ses dpa'i
151a7(mdo): byin gyi brlabs des bskyed la'am/ 'phrul pa 'ang / kyi snang bar byed nus pa'i sems can de ga yang byed do// de byang chub sems dpa'i byed kyi rlabs kyi thegs kyi stobs bskyed pa des brjod pa sna tshogs
151a8(mdo): dga' ba dang / mgu ba sur len pa'i sems can rnams la sgra ji lta bzhin rtsa 'jug pas chos ston to// de'i rdzu 'phrus kyi rkang pa de dag kyang mngon par 'phags pa'o// rang gi kha na las pa'o// bdud dang nyon mongs
151b1(mdo): pa thams cad kyi yul las 'das pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi yul la/ 'jug pa'o// sems can thams cad sa myi gnod par sbyor ba'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / tshogs thams cad bstsags pa'o// bdud dang bdud kyi ros kyi lha rnams kyis
151b2(mdo): myi 'phrogs ste/ btsun pra sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul sa mngon par 'du byed pa shes pa'i mngon par shes pa myi zad pa ste/ btsun lag ra dwa ti'i bu 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
151b3(mdo): rnams kyi mngon par shes pa lnga phyi zad pa zhes bya'o// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsu pa'i dngos po bzhi gyi zad pa ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa dang / snyan pa
151b4(mdo): dang / don spyad pa dang / don mthun pa'o// des sbyin pa ni/ ga rbashing kyi sbyin pa dang chos sbyin pa'o// snyan par smra ba ni gang spong dang / chos nyan pa rnams sa tshig 'jam zhing snyan par sma'o
151b5(mdo): skyes don spyod pa ni gang bdag dang gzhan gi don bsam pa bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// de sa don mthun pa ni/ gang theg/ bgapas bdag yon tan tu 'du shes pa'i zin panyidas kyi
151b6(mdo): dang zang zing len pa rnams rab tu 'god pa'o// gzhan yang sbyin pa ni gang srong ba rnams sa yid mgu par sbyin pa'o// de sa snyan par smra ba ni slong po rnams la myi spong pa'o// ngos rod spyod pa ni gang slob rnams
151b7(mdo): kyi don yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// des don mthun pa ni gang theg pa de nyid la yang dag par 'jun pa'o// gzhon yang sbyin pa ni gang bsam pa zag pa nas gtong ba'o// snyan par smra ba na keng byu
151b8(mdo): sa yongs su chad pa myed pa'o// don spyad pa ni gang skrag pa'i bsam pas byin te/ 'gyod pa myed pa'o// don 'thun pa ni gang theg pa chen po sa yongs su sngo ba'o// gzhan yang sbyin pa ni gang byams pa'i rjes
152a1(mdo): su 'gro ba'i sems kyis yongs su gtong ba'o// snyan par smra ba ni gang dag pa dang / mchog tu dga' bar 'byung ba sems myi gtong ba'o// den spyod pa ni gong snying rje chen po/ yongs su dag pa'i sems bskyed pas/ se
152a2(mdo): rkye thams cad kyi bya ba ji yod pa dag la bzod pa'o// don mthun pa ni gang btang snyomos dang ldan pa'i sems mthong dab byed cing / thams cad mkhyend pa y-i zhes la yong su sngo ba'i sems so// gzhan sbyin pa'i gang chos bzhin
152a3(mdo): tsal pa'i 'ayongs 'apyod rnams yongs su gtong ba'o// snyan par smrab ni gang dag la sbyin pa de dag chos la rab tu 'jun pa'o// don kyang ba ni gang bdag gi don dang / gzhan ni don yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// don mthun
152a4(mdo): ba ni gang sems can thams cad kyi dod kyi phyir/ thams cad mkhyend pa tu skyed pa'o// gzhan yang sbyin pa ni gang nang dang / bya'o dngas rnams yongs su gtong ba'o// snyan pa'i smra ba ni gang chos thams
152a5(mdo): da kyi yon tan shes pas slob dpon gyi dpe' 'byung myed pa'o// don skyed pe ni gang bdag gi don btang ste gzhan gyi don byed pa'o// don mthun pa ni gang longs spyod pa sus te lag tu thob pa yang gzhan
152a6(mdo): dag sa khyen nas/ mye dga' ba myed pa'o// de la chos sbyin pa gang zhe na/ ji skad thos pa'i chos rnams ston pa'o// snyan par smra ba ni gang zang zing byed pa'i sems kyis chos yang dag pa rab tu ston pa'o// don
152a7(mdo): spyod pa ni gang gnon dgas sung dbog pa dang / kha ton byerd du 'jug pas kyi skyo la 'o/ don mthun pa'i ni gang thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bas chos rnyed par dang / gzhan dag kyang rab tu 'arjod
152a8(mdo): gnan sa kyim gyi phyid pa ni rta/ ga chos nyan pa 'ongs na do rlan sa yarnams so// kyai skyo napa myi ga yong bar chos ston pa'o// snyan par swA ba ni/ gapaji srid du rgyang ring por yang song ste/ dam pa'i chos
152b1(mdo): yang dag par ston pa'o// don spyad pa ni gang chos 'dod pa'i glang zag rnams/ lhung zed ma tshangs ngam/ kos dang / zas dang / mal stan dang / na pa'i gsos sman dang / yo byad myed dam/ gzhan yang nye de dag la gang dang ga
152b2(mdo): gyis bres bu de dag thams cad byin te/ ldog pa'i bsam par song ba'i sems kyi rgyud chos ston pa'o// don mthun pa'i ni gang chos kyi sbyin pa byin te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
152b3(mdo): byang chub tu yang dag par 'jud cing yongs su sngo ba'o// gzhan yang chos sbyin pa ni/ gang sbyin pa thams cad kyi mchog ni chos sbyin pa ni par rig nas chos kyi sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'o// snyan par smra ba ni gang phan pa'i dngos
152b4(mdo): po'i phyir chos ston pa'o// don spyad pa ni gang don la rton pa'i chos ston/ kyi/ ye ge la rton pa ni ma yin pa'o// don mthun pa nagang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i
152b5(mdo): phyir chos stond pa'o// gzhan yang chos kyi spyan pa ni/ gang sbyinaba'i pha rold tu phyi nad pa'o// snyan par smra ba ni tshus khrims kyi pha ro sad tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rosad tu phyind pa'o// 
152b6(mdo): dang po sems bskyed pa 'byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi'o// snyan par smra ba ni spyod pa la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kya / den spyad pa na phyir ldeg pa'i byang chub sems
152b7(mdo): don skyed pa ni/ grang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa'o// don mthun pa ni gang bsam gtan gi pha ro lad tu phyind pa dang / shos rab kyi pha ro sad tu phyi nad pa'o// gzhan yang chos smyon pa ni/ dang po
152b8(mdo): sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi'o// snyan pa smra ba ni spyod pa la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi'o// don spyad pa ni phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi'o// don mthun
153a1(mdo): pa ni/ skye thab gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi'o// gzhan yang chos kyi sbyin pa ni byang chub kyi ste ni pa rtsa ba dang / sa bon gyi gzhi'o// snyan par smra ba ni/ byang chub kyi myu gu dang / 'ad
153a2(mdo): ma yongs su rdzogs pa'o// don spyad pa ni byang chub kyi me tog yongs su rgyas pa'o// don mthun pa'i ni byang chub kyi 'bras bu mngon par grub pa ste/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
153a3(mdo): bsdu pa'i dngos po bzhi myi zad pa'o// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi myi zad pa ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ gang 'di don so so yang dag par rig pa dang
153a4(mdo): chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang / nges pa'i tshi ge so so yang / dag par rig pa dang / spongs pa so so yang dag par rig pa'o// de la don yang dag par rig pa gang zhe na/ gang chos thams cad la don
153a5(mdo): par shes pa ste/ chos shes pa dang / so sor rtog par shes pa dang / rjes su 'gro ba shes pa dang / rgyu shes pa dang / rkyen no/ sa pa dang / gnyis su myed par shes pa dang / tshogs par shes pa
153a6(mdo): tha mur 'gro ba shes pa dang / bran myi 'dug par shes pa dang / rkyen la 'jug par shes pa dang / chos kyi dbyings dbyer myed par shes pa dang / de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su 'jug pa shes pa dang / yang dag pa'i
153a7(mdo): mtha' la gnas shes pa dang / stong pa nyid rtogs pa'i shes pa dang / mtshan ma myed pa la dpyod pa shes pa dang / smod pa myed pa la 'a byed par shes pa dang / mngon par 'du myi byed pa la mngon par 'du byed pa myed
153a8(mdo): par shes pa dang / chus gcig sa 'jug pa'i zhes pa shes pa dang / bdag myed par rtogs pa'i shes pa dang / sems can myed par rtogs pa'i shes pa dang / srog myeng par shin tu rtogs pa'i shes pa dang / nga
153b1(mdo): zug myed pa don dam par shes pa dang / 'das pa'i nus sam chags pa'i shes pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i nus su thug pu myed par shes pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus na thams cad tu kha na ma tho ba byed par shes pa dang / 
153b2(mdo): phung po rnams sbyar mar shes pa dang / khams rnams sa smra sa gdug pa lta bur rtogs pa'i shes pa dang / skye mched rnams la gong stong pa lta bur nges par sems shes pa dang / nang nye bar zhi bar shes pa dang / phyi rol
153b3(mdo): tu rgya ba spyod pa shes yang // sus rnams sargya ba dang / kye brag byed pa bzhipa pa nga / drin pas gnas pa migs pa dang / mthong ba'i yongs su 'gro ba'i shes pa dang / blo gros kyis ma ma martog pa'i zhe
153b4(mdo): pardzogs pa dang / den pa rnams rtogs pa shes pa dang/ sun thas su / can 'byung ba sa mngon par gyi byed pa shes / 
153b5(mdo): gas pa/ sa rlob 'dzinas pa da / sa badzin pan ma gas pa dang / brag mas rkyen tu byin mchags pa / rkyen mongs kyis pa
154a1(mdo): shes pa dang / mtshan nyid mi dad pa rnams mtshan nyid ga cig tu shes pa dang / 'argyal rnamasas 'thas ma shes pa dang / marnams spyong sarnamams mamam sa spyod la byed pa shes pa dang / nya thos kyi la mazhin
154a2(mdo): sgra la rjes su 'gro las 'jug par shes pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa brten pas 'dug pa dang / rab tu dben zhing rtse gcig par shes pa dang / theg pa chen po sa dge ba'i rtsa ba dang tshogs thams cad spem pa nas
154a3(mdo): 'di na don so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang dod so so yang dag pa ni/ don so so yang dag par rig par rig bgagis/ chos thams cad sa don la rtog pas rton pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams
154a4(mdo): ca ni ma lus par spong pa ste/ sto pa mngon don dan do// chos thams cad ni ma sus par mtshan pa myed pa ste/ tsha ma byed pa'i don de ni do // chos thams cad ni ma lus par/ 
154a5(mdo): smod pa myed pa ste/ gang smon pa byed pa'i don de ni don no/ thams cad ni ma lus 'du gyi byed pa ste/ gang mngon pang / 'dra myi byed pa'i don da da chos thams cad ni sus par gyi skye ba ste/ 
154a6(mdo): kang ma lus par myi skye ba'i dod de ni don no// chos thams cad ni ma lus par ma byung ba ste/ gang ma sus par byung ba'i don de ni de nga / chos thams cad ni ma sum par dngos po myed pa ste/ gang ma lus pa
154a7(mdo): dngos po myed pa'i don de ni don no// chos thams cad ni ma lus par dben pa ste/ gang ma lus par dben pa'i don de ni don no// chos thams cani sus par bdag myed pa ste/ sems can byed pa/ srog myed pa/ gang zag
154a8(mdo): myed pa ste/ gang bdag myed pa dang / sems can myed pa dang / srog myed pa dang / gang zag byed pa'i don den te/ gang 'di lta bu'i chos rnams rtogs pa de ni/ don so so yang dag par rig par rig pa zhes bya'o// / 
154b1(mdo): gang 'dir bstan pa ni thogs pa myed par bstan pa/ chags pa myed par bsas da / chos thams cad thob par bstan pa ste/ don bstand pa de ni/ so so yang dag par rig pa de ni chos thams cad bstand pa la myi zad pa yin te/ 
154b2(mdo): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang yang dag par bka' stsa lad cing/ yang dag par rjes su thugs rang pa'o// yang dag pa dang / de kho na dang / ma log pa dang / gzhan ma yin pa ste/ shes rab dang / ye shes kyis
154b3(mdo): rtogs pa/ thams cad du kha na mtho ba ste// 'di ni don so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o// de la chos so so yang dag par rig pa gang zhe na/ gang chos thams cad la rjes su 'jug bla ste/ dge ba dang / myi dge ba
154b4(mdo): dang / kha na ma tho ba dang / kha na ma jo ba myed pa dang / zag pa bcas pa dang / zag pa myed pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / ga rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / bzang po dang / ngan pa dang / kun nas
154b5(mdo): nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i cha dang 'thun pa dang / 'khor// dang / mya ngan las 'das par nye bar song ba rnams la/ chos/ dpyid sa mnyam pa nyid du shes pa dang / byang chub mnyam pa nyid du shes pa dang / 
154b6(mdo): khams mnyam pa nyid shes pa 'di ni chos so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang chos so so yang dag par rig pa ni/ gang 'dod chags spyod pa'i sems can rnams kyi sems la 'jug cing 'bab par
154b7(mdo): shes pa dang / bcos ma'i 'dod chags spyod pa dang / bcos ma ma yin pa'i 'dod chags pyod pa dang / snrel gzhi 'i 'dod chags spyod pa dang / lha'i 'dod chags spyod pa dang / myi bzod pa'i 'dod chags spyod pa dang/ 
154b8(mdo): 'jas pa'i 'dod chags spyod pa dang / yang pa'i 'dod chags spyod pa dang / yab pa ma yin pa'i 'dod chags dpyod pa dang / kun rdzos kyi 'dod chags skyed pa dang / sbyor pa'i 'dod chags 'gyod pa dang / bsam pa 'i 'dod chags
155a1(mdo): spyod pa dang / snun pa'i bsam pa'i 'dod chags bapyod pa dang / mtshan nyid kyi 'dod chan sa spyod pa dang / nyid kyi mthun pa'i 'dod chags pa dpyod pa dang / nam gnag 'a yi da chags myong ba dang / rkyen
155a2(mdo): 'dod chags spyod pa dang / sngon gyi mtha'i rkyend kyi 'dod chags spyod pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha'i rkyen gyis 'dod chags sbyor ba dang / da ltar byung ba'i rkyen kyi 'dod chags spyod pa rnams dang / sems cad nang du 'dod chags la rgya
155a3(mdo): tu 'dod chags byed pa dag kyang song / sems can gyi phyi ros tu 'dod chags sa nang 'dod chags byed pa dag kyang yong // sems can du nang du yang 'dod chags la phyi rol tu yang 'dod chags dag kyang yo sems cad dang
155a4(mdo): nas byangs/ bya na ma myed pa ra kya ca gzun pas 'a ska dag tshogs byed pa dag kyi yong / bras 'ad sa
155a5(mdo): dri dpa rdo dang reg pas 'dod chags myed pa dag kyang yod/ dris 'dod chag/ sa/ gzugs dang / s+tha dang / ro dang / reg pa las 'dod chagasabyed pa kyang yod/ ros 'dod chags la/ gzugs dang / sgra dang / 
155a6(mdo): ridang / red pas byed pa dag kyang yod/ sa can dan pa mis dadu chags sa gzugs A dang dro ma dza sngags byed na de/ 'dun sems can rnams sa 'dod can byang pa
155a7(mdo): kyang 'jug pa ste/ 'jug pa'i no 'das sems can rnams kyi 'dod chags la spyod pa nya 'i gcig stong ngo // sems can rnams kya kyi zhe sdangs sbyong ba yang nyid ni gcig stong ngo // sems can rnams kyi gti mugs byed
155a8(mdo): rlogacin gang / bams can rnams kyis mnyam pas spyod pa yang nya gcog gadza / gapa sems can kyi pyod pa brgyad kyi yan ma po de dag na sems kyi 'dug pa dang / 'bas pa shes pa dang / ma tsharig pa 'i/ 
155b1(mdo): ldan pags pa dang / rgyasasas kyi 'dum shes 'ad/ cad ma khye zag ji skyeb bzhin shes pa dang / dram cu na banas sa ba yinas gnas ma
155b2(mdo): dag par rig pa zhes byas/ des nges pa ni tshig sa so yang dag par rig pa gang zhe na/ sems can thams cad kyang mangs 'dun shes / sa'i skad dang / rgyan nad dang / nang na na gang nga / dri ma dgasas
155b3(mdo): nam mkha' sI dang / byisam ci dang / lto phye chen po dang / phyi dang / phyi ma yin pa'i skad la 'jug pa shes pa ste/ mdor na dzA snyed du 'gro pa sngang skyes pa 'i sems can rnams kyi skad dang / swAng+ga dang / dbyangs dang / tshig ni lam
155b4(mdo): da/ nges pa'i tshig dang / brang dang / skyed pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad rab tu shes te/ shes nas kyang sgra de dang dan dang / nges lade dang de dag gis/ sems can ni dang de dag la/ rna jis
155b5(mdo): tu 'jug pas chos ston te/ 'di ni nges pa'i tshig sa so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang nges bI ni so so yang dag par rin pa'i spyod pa 'di dag 'di lta bur brtags par bya chos 'di dag 'di lta bur
155b6(mdo): brtus par bya/ chos 'di dag 'di lta bur mtshams spyar par bya chos 'di dag 'di lta bur 'odu chung par bya/ chos 'di dag ni lta bur lo gi rnams kyis brtan par bya'o zhe// gcig gi tshig kyang shes/ gnyis kyi tshig kyang shes
155b7(mdo): mang po'i tshig kyang shes/ skyes pa'i tshig kyang shes bud byed kyi tshig kyang shes/ ma na bcig kyang shes/ 'das pa mi mig kyang shes ma 'ongs pa'i tshig kyi shes/ da ltar byung ba'i tshod kyang shes/ ye ge gcig tu
155b8(mdo): sgro btags pa'ang shes/ yi ge tu mar sgro btags pa yang shes/ sgro btags pa myed pa yang shes te/ 'di ni nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang nges pa'i tshig ni/ chos thams cad 'gon
156a1(mdo): sa tshig gis chos shes pa ste/ 'di ni nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o// de'i nges pa'i tshig de ni thogs pa myed pa/ 'jug pa byed pa shin tu rnam par gzhag pa/ zlos pa myed pa/ gyi drag pa/ ma brtags
156a2(mdo): zur phyind pa/ rnam par gsal pa/ don dang ye ges bskor ba/ ji lta ba bzhin du 'khor tshim par byed pa/ rnam pa sna tshogs pa/ zab mo zab par snang ba/ kun rdzob dang / don dam pas brgyad pa/ rang gi sems dang / shes pa dang
156a3(mdo): lta ba rtogs pa/ sangs rgyas kyis bkal stsa la pa/ sems can thams cad mgu bar byed pa ste/ 'di ni nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag pa rig pa zhes bya'o// de la spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa na/ 'di lta ste/ chags pa
156a4(mdo): myed par lung bsgo ba bstan pa shes pa dang / phyad par lung bsgo ba bstan pa shes pa dang / thogs pa myed par lung bsgo za bstan pa shes pa dang / dar pa'i spobs pa dang / la kor du sprozas pa dang / mgyogs pa'i spobs pa
156a5(mdo): dang / 'bras bu yod pa'i spobs pa dang / ji ltar dris pa bzhin tu spongs pa dang / myi 'phrogs pa'i spobs pa dang / yongs su myo mnyam pa'i spobs pa dang / shin tu 'brel pa'i spobs pa dang / rtog
156a6(mdo): spobs pa dang / chos la dga' ba'i spobs pa dang / bzod pa'i stobs ya gnas pa'i spobs pa dang / zab mo la spobs pa dang / sna tshogs kyis spobs pa dang / kun rdzob dang / don dam pa la spobs pa dang / sbyin
156a7(mdo): pa dang / tshus khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab la spobs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu dbye ba bstan pa la spobs pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
156a8(mdo): dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkepa lha dang/ dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam zhab mo la spobs pa dang / zhi gnas dang / lhan mthong la spongs pa ste/ spobs pa stobaso yang dag
156b1(mdo): par rig pa zhes bya ba ni/ gang la nges pa'i tshig sa rtog pas tshig gi chos shes pa dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par tha rad pa dang / ting nge 'dzind dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / bden pa la 'jug pa'i spobs pa'o// theg pa thams
156b2(mdo): cad la spobs pa'o// yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du bstan pas/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa tshim par bya ba la spobs pa ste/ kyi 'dor myi rgyags pa'i tshig dang / myi badrang ba'i tshig dang / brtan pa'i cho ga dang / gyi
156b3(mdo): pa'i tshig dang / 'jam pa'i tshig dang / dag pa'i cho ga dang / rab tu grol ba'i tshon dang / thogs pa myed pa'i tshig dang / zur phyin pa'i tshi ga dang / nges pa'i cho ga dang / mya g.yo ba'i tshig dang / mya rgod pa'i tshag dang / zhi pa'i tshig/ 
156b4(mdo): dang / bcupa pa mchog dang / btsun pa'i tshig dang / 'brel pa tshi/ dadang / la byed pa mchog dang / shin tu rig pa'i tshon pa dang / mnga' byed pa'i tshogs dang / snyan pa'i tshig dang / mnyes pa tshig
156b5(mdo): ma smid pa'i tshig dang / shin tu stug pa'i tshig dang / 'phags pa sa cad kyis rab tu bsngags pa'i tshig ste/ zhing mtha' yas par go bar byed pa'i rjes su song ba'i dbyangs dang / tshangs pa'i
156b6(mdo): sgra skad sa rtog cing go bar byed pa'i rjes su song ba'i dbyangs dang / sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa'i spobs pas sems can gzhan dag dang / gang zag gzhan dag gi dbang po mchog dang / mchog ma yin pa shes
156b7(mdo): sa chom ston te/ de mi chos ston pa de yang / de byed pa/ yang dag par sdug bsngal zad par bya ba'i phyir nges par 'byub bar 'gyur te/ 'din zhes pa ma yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o// btsun pa sha ra brgyan
156b8(mdo): na dan ni byang chub sems dpal rnams rgyaso so yang dag par rig pa ban kyi 'a ba'o// bam po drug / btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang bya
157a1(mdo): sems dpa' rnams kyi rton pa bzhi yid myi zad pa ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ don la rton gyi tshig 'phrus kyi rton pa dang / ye shes sa rton kyi rnam par shes pas gyi rton pa dang / nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde sa rtson gyi drang ba'i
157a2(mdo): ngan rgyas rdo rjel kyi rten pa dang / chos nyid sa rten gyi gang zags kyi rton pa'o// des don ni gang / tshig 'bru ni gang na ma/ cig 'bru zhes bya badzi/ gapa'ajig rten pa'i chos dang bya ba la 'dun pa'o// dad ces bya ba ni gang 'dzin
157a3(mdo): rten las 'das pa'i chos rtogs pa'o// tshig 'phya zhes bya ba ni/ gang sbyin pa dang / rgyas pa dang / legs par sdom pa dang / nges par bstan pa'o// gdod ces bya ba ni/ gang sbyin pa dang / rgyas la dang / legs par rdzom pa dang / nges pa'i
157a4(mdo): mnyam pa nyid shes pa'o// tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni/ gang 'khor ba'i skyon bsgrags shing bstan pa'o// don ces bya ba ni kang 'khor pa la myi dmyigs par rtog pa'o// tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni gang mya ngan sas 'das pa'i yon tan dang / 
157a5(mdo): da yon brjod pa'o// don ces bya ba ni rang bzhin gyis mya ngan las la das pa'i chos thams cad sa rnam par myi rtog pa'o// tshig 'dran des bya ba ni// gang theg pa ji ltar rnam par gzhog pa bzhin du ston pa'o
157a6(mdo): don ces bya ba ni chos kyi dbyings dbyer myed cing / tshul gcig pa sa la drug pa zhes bya'o// tshig 'dra zhes bya ba ni gang 'dog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba bstan pa'o// don ces bya ba ni gang 'khor gsu
157a7(mdo): yongs su dag par shes pa'o// tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni gang sus dang ngag dang yid kyi sdom pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bslab pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad ba sbyangs pa'i thams cad yang dag par blang ba
157a8(mdo): bstan pa'o// don ces bya ba ni gang sus dang / ngag dang yid myi dmyigs pa dang / sdom pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bslab pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad bsnyungs pa yang dag par blang bar bstan pa yongs
157b1(mdo): su dag par shes pa'o// tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni gnod sems dang / za ba dang / skyon dang / khro ba dang / khon su 'dzind pa dang / nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs pa thams cad yang dag par 'jom zhing / bzod pa'i stobs dang / 
157b2(mdo): nges par bstan pa'o// don ces bya ba ni gang myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'o// tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni gang dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par bsgrubs pa la 'artson 'grus brtsam lnga bstan pa'o// don ces bya ba ni
157b3(mdo): gang blang ba dang / dor ba la myi gnas pa'i 'artson 'grus so// tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni/ gang bsam gtan dang / rnam par thard pa dang / ting nge 'dzind dang / snyoms par 'jug pa bstan pa'o// don ces bya ba ni gang
157b4(mdo): 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa shes pa'o// tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni ka der thos pa thams cad 'dzind pa'i shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// don ci/ sa bya ba ni gang brjod du myed pa'i don shes pa'o// tshig 'bru zhes bya ba
157b5(mdo): ni/ gang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum rtsa rtsa bdun yang dag par rje snyan pa'o// don ces bya ba ni gang byang chub phyogs kyi chos bslu'i pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byed pa'o// tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni/ dang
157b6(mdo): sdug bsngal pa dang / kun 'byung ba dang / lam gyi bden pa yang dag par bstan pa'o// don ces bya ba ni gang 'gog pa mngon sum du byed pa'o// tshig 'bru zhes pa ni gang ma rig pa la stsogs pa rga shi'i bang du yang dag
157b7(mdo): par bstan pa'o// don ces bya ba ni gang ma rig pa 'gog pa nas rga shi'i 'gog pa'i bar bya'o// tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni gang zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong gi tshogs bstan pa'o// don ces bya ba ni gang rig pa dang / rnam
157b8(mdo): par grol pa'o ye shes so// tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni/ gang 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / ma mnyam par pyod pa'i sems can rnams sa bstan pa'o// ren ces bya ba ni gang sems can rnams
158a1(mdo): dgro bar myi 'khrugs pa'i ye shes so// tshig 'bru ces bya ba ni/ gang sgrib pa dang / sgrib par 'gyur ba'i chos rnams yang dag par bstan pa'o/ don ces bya ba ni gang sgrib pa myed pa'i ye shes pa dang / rnam
158a2(mdo): par thar pa'o// tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni gang dkon mchog na rlom gi yon tan dang bsngags pa mtha' yas pa bstan pa'o// don ces bya ba ni gang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sku mthong ba dang / 'dod chags dang bral zhing 'gog pa'o chos
158a3(mdo): nyid dang 'dus ma byas kyi sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi yon sgrub pa'i ye shes so// tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni/ gang sems te dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa'i bar kyi byang chub
158a4(mdo): sems dpa'i yon tan gyi tshogs bstan pa'o// don ces bya ba ni gang sems kyi skad / gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis/ thams cadamakhyend pa'i ye shes mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ mngon
158a5(mdo): na chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong bstan pa 'di ni tshig 'bru zhes bya'o// kang sems bdug kyi skad dang / ye ge dang / tshig 'brusra brjod du myed pa'i don de ni don me 'di ni don la rton gyi tshig
158a6(mdo): 'phrul myi rton pa zhes bya'o// de la rnam par shes pa ni gang / ye shes ni gang zhe na/ rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba ni/ rnam par shes pa gnas pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rnam par shes pa
158a7(mdo): gnas pa na/ gzugs la nye bar 'gro zhing gnas pa dang / rnam par shes pa gnas pa na/ tshor ba sa nye bar 'gro ba dang / 'du shes pa nye bar 'gro ba dang / 'du byed la nye bar 'gro zhing gnas pa ste
158a8(mdo): 'di ni rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// de la ye shes gang zhe na/ rkang phung po bzhi la gnas nor na nin po yongs su shes pa ste/ 'di ni ye shes zhes bya'o// gzhan yang rnam par shes ni sa'i khams rnam
158b1(mdo): bar shes pa dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gtikhams rnam par shes pa ste/ 'di ni rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// gang khams rnam po na po 'di ngan sa gnas pa'i rnam par shes pa la chos kyi dbying/ 
158b2(mdo): dbye ma myed par shes pa 'di ni ye shes bya'o// gzhan yang rnam par shes pa ni gang myig kau shes rabang bya ba'i gzugs rnams sa rnam par rig pa dang / de bzhin gyi/ nabs shes par bya ba'i sgra rnapas dang / sngas shes pa
158b3(mdo): bya ba'i dri nas dang / skyes shes par bya ba'i ro rnams dang / lus kyis shes par bya ba'i mi// rnams dang / saM kyis par bya ba'i chos rnamasas rnam par rig pa ste/ 'di ni rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// kapasang napan+te
158b4(mdo): bang zhi zhing phyi ros tu myed pa dang / ye shes la rton pas chos kangs/ yang bya rtog rnam 'ang phye rten la 'di ni ye shes zhes bya'o// gzhan yang dmyigs pa las rnam khar shes pa 'a skye ba dang / da
158b5(mdo): sa byed pa las rnam pa shes pa skye ba nga yongs su rtog pa sa rnam par shes pa skye ba 'din rnam padu zhes bya'o// rkang yang dzind pa byed pa dang / mchog tu 'dzin pa byed pa dang / dargyan
158b6(mdo): mabyed pa dang / rnam par rig pabyed pa dang / rtog pa byed pa 'don ye shes zhes bya'o// gzhan yang 'dus byas rgya ba'i mas pa shes pa skye ste 'dus pa byas pa ni rnam par shes pa sgru ba byed do/ gang
158b7(mdo): ma byas su zhes pa ni ye shes so// gzhan yang skye ba dang / 'jig lal gnas yan rnam par shes pa'o// rgya skye ba dang / phyir non pas gnas pa 'di ni ye shes te/ 'di ni ye shes la rten gyi/ rnam par zhes
158b8(mdo): sa myi rtog pa zhes bya'o// des nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde ni gang drad pa'i don gyi mdo sde na gang // mdo sde gang dag la sems 'jug par bstan pa de dag ni drang ba'i don ces bya'o// mdo sde gang dag 'bras bu la
159a1(mdo): na pas da pa dag ni nges par da / 'i kya na na na mar/ gang dag do ni 'an zin sa
159a2(mdo): mdo sde gang dag sas dang bya ba la 'jug pa stan pa dag ni drang ba mdzod ces bya'o// mdo rje gang dgasas dang / nyan mongs 'du zad par bya ba ma phyir bstan pa de dag ni nges la mngon ces bya'o// mdo sde gang dag shun nas
159a3(mdo): nyon mongs pa bshad pa'i phyir bstan pa de dag ni drang pa'i don ces bya'o// mdo sde gang dag rnam par byang pa yongs su dag pa bya ba'i phyir bstan pa de dag ni nges pa'i don ces bya'o// mdo sde gang dag 'khor pa la yid 'byung
159a4(mdo): nga bya la bstan pa de dag ni drang ba'i don ces bya'o// mdo sde gang dag 'khor la dang / mya ngan las 'das pa gnyis su myed pa la 'jug pa bstan pa'adi ni res nyes bya'o// 'de sde gang dag tshig dang yi ge sna tshogs
159a5(mdo): gru 'astan pa de dag ni drang ba'i rin ces bya'o// mdo sde gang dag zab mo mthod pa dgas pa/ 'du byung ba dga' ba bstan po ngagan sa pa 'angon ces khyim mdo sdig padag tshig dang myang zhing sems cad kyi
159a6(mdo): sems dga' bar bya bas phyir bstan pa de dag ni drang ba'i dan ces byamo// mdo sde gang dag cheg dang yi ge nyung / sems nges par snyems par byed pam bstan pa de dag dngos pa 'don ces bya'o// mdo sde gang / 
159a7(mdo): bdag dang / sems can dang / thog dang / gso nga / skyes bu dang / gas cag dang / gangs skyes dang / gyu dang / byed pa po dang / po dang / blarnam pa tshogs su bshad pa dang / ban ma gyi
159a8(mdo): sa bdan po dang bcas papa bsnyan pa de dag ni drang ba'i don ces bya'o// mdo sde gang dag stong pa nyid dang / mams byed gyi dang / sdom pa byed pa dang / mngon par 'argya gyi byid pa dang / skyes pa dang / ma byung ba sa
159b1(mdo): dngos po byed pa dang / bdag myed pa dang / sems can byed pa dang / srog myed pa dang / gang zag myed pa dang / bdag po myed pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo'i bar tu bstan pa de dag ni nges pa'i don ces bya ste/ 'di ni nges
159b2(mdo): pa'i don gyi mdo sde la rton gyi/ drang ba'i don gyi mdo sde la myi rton pa zhes bya'o// de la chos nyid ni gang / gang zag ni gang zhe na/ gang gang zag tu sta la la gnas te/ gang chos kha cig sa rtsom pa 'di ni gang zag ces bya'o/ 
159b3(mdo): gang gang zag tu blta ba de'i rtsom pa yongs su shes yi ni chos nyid ces bya'o// gzhan yang so so'i skye bo'i gang zag dang so so'i skye bo 'i gla zag dang / dad pas rjes su 'brang ba'i gang zag dang / chos kyi rjes su
159b4(mdo): 'brang ba'i gang zag dang / brgyad pa'i gang zag dang / rgyun tu da zhugs pa li gang zag dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i gang zag dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'gang zag dang / dgra bcom pa'i 'gang zag da
159b5(mdo): rang sangs rgyas kyi gang zag dang / byang chub sems dpa'// gang zag dang / gang zag cig 'jig rten du 'byung na/ skye 'omang pos phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten sa
159b6(mdo): snying 'artse ba dang / swa dang / byi'i skye bo phal po che'i don kyi phyir/ phan pa'i phyir bde ba'i phyir/ swA dang / kye rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang zag gcig po 'jig rten du byung ste/ 
159b7(mdo): zag gi sgra de dag thams cad ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas kun rdzob kyi tshig gis gnas kyis sems can rnams drang ba'i phyir bstan pa ste/ de la gang dag mngon par zhen pa de dag ni rton pa ma yin pa zhes bya ste/ 
159b8(mdo): de dag rton pas gzud pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang chos nyid sa rton cig/ gang zag la ni ma yin no zhes gsungs so// de la chos nyid gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ 'gyur ba byed pa dang / sgra btags pa
160a1(mdo): myed pa dang / bya ba byed pa dang / rnam par bya ba myed pa dang / gyi gnas pa dang / rab tu myi gnas pa dang / rtse ba byed pa dang / thams cad du mnyam pa dang / mnyam la dag sa mnyam pa dang la mnyam pa dang / gyi mnyam
160a2(mdo): ba dag la mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa dang / gyi mnyam pa nyid sa mnyam la dang / rtog pa byed la dang / rtsom pa byed pa dang / chos thams can sa skyon byed pa rnyed pa dang / shin tu nam mkha'i rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid 'di ni chos nyid ces bya'o/ 
160a3(mdo): de la gang dag chos nyid la rton pa dag ni khams gang la yang byi rton no// de bas na chos kyi sgo tshul 'jug pa 'dis chos thams cad la rton pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad chos nyid kho nar gyur pa 'di ni/ chos nyid la rton kyi/ gang zag
160a4(mdo): la myi rton pa zhes bya ste/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams rton pa'i bzhi myi zad pa'o// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'o yu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsod nams dang ye shes
160a5(mdo): kyi tshogs kyang myi zad pa yin te/ de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsod nams kyi tshogs myi zad pa gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa sas byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / tshul khrims dang / 
160a6(mdo): bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / byams pa'i sems la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / snying rje chen po'i sbyor ba dang / dge ba thams cad rtsom pa dang / bdag dang / gzhan gi sdig pa bshags pa dang / slob bya
160a7(mdo): gyi bslob pa thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / sems dpa'o skyed pa dang / phyir gyi ldog pa dang / skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'o byang chub sems dpa la rnams kyis dus gsum du yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i masod nas
160a8(mdo): thams cad dang / rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / slob dang / gyi slob pa thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / sems dbub skyed pa dang / bying gyi sdon pa dang / skye la gcig gis thogs yin
160b1(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed pa la rjes su yid rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba
160b2(mdo): thams cad la/ rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sa slob pa dang / myi slob pa thams cad la chos kyi sbyin pa gsold pa dang
160b3(mdo): sku che bsrid par gsol pa dang / ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / dge bal+li thams cad la rjes su yi rang ba dang / skul ba dang / gsos pa gdab pa'i rtsa ba bsags pa rnams dang / byang chub tu bsngo ba dang ldan pa'i
160b4(mdo): bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / sems can byang chub tu sems ma skye snad pa rnams byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / byang chub tu semes bskyed pa rnams la pha rold tu phyind pa'i lam ston pa dang / seMs
160b5(mdo): can dbus po rnams kyi spyod kyis yang dag par bsdu pa dang / sems can nad pa rnams la sman sbyin zhing g.yo myed par rig byed pa dang / mthu chung ba rnams la bzod pas ston pa dang / ltung ba myi 'chab
160b6(mdo): ba dang / sdig pa 'chags pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa rnams la mchod pa dang / rim gro thams cad rtsom pa dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon dag la ston pa bzhin
160b7(mdo): tu phangs par 'dzid pa dang / chos rnams la rin tad myed pa'i rin po che tshol ba ltar brtson bu dang / chos smra ba rnams la sangs rgyas bzhin du phangs par 'dzin pa dang / dpag tshad brgyar yang song zhing dam pa'i chos nyan
160b8(mdo): bas kyi rims pa dang / chos sa bslob dpon gyi dpe mnyud byed pa dang / ba zing byed par chos sbyin pa dang / choms mi zang byed pa'i rin po che bzhin du phangs par 'dzin pa dang / sa bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / 
161a1(mdo): man 'a dang / byas 'acom pa dang / byas nas 'byod 'as rjemadan pas rtson pa lam mo ma pa nga/ sus pa sdoms pas sus kyi rgyam mchos pa byed pa dang / sas khas pa/ gnas ma babyed
161a2(mdo): dang / 'di 'a mas mas na kyi rgyas 'tshas paskyed pa dang / de bzhin// shegs pa mchod rten rab tu 'dzig pas tshangs pa'i bzod nam sa zungs su 'dzin du pa dang / gtan pa byed la sa med skyed pam can yongs su rdzogs
161a3(mdo): byed pa dang / dge sa 'i pa'i rgyags bsngags pas dpe byad ba dang pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / brgyas byed pas sus brgyan pa dang / rang gi nyes pa thams cad spangs pas ngag brgyan pa dang / sems cad rnas
161a4(mdo): cad layong rdzo ba myed pa'i sems kyis sems brgyad pa dang / mdo ma par shes pas rnam par 'bras pas/ sangs rgyas kyi ning na rgyan tu 'gyur ba dang / 'dod chags dang bral la mchos nyid kyis chos kyi
161a5(mdo): kun tu zhugs 'gyur ba dang / bra ma byed pa dang / zhes gcod byed pa dang / 'byed pa mtshan gyi skabs 'khor kyi rgyan tu dang / 'arjod pa sa rje med pa byed par byed pas chos gzung bar 'gyur
161a6(mdo): ba dang / 'bras bu yod pa'i chos patsun pas ras dga' nas legs so zhes bya ba phyin pa dang / legs pam bshad pa rton sapa sa smim pa rnam par song ba dang / nges par 'byin pa ni chom mnyan pa'i byar sti byas te chom
161a7(mdo): nyan pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la btus bzhugs kyi nags phyal bas byang chub kyi 'o/ nga rnyan tu 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas macom ldan 'das rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sngon tu 'gro bas byang chu/ 
161a8(mdo): kyi snying po'i rkyen tu 'gyur ba dang / las dang nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis myi gos pas skye ba dang 'chi po yongs su dag pa dang rin po che dang / phangs pa'i dngos po thams cad la mya lte bar yongs su gtong bas lag na
161b1(mdo): rin po ches 'thob pa dang / gter gyi zad pa rab tu byen pas longs spyod kyi zad pa dang / bzhin 'dzum zhing khro ga nyer byed pas sems can rnams mthong ma khrag tu dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / sems can thams cad las
161b2(mdo): ma mnyam pa nyid kyi rkyen thob pa dang / ma lobs pa rnams la myi brnyas pas/ 'od bkod pa gtong ba dang / tshul khrims kyi bsod nams bstsags pas skye ba yongs su dag pa dang / srung ba myi gleng bas mang
161b3(mdo): gyi gnas yongs su dag pa dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su dag pas lha dang phyir skye ba dang / rjes su bstan pa thams cad la rnam par myi rtog pas/ rnam par gnon pa dang / chos thams cad sa slob dpon kyi
161b4(mdo): dpel 'khyud myed pas chos thams cad la dbang ba dang / bsam payongs su dag pas 'jig rten thams cad la dbang ba dang / semaso yongs su dag pa byed pas/ rang gi sangs rgyas kyis zhing yongs su
161b5(mdo): dag pa dang / las kyi rnam par sbyin pa la rton pas lhag pa'i 'a pa yongs su dag pa dang / nyo tshe ba'i spyod pa phyi 'dod pas/ ngas rgyas kyi chos rgya chen po la mos la dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
161b6(mdo): kyi sems kyi gtong bas// bsod nams thams cad yongasu 'dzin dang / dad pa sngon tu 'gro bas dor bdun yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / lus dang srogs kyi stabs sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su 'dzin dpang
161b7(mdo): sngon dam bcas pa nyams 'og tu chud pas byed pas/ 'jig rten thams cad la gyi skye ba dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / de ltar rgyu rkang gis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su
161b8(mdo): rjenapa par 'byung ba'i rgyu de dang de dag yang dag 'phrub pa/ 'di na// btsun phrag ra dwa ti'i bu mdo na byang chub sems dbu' rnams kyi bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi zad par zhes bya ste/ rgya cher ni bskas pa 'am des su
162a1(mdo): kyang lhag par bshad do// de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi tshogs myi zad pa gang zhe na/ rgyu gang dang rkyen gang gis ye shes rtogs par 'gyur rgyu de dag dang / rkyen de dag byang chub sems dpa'
162a2(mdo): yang dag par bsgrub pa ste/ de la rgyu ni gang rkyen ning zhe gang 'di ye shes yongs su chos pas rab tu 'dun pa dang / ye shes rtogs pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la rtag tu sten pa dang / 'grogs pa dang / bsnyen
162a3(mdo): bkur byed pa dang / gang yang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes pa rtod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes sa kyi ston pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag sa nga rgyal byed cing // tha ma bzhin du phangs par 'dzan
162a4(mdo): pa ste/ dge ba'i gshes gnyen de dag gis kyang 'di bsam pa dun sum tshogs pa/ rig nas/ 'brel pa'i gtam pa dang sprul pa byed do/ snod tu rig nas rgyan gyi chad pas phyi ros ma yin pa'i tshim
162a5(mdo): ston te/ des chos thams cad de dag thos nas/ chos kyi tshogs la spyod pa byed de/ gang chos kyi tshogs sa sbyospyor ba de na demi ye shes kyi tshogs yin no/ des chos kyi tshogs sa sbyor 'am
162a6(mdo): zhe na/ gang 'di don nyung ba dang / byang nyu ba dang / smra ba nyung ba dang / yod byad nyung ba dang / nam mi stod dang / nam gyi cha smad la gyinyas zhing rnal 'byoras 'tshon pa dang / thos pa'i don la rton pa dang / yang
162a7(mdo): dang yang chos ba dang / sems la rnyog pa myed pa dang / sgra'i pa rnams rnam par seld pa dang / ltung ba rnams las 'byung ba shes pa dang / 'gyod pa myed pa dang / kun nas ldang ba myed pa dang / spru pa snying por byed pa
162a8(mdo): dang chos la gzhol ba dang / chos la 'bab pa dang / chos la la ba dang / dus dang ldan pa dang / ye shes chos pas mgo dang gos pa me 'bar ba sta bu dang / de la ma chags par gnas pa dang / tshul khrims la mya/ 
162b1(mdo): smod pa dang / brtson pa myi gtong pa dang / khyad par du 'gro la dang / 'du 'jis kyi dag pa dang / gcig pu dga' ba dang / dkon las mngon du phyogs zhing yid la byed pa dang / 'phags pa'i rigs chog shes pa dang / sbyangs pa'i
162b2(mdo): yon tan dag las myi g.yo ba dang / chos kun dag las dka' zhing mos pa dang / 'jigs rten pa'i sngags dran par myi 'dzin pa dang / 'jig brten las 'das pa'i chos tshol ba dang / brjed pa myed pa dang / don rtogs
162b3(mdo): pa'o rjes su 'gro ba dang / blo gros kyi lom dang 'thun pa dang / brtan pas sdom dang / rkyen rnams kyis ye shes kyi rjes su 'gro ba dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pas brgyan pa dang / ye shes kyi rjes su 'gro ba
162b4(mdo): snyung byed pa dang / myi shes pa sel ba dang / ma rig pa dang / gtide ga gi mun pa dang / rab rib kyi ying rtog gis chod pa bsasapa dang / shes rab kyi myig rnam par dag pa dang / blo shin tu rnam pa
162b5(mdo): dag pa dang / blo rgya che ba dang / blo ma zhum pa dang / blo ma gyes pa dang / mngon sum tu shes pa dang / yon tan gzhan sa ra/ ma us pa dang / bdag gi yon tan mya snyems pa dang / gzhan gi
162b6(mdo): yon tan yongs su brjod pa dang / legs par bya ba'i las byed pa dang / las kyi rnam par sbyin pa dang / 'gal bar byed pa dang / las yongs su dag pa'i ye shes te/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub
162b7(mdo): sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi tshogs myi zad pas zhes bya'o// gzhan yang ye shes kyi tshogs rnam pa dra ni ste/ rnam pa bzhi gang zhe na/ phyin pa bzhi po 'di dag ni ye shes kyi tshogs rab tu stsogs par 'gyur te
162b8(mdo): bzhi po gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos smra ba la phro ba dang / spyi ku dang / sdug tsha dang / glegs pam spyon pa dang / chos smra ba rnams sa chos kyi stan sna tshogs sbyin pa dang / chos smra ba rnams la rnyed pa dang / 
163a1(mdo): bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa thams cad sbyin pa dang / chos smra ba rnams la chos bsdu ba'i phyir g.yo myed par legs so zhes byas su ni pa ste/ sbyin pa bzhi po de dag gis ni ye shes kyi tshogs zhugs par
163a2(mdo): 'gyur ro// bsrung ba bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi tshogs stsogs par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos smra ba rnams rje bo bzhin tu srung ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bsrung ba
163a3(mdo): dang / yul dang ljongs kyi phyogs srung pa dang / phan pa'i dngos lo srung ba ste/ srung ba bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi tshogs stsogs par 'gyur ro// nye bar rton pa bzhi po 'di
163a4(mdo): dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi tshogs stsogs par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos smra ba rnaMm la zang zing gis nye bar rton pa dang / chos kyis nye bar rton pa dang
163a5(mdo): myi 'jigs pas nye bar rton pa dang / byams pas nye bar rton pa ste/ nye bar brten pa bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi tshogs sogs par 'gyur ro/ stobs lnga po 'di dag ni byang chub
163a6(mdo): sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi tsho gas sogs par 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ mos pa'i phyir dad pa'i stobs dang / zos pa chos pa'i phyir brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang / byang chub kyi sems myi brjed
163a7(mdo): pa'i phyir dran pa'i stobs dang mnyam pa nyidas sems nges par sems pa'i phyir/ ting nge 'dzid dag stobs dang / zos pa'i stonas kyi phyir shes rab kyi stobs te/ stobs lnga po de dag ni/ byang chub sems
163a8(mdo): dpal rnams kyi ye shes kyi tshogs bstsogs par 'gyur ro// tshul khrims bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpal rnams kyi ye shes kyi tshogs sogs par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe ni/ 'di lta ste
163b1(mdo): chos la rab tu dga' ba'i tshul khrims dang / chos yongs su tshol pa'i tshul khrims dang / chos la nges par sems pa'i tshul khrims dang / byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba'i tshul khrims te/ tshul khrims bzhi po de dag ni byang chub
163b2(mdo): sems dpa' rnams kyi zhes gyi tshogs stsogs par 'gyur ro// bzod pa 'am po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi legs kyi tshogs kyim 'gyur te la zhi gang ne na/ 'dis ste chos chos ma brtson pa
163b3(mdo): ngan du brjod pa dang / nganang du smra ba'i tshig gisam bzod pa dang / chos tshol pa la brtson pas/ rlung dang / nyi ma dang / grang ba dang / tsha ba dang / bkres pa dang / sgom pa bzod pa dang / chos tshol las brtson pas
163b4(mdo): mkhan po dang / slob dpon dang mthun par 'jug pa'i bzod pa dang / chos chos pa la 'artson pas/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myedapa dang / smon pa myed pa'i chos la bzod pa ste/ bzod pa bzhi po/ 
163b5(mdo): de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi tshogs sonas par 'gyur ro// brtsod 'grus pan po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi cho pa phrogs par 'gyur te/ 
163b6(mdo): bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ nyan pa'i 'artson 'grus dang / 'dzin pa brtson 'grus dang / bstan pa'i brtson 'grus dang / nan tan gyi 'gron de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgya ye shes
163b7(mdo): gyi tshogs rdzogs par 'gyur ro// thamam gtan g.yan lag pan po 'di dag ni ye shes/ tshogs lugs par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di s+ho ste// dben pa dang / rtse gcig pa dang / rnamam gtan dang / 
163b8(mdo): mngon par shes pa chos pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes pa rton pa ste/ bsam gtan gi yan lag bzhi po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpal rnams kyi ye shes kyi tshogs stsogs par 'gyur ro// shes
164a1(mdo): kyi snang ba bzhi po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi chog po 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chad pa la gyi gnas pa dang / rtag lal gyi 'jug pa dang / rten cing 'brel
164a2(mdo): 'am 'byung ba dang / myi 'gal ba dang / bdag myed pa la bzod pa ste/ shes rab kyi snang bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpal rnams kyi ye shes kyi tshogs stsogs par 'gyur/ thabs bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub
164a3(mdo): sems dpal rnams kyi ye shes kyi tshogasum ma 'gyur te/ bzhi ga zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi rjes su 'jig rten gi rjes su 'jug pa dang / sems can rjes su 'jug pa dang / ye shes kyi rjesu 'jug pa/ 
164a4(mdo): 'bas bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi'i zhes chog ma tshugs par 'gyung // lam bzhi po 'di ni byang chub mas dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi tshogs sogs par 'gyur te/ ban
164a5(mdo): gang she na/ 'di sa ste/ pha ros pa tu phyin thams mdang / 'is sa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa pa dang / thams cadamakhyen pa mi ye shes kyis pa ste/ samatshan tho dadag ni byang
164a6(mdo): sems dpa' rnams kyi rlogs stsogs par 'gyur ro// phyi ngoms pa bzhi po 'di dge ni byang chub sems dpal kyi ye shes kyi tshogs phyogs par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ thom pas kyi ngoms pa dang bstan
164a7(mdo): mas kyi ngoms pa dang / dpyod pas kyi ngoms pa dang / shes las kyi ngoms pa ste/ myo ngobs pa bzhi dri dag ni byang chub sems dpal rnams kyi ye shes kyi tshogs sogs par 'gyur ro// gzhan ye shes rgya tshogs nigs
164a8(mdo): sems dpa' cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba dang / chos thams kyi rjes su 'gro ba'o// byin pa las kyang ye shes kyi tshogs su bas so// de bzhin du tshul khrims dang / 'azod pa'i dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsalagatan
164b1(mdo): na dang / shes rabasas kyang ye shes kyi tshogs su blta'o// byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / gtang snyoms las kyang ye shes kyi tshogs su blta ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rtsom pa ji snyed pa
164b2(mdo): de dag thams cad kyi ye shes kyis grub ste/ ye shes sngon du 'gro ba/ ye shes la rtog pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la gnas pa'i byor te/ ye shes dang ldan pa thams cad rton pa yin no// brgyad thams cad kyis kyang
164b3(mdo): de la glags myi rnyed do// de la khyang stsar sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi snod thams cad kyang nye bar gnas pa yin no/ sangs rgyas kyi byan kyi rlabs kyang 'thob bo// thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes kyang thob par byed de/ 'di ni ye shes
164b4(mdo): kyi tshogs myi zad pa zhes bya'o// byabatsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsod nams kyi tshogs dang ye shes kyi tshogs myi zad pa'o// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang
164b5(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bsgo bamyi zad pa ste/ bzhig pa zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus la lus kyi rjes su lta ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / tshor ba la tshor ba'i rjes
164b6(mdo): su lta ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / sems la sems la kyi rjes su lta bya nye bar bzhag pa dang / chos rnams sa chos kyi rjes su lta la lta ba dran pa gzhag pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa'i lus sa sus rjes su ste
164b7(mdo): ba tran pa nye bar gzhag par ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lus yang lus rjes su lta zhing gnas zhe na/ de rang gi lus dang / gzhan ga lus sa lus kyi rjes su nyud sta zhing gnas te/ sus kyi sngon gyi mtha' la
164b8(mdo): yang rton/ lus kyi phyi ma'i mtha' la yang rtog/ lus kyi de ltar byung ba la yod rtog ste/ kye ma lus 'di ni phyin ci log las byung la rgyu dang / rkyend kyis grul pa/ tshor ba myed pa/ byed pa myed pa/ bdag po byed pa
165a1(mdo): yongs su 'dzind pa myed pa/ rgyu dang rkyen rnams kyis byung ba ste/ 'di lta ste/ phyi rol kyi rtsa ba dang / shing gel ba dang / rtsi dang / nags tshas 'di dag rgyu dang rkyen kyis 'byung zhing / tshor ba myed pa sa e bdag po myed pa/ yongs su/ 
165a2(mdo): 'dzind pa myed do// de bzhin du bdag gi lus 'di yang / rtsa dang / shing ges pa dang / rtsi dang / nags tshal dang / shing dang / rtsig pa dang / byin yor lta bu ste/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched la kyis yongs su bzung ba/ tshor ma
165a3(mdo): myed pa/ byed pa byed pa/ bdag po myed pa/ yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa/ bdag dang bdag gi 'am/ rtag pa 'am brtan pa 'am/ ther zug gam/ myi g.yo ba dang 'am/ kyi gnod pa 'am/ myi 'gyur ba'i chos can byis stong ste/ 
165a4(mdo): lus 'di sa bdag gi myi bya li/ bdag gis snying po byed pa'i sus 'das snying po myed pa'i lus 'das/ snying po mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o// snying po de yang gang zhe na/ gang 'di de bzhin bshegs
165a5(mdo): pa'i sku ste bdag gos de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku/ chos kyi sku/ rdo rje sku/ byi shigs pa'i sku brtan pa'i sku/ 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i sku de bdag gis bsgrub par
165a6(mdo): bya'o// bdag gi lus nye ba du ma'i skyon chags mod kyi/ 'od kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku/ nyes pa thams cad dang bral pa thob par bya'o snyam mo// des phan yon mthong bas nas song yang rtog pa'i stobs kyis 'byung ba chen po
